Xegi benu liboe le ko e, bizɛɛzi lɛ ni isami. 17Pɔ̀ liboe le liʋívu kese e, lɛ baʋíze gagla ní liboe le me e. Lɛ loso xe kuxixa loo keduyɔyɔ kɛba agani liboe le me e, kɔ bɛɛdzi kede kyɔŋ. 18Lɛ banɔ batɔ fɛ balɛ ŋwisi amu a na klɔ gi ɛdɔ bibu ʋe me kinɛ ɛ. Ba benu banɔ batɔ gi bizeenu liboe le, 19pɔ̀ kelea mɛ baxixa ʋa nì kibɔɛ kude kuzenoo ani kelea mɛ ɔgyi nɔ ɛ, bɛ pɔ́ bikpɛ likpɔ ɔ, gi bikɔ si liboe le límɔ obufuɛkɔ xe liabu libiitɔtɔ ɔ. 20Pɔ̀ banɔ batɔ kɔ ɛ, balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ kese gbã aʋa kinɛ ɛ. Benu liboe le, bɛzi lɛ, lɛ beyò ebi la ɛ; batɔ beyò ebi avi tata, batɔ avi teglo, lɛ batɔ fɛ ɛ, ebi alafa ɛ.”
Kani yɛ izɛkɔ kudradraa
21Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ aʋa si, “Nyaŋwɛ izɛsú kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ agba yɛ ese loo abati ese e? Aní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa bizɛtrɔ kani yɛ ɛ? 22Kidɔ kakaa gi bekpo e biabu ke kudono ní oŋwe no, lɛ kidiliɛ aʋa gi bɛvini awlakpa la ɛtrɔ ɛ, bíabu ke dono. 23Lɛ loso e, ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!”
24Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa sì, “Mlata eboa la gi mlenu kutu mɔmɔmɔ! Kikpɛɛ liɛ gi mlɛkpɛ ɛki banima ɛ, nite ke biakpɛ ɔki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ mlɔ kiniɛ kiasanɔ ɔ. 25Ɔniliɛ awla gi kiditɔ kilɛ ɛ, biaki yɛ bidɔ ɔpɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, yɛ kini sisami yɛ fɛ ɛ, biazɛ kɛ yɛ awla.”
Abee ní lisebi le kutsitsi yo su
26Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ eboe la aʋa si, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛkpɛ esebi la ní yɛ kayaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ. 27Ɛɛwa yɛ axwɛ na elesi ni kemize. Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ petee, yɛ esebi la ɛzɛɛyɛ, gi ezeetsi i. Pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛ, óte kiliɛ gi lilɛ ɛ xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e. 28Kesea ɔtutɔ lɔ kizɛki sì amu na izeetsi xe izɛɛpɔ ɔ. Ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, amu na izedu. Lɛ kede e, kɔ awlakpa la, kɔ ɔmuya lɔ ɛ. 29Xegi amu na ɛzã ɛ, kɔ ɔnyrɔmɛdzɛɛ ekpese la kupa ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si la lipa nɛ le lina a.”
Abee ní lisebi sisami nɛ su u
30Yesu apani dzɛ si, “Ege kwiakɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kusrɔnɔ ɔ? Loo abee woli kwiakɔ obu yɛ kaʋaŋaa ese e? 31Yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami gɔgɔ lɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛkɔ akpɛ ní yɛ kesea mɛ kinɛ ɛ. 32Lipoetɔ kede e, lisebi le liyɛ gi lidzi ose ʋidi i gi ekeme sani ise gɔgɔ lɛ petee, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwiwa kɔ evu na ní lɔ aya la mɛ ɛ.”
33Yesu apani yɛ liboe le asi banima ní abee ʋa mɛ ŋwisi ba yà kinɛ ɛ. Apani aki ba kiliɛ onu gi bianu eboe la ese e. 34Yesu ɔ́pɛ si yipani iiki ba a, sani si gani abee ʋa mɛ. Pɔ̀ xegi yɛ tete ɔlɛ pɔni yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ, kɔ ebú liboe kakaa ese aki ba ɛ.
Yesu ayɔ liwɔ lɛ onu
35Liwe lɛ klɔ ke gi kulagɔ kwina ɛ, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutsa limu ne atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ” 36Lɛ bɛsɛ ní ɔnɔha lɔ su xe badɔkpasi ba bemu iku ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ Yesu xunyɔ ɛ, eze ní katapokpaa mɛ koko; ko lɛ ba petee bɛsɛ ɛ. Kutapokpa dzedzeo fɛ kwipɔni yɛ. 37Lɛ lisɛ nɛ ɛ, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu niteme si kuni yo akpɔ la ɛgbigba eku katapokpaa mɛ gi keyi pɔ́ ɔ. 38Yesu afɛ ní katapokpaa mɛ kedea ɔza lɔ gi adɔ sra ní sumu ye aʋa ɛ. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba benyime ye lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛɛ, wɔ́kɔ lɛ mɛ ɔki blɔ gi kuhatse na a?”
39Yesu ayɔ ɔlɛɛ kedu ya. Lɛ akpɛ ozi lo ní liwɔ lɛ aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi!” Lɛ ekyi eku kuni yo akpɔ la aʋa lɛ apani si, “Dɔ zĩi!” Liwɔ lɛ onu liyɔ kyɔŋ lɛ niklɔ petee ɛgɔ kranaa a. 40Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege nì lifu mleese e? Kuziŋaa tɔtɔ kúma ní mlɔ awla kɔʋana nì abla na a?”
41Pɔ̀ akaŋu yɛ atsa ba, lɛ ba mɛ ɔnɔ kakaa eʋi yɛ ɔhanuglɔɛ si, “Onyime woli lu iliɛ ya? Gi liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo akpɔ la fɛ binu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ!”

Title: MAK 5
Content:
Yesu akpikpini Ifuɛfuɛ Zimizi ne dono ní Onyime ɔtɔ mɛ
1Lɛ kede e, Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzeku Galilea Limù ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ ní Gerasanɛ ma kesea aʋa. 2Kiliɛ gi Yesu eple ní katapokpaa mɛ me ko e, onyime ɔtɔ edo ní bekpo ʋa idrɔ lɛ kusi lɛ aba atsani yɛ ɛ. Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní onyimee me. 3Lɛ loso e, idrɔ lɛ mɛ ize yɛ ozeklɔ ɔ. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́zɛtani yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ kukpɛ tɔ ɔ. 4Bɛzɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ ní ikli lɛ ni iwla lɛ epoe glegle, pɔ̀ lipoe kakaa ɛ, azɛɛpa egboo na, kɔ avini bala ʋa ní yɛ ikli lɛ ɛ. Eze gagla niteme si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́zɛtani yɛ aʋa kuŋa a. 5Azɛɛklanɔ ní idrɔ lɛ kusi ní eto la aʋa elesi ni kemize gi azɛɛkpɛ ozi táataa, lɛ azɛɛkɔ akla na akpɛ isu ya ebi la a.
6Eze ɔdzage no xe amɔ Yesu atsisi i. Lɛ loso e, ese lɛ adɔ́ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ní Yesu ketu ya ɛ. 7Lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla sì, “Wɔ Yesu, Aya Ʋidi ye Bi ye! Liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní mɛ su u? Aya loso e, maki wɔ litukpo si wukíhe kutu iiki mɛ ɛ!” 8Apani nite e, lɛ ese linu si Yesu azɛɛpani si, “Wɔ ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi, doza ní onyime liɛ ya mɛ!”
9Lɛ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bizɛxwa wɔ ɔ?”
Onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, “Mɛ linyi linu si, ‘Likpi’, lɛ ese linu si kwisrɛ.” 10Niteme si azɛɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔkikpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní kusio klɔ ɔ.
11Liba lɛ mɛ si ihà likpi itɔ lizɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ní lito etɔ su ní niklɔ ʋa ɔza lɔ. 12Lɛ loso e, ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne iiki Yesu litukpo si, “Tsisi blɔ ní ihà lɛ klɔ ʋa mɛ, tɔ ki tɔ kuti iku lɛ mɛ!” 13Ebu kudeo aki lɛ, lɛ ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido ní onyimee me xe itiku iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Ihà lɛ likpi le kiklaklaɛ mɛ kiaze ŋwisi akpe tiaʋa kinɛ te e. Lɛ pɔ́ ise eple lito le lɛ izɛdɔ limu ne e.
14Banama gi bezeedi ihà lɛ aʋa ɛ, bese lɛ bɛzeeefuflu liboe le kpɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ ni inyrɔ nɛ aʋa a. Banima bedo eba tɔ bedi liboe le kibabaɛ mɛ 15niteme si gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi likpi le lize bázanɔ ɛ. Bemɔ yɛ gi odi i, akpɛ awu la mɔmɔmɔ gi eze ní sínɔ mɛ, nite si lifu ne liku banima pɔ́. 16Banama gi bɛmɔ liboe le aŋu mɛ ɛ, behle kiboebitɛɛ kpɛ banɔ dzedze ba mɛ kiliɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛki onyime liɛ me gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e, ni kiliɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛki ihà lɛ fɛ ɛ.
17Lɛ loso banima bɛsi Yesu sì ɔsɛ ní ba kesea mɛ.
18Gi Yesu azeemu iku katapokpaa mɛ si yisɛ ɛ, onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize bázanɔ ɛ, eʋi adɔ ní Yesu awla si ɔki tɔ yiku ni yɛ kude.
19Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́dimɛ ɔ́ki yɛ, lɛ asi yɛ boŋ si, “Dzi trɛ ní kepea mɛ ní wɔ benete ba klɔ tɔ zɛɛsi ba kidiliɛ gi Aya abitɛ akí wɔ nì asigaga glegle ala gi edi wo e.”
20Gi onyimee asɛ nite e, aklanɔ ní Ima Liɔfɔ lɛ pɔ́ mɛ. Asi banima petee kidiliɛ gi Yesu abitɛ aki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso banama petee gi benu yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, ba inugu itse.
Yesu ayɔ ni Yairo yɛ obidzɛɛ nì ɔdzɛɛ liɛ su gi ika lɛ kunyaa kwize e
21Yesu edzì atsà limu ne atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ aʋa. Gi eku níklɔ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lixogo ní yɛ su. 22Lɛ Yairo gi eze Yudanɛ ma ɔnɔtsitsi ní ba ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, yɛ fɛ aba eku i. Gi amɔ Yesu i, adɔ ní Yesu ketu ya 23lɛ eble yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ kupɛpɛɔ aki Yesu si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ! Mɛ obidzɛʋi yɛ eetse gaglaa. Maki wɔ litukpo, ba tɔ gatrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa atɔ ɔyɔ.”
24Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Yesu ni onyimee bɛsɛ eku kudeo me e. Banima bɛsrɛ gi bekuni ba kude e, gi liki si bɛzɛpɔ́ Yesu ikpɛ ní kupɛɔ petee e.
25Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ eze ní banima kusi, gi azɛɛnya ɛ. Ika lɛ izedo ní yɛ su agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa nyɔŋ. 26Bawabitɛ glegle bekeni idi pɔ̀ liboeboe lísɛ ɛ. Ezizi yɛ exo la petee tɔ nya yɛ isu ya mɛ idzi iku lɛ kiku ye, pɔ̀ lɛ́ kinyani boŋ lizɛɛnyani itrɔ ɛ. 27Enu Yesu onu lɛ loso yɛ fɛ ɛ, eti eku ní linɔkpi le me gani kedea. 28Lɛ asi yɛ isu ya sì, “Xegi matani Yesu awu la kugbɔnɔ ko e, maahaya.”
29Kiliɛ gi anya gbɔni Yesu awu la ko e, ika lɛ gi ííba yɛ su i, itsa kyɔŋ. Enu le ní yɛ isu ya mɛ ké si yɛ ahaya. 30Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Yesu amɔ egyesi sì kigagla kido ní yɛ mɛ. Ekyi ní ɔnɔha lɔ gi eze ní yɛ su kusi yo lɛ eʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ agbɔni mɛ awu la ɛ?”
31Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bebu le onu si, “Wɔ tutɔ wɔɛmɔ kiliɛ gi banima bɛsa likpakpa lɛ ní wɔ su i, lɛ woeʋi dzɛ si nyaŋwɛ agbɔni wɔ liwu le na a?”
32Pɔ̀ Yesu azeedi aklanɔ si yimɔ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ. 33Gi ɔdzɛɛ amɔ kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ɛki yɛ onu i, edo ní banima kusi aba ɔtɔ nɔ. Lifu ne likɔ si azeesugu. Edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea ní Yesu ketu ya lɛ asi yɛ liboe zizi nɛ lɛ kizezee me ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ. 34Niklɔ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiki si wɔ haya. Ga trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ tɔ wɔ kunyaa kuyurɔ wɔ.”
35Kiliɛ gi Yesu azɛɛpani eboa la klɔ ko e, banɔ batɔ bɛdɔ ni Yairo kepea mɛ nì odu iiki Yairo si “Wɔ obidzɛʋi yɛ etse.” Lɛ loso e, “kúkpɛ Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kunugu tɔ ɔ.”
36Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́kpɛ ba liboe le linɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi Yairo si, “Kúse lifu u; wɔ kɔ zi ŋa ko!” 37Lɛ ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ kude si okuni ba kude sani Petro, Yakobo ni yenemi ye Yohanes ko o. 38Lipoe lɛ gi beku Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu amɔ kiliɛ gi ozi lo ni kubemio kwize ní niklɔ ɛ. 39Gi eti eku ni ba aʋa ɛ, eʋi si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛpisa nite e? Liboe woli lɛ loso mleebemi nite e? Ɔnuvɔ yɛ oʋítse, sra ko ɛɛdɔ!”
40Pɔ̀, banɔ baklɔ gi beze niklɔ ɛ, bɛmwɛ yɛ; lɛ loso, akpikpini ba petee edono ní ligba lɛ mɛ. Banɔ baklɔ gi beti iku ɔnuvɔ yɛ aʋa a pɔni yɛ ɛ, ba ko beze obika yɛ, obinee ni yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba. 41Yesu evu ɔnuvɔ yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ asi yɛ sì, “Talita kumi,” gi lɛ ese linu si, “Ɔdisami, mɛ si yɔ!”
42Nite si ɔdzɛʋi yɛ ayɔ kyɔŋ gi ekpese kuklanɔ ɛ. Azɛ agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa a. Gi liboe le liba lɛ mɛ nite e, banima pɔ́ ba inugu itse e. 43Yesu xunyɔ akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa aki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlaki ɔnuvɔ ɛ kiditɔ tɔ ɔŋa.”

Title: MAK 6
Content:
Nazaret banɛ ma bázɛ Yesu u
1Gi Yesu asɛ niklɔ ɛ, edzi atrɛ ní Nazaret, yɛ kepea. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekuni yɛ kude. 2Ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ, Yesu ekpese bidɔ kubasɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ. Banɔ glegle beze níklɔ, lɛ gi benu yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ɛ, bɛwɔ yaa. Lɛ beʋi si, “Nifɔ yɛ kɔ adɔ ni eboa la ya petee? Kuboeteo liɔ gi bɛki yɛ ɛ, nifɔ kwidɔ? Kitɛ xe izɛɛtani enugutseboe la kubitɛ nite e? 3Aní osetsi yɛ iliɛ ya lò o? Ani Maria yɛ obinyimee, gi yɛ benemi ba benu Yakobo, Yosef ni Yuda ani Simon lò o? Lɛ aní yɛ benemidzɛ ba bali blɔ kusi lò o?” Lɛ loso e, bázɛ yɛ ɛ.
4Nite si Yesu asi ba si, “Bizɛkpɛ kubùbù ní Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba su ní ɔkɔ kakaa. Pɔ̀ ní ba kepea ɛ, ba akɔanɛ ma nì ba benete ba kusi kɔ ɛ, beboedoplɛ ba béyi kididɔ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
5Yesu ɔ́tani enugutseboe atɔtɔ kubitɛ níklɔ ɔ, sani si ɔtrɔ yɛ awla ní banɔ klakla batɔ aʋa lɛ bɛhaya ɛ. 6Litu ye kugyɔ si kuziŋa kúze ní banima mɛ ɛ.
Yesu akpɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba
Lɛ Yesu aklani kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kwiklani Nazaret i, kɔ mɛ xe abasɛ bidɔ mɛ ní kɔ petee me e. 7Yesu axwa badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kpɛ likpɔ, lɛ alɛ ba tiaʋa tiaʋa a xe akpɛ ba ɛ. Aki ba kigagla ní ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne aʋa. 8Lɛ akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si, “Xe mleku kudeo me e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔkivu kididɔ ɛsani ose vuga vuga. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔkikɔ liklã̀ loo kudɔʋí kepimi loo kibɔ ɛtɔtɔ kpɛ isu kura a. 9Mlakpɛ afɔkpa fãa, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔkikɔ liwu ʋla evu u. 10Asi ba dzɛ si, Kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi biakpɛ mlɔ wolaa ɛ, mleze ka mɛ kɔkpɛni mlɔ lisɛpoe le e. 11Xe mleku ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bázɛ mlɔ ɛ, loo bápɛ si bɛzi mlɔ liboe le e, mlasɛ ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ. Xegi mlɛɛsɛ ɛ, mlekple ovugbo lo mlɔ kukliseo aplɛ. Bɛ biaze kiseʋi gi mledu ní ba su i.” 12Lɛ loso e, badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ, lɛ bɛpani liboe le klanɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa okyi ɔna mɛ ɛ. 13Bɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono ní banima ma mɛ. Bɛsra kumu iiki banyanya glegle, lɛ bɛyɔ ni ba ɛ.
Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ kutse o
14Okusi ye Herodes enu eboa la klɔ gi ɛzɛtrɛ la aʋa a, lɛ ese linu si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyi hoo. Banɔ batɔ ba kugyodi yo ní Yesu su kwize si Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ edzì ligbã o lɛ loso kigaglaɛ liɛ ya kilɛ ní yɛ awla si ɔbitɛ enugutseboe ala ya nite e.
15Kokoko e, banɔ batɔ fɛ begyo edi si, “Eliya boŋ iliɛ klɔ ɔ.” Banɔ dzedze ba si, “Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ onu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi beboedoplɛ ba beze ni kanaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ.”
16Pɔ̀ gi Herodes enu liboe le e, yɛ kɔɔ asi sì, “Yɛ onu Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ! Maki bɛti yɛ litukpo le, pɔ̀ edzi ligbã a!” 17Okusi ye Herodes ɔtutɔ aki si bevu Yohanes, lɛ yɛ ke aki bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ, xe bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba a. Yedze Herodia loso ebu ɔkli lɔ klɔ ʋa. Herodia eze Filipo yedze, xe Okusi ye Herodes azɛ yɛ agbanɔ ɔ. Lɛ Filipo ni Okusi ye Herodes pɔ̀ ɛ, beze benemi. 18Lɛ Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ azɛ si Herodes sì, “Lípɛ si wɔazɛ wonemi ye yedze ɔgbanɔ ɔ.”
19Liboe lɛ klɔ loso e, Yohanes yɛ liboe lizeeyeʋi Okusi ye Herodes yedze Herodia isu nyani nyani gi azaapɛ kudeonu si yiye ye e. Pɔ̀ Okusi ye Herodes loso e, ɔ́zɛmɔ kudeonu ní yɛ su u. 20Lɛ Okusi ye Herodes pɔ ɛ, azeese Yohanes, lɛ ese linu si etè si Yohanes eze ɔnɔ gbã, lɛ yɛ isu fɛ idra ní Aya Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ. Lɛ loso e, edi le aʋa si kididɔ kísa Yohanes kura ní ligba lɛ ɛ. Yohanes yɛ eboe pani pani la ezetu Okusi ye Herodes lipoe kakaa gi enu la ɛ; pɔ̀ fɛ azɛɛpɛ si yinu la.
21Gɔgɔɛ, kudeonu liɔ gi Herodia azaapɛ ɛ kwidra ɛki yɛ. Liba lɛ mɛ si Okusi ye Herodes azaaŋa yɛ lipɔwe le. Niteme si edu ɔkplɔ aki yɛ baʋaŋaa klɔ gi beze banɔ ʋidi ba, baguta ba baka ba ni Galilea kesea mɛ banɔ gbɔgbɔ ʋa petee. 22Liwe lɛ klɔ ɔŋa klɔ ɛ, Herodia yebidzɛʋiɛ eyo livu ne gi isami iku Okusi ye Herodes ni yɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su bezeze ʋa mɔmɔmɔ. Lɛ loso e, Okusi ye asi obidzɛʋi yɛ si, “Ege wɔpɛ ɛ dɔni mɛ iwla mɛ ɛ? Kidɔ kakaa gi kiku wɔ kule e, ʋi; maki wɔ kɛ.” 23Niteme si aka bitamu glegle aki ɔnuvɔɛ, lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Matàni kidɔ kakaa si, kidɔ kakaa gi wɔaʋi i, vaa xegi mɛ kaʋaŋaa kapɛ tiele fɛ ɛ, maaki wɔ kɛ.”
24Niteme si, ɔdzɛʋi yɛ edo atrɛ ní yene klɔ lɛ azeeʋi ye si, “Mone, ege maaʋi i?”
Niklɔ yene asi yɛ si, “Ʋi Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ litukpo le!”
25Ɔdzɛʋi yɛ akɔsi edzi atrɛ ní Okusi ye Herodes klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Mapɛ si kɔ Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ litukpo le trɔ ní kitɛɛ aʋa ki mɛ tɔ mizɛ ablahate!”
26Liboe le likɔ si Okusi ye Herodes awɔ ni asigaga mɛ. Pɔ̀ yɛ bitamu ʋɛ gi aka ní yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba aŋu mɛ loso e, ɔ́pɛ si yigbe ɛki yɛ ɛ. 27Niteme si akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔye tole kyɔŋ si odi lɛ aʋa si yatsa Yohanes litukpo le amanɔ. Ɔnɔyee asɛ atrɛ niklɔ gi bɛkpɛ Yohanes ní ligba lɛ ɛ; lɛ atsa yɛ litukpo le e. 28Lɛ akɔ lɛ atrɔ ní kitɛɛ aʋa a xe akɔ amanɔ ɛ. Akɔ linɔtukpo le aki ɔdzɛʋi yɛ, lɛ yɛ fɛ akɔ lɛ aki yene e. 29Gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba benu liboe le e, bɛtrɛ, lɛ bɛzɛkɔ Yohanes okpo ye zevive e.
Yesu aki banɔ akpe tietsu bidɔŋaŋa
30Yesu yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bɛtrɛ, bedzi; lɛ bebatsani yɛ ɛ. Bɛsi yɛ eboa la gi etrɛ lɛ aʋa ani bidɔ bɛklɔ gi bɛbasɛ petee. 31Lɛ gi banɔ glegle bɛzɛtrɛ xe batɔ fɛ bɛzɛba ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bámɔ kudeonu tete xe biaŋa bidɔ fɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso asi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kubu lidze dzaa atɔ mlazeze mɔni taʋɛ.” 32Bemu iku katapokpa atɔ mɛ lɛ beku kudeo me etrɛ ní ɔkutɔ gi ɔnɔnɔ óze e.
33Pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle gi bɛmɔ ba a gi bɛzɛsɛ̀ ɛ, bɛmɔ ba egyesi kyɔŋ. Banima bɛdɔ ima nɛ petee me, besega limu ne kutu yɔ ni ikli lɛ lɛ bezeeku limu ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛki Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba. 34Gi Yesu edo ní katapokpaa mɛ xe amɔ linɔkpi le e, ba liboe liga yɛ asigaga lɛ ese linu si beze ŋwisi iʋesi gi ɔʋadi óze ní lɛ awla kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso ekpese ba bidɔ glegle kubasɛ. 35Lipoe lɛ gi kelea kekpese kublo e, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Niya ebu lidze” lɛ “Kelea keeblo nì blo. 36Lɛ loso e, ki tɔ banima basɛ tɔ batrɛ ní inyrɔɔ nɛ ani imaɛ nɛ klɔ gi iklani niya mɛ ɛ tɔ bazɛpɛ kiditɔ aŋa a.”
37Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ mlaki ba bidɔ tɔ baŋa.” Lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Kibɔɛ liɛ gi kwiazizi ní ba aklã na litukpo e, kiana ɔnɔ tole yɛ badzidzi ɔgɔtiaʋa liʋɛ ɛ!”
38Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Aklã tasɛ alɛ mlɔ awla a? Mlazedi.” Gi bedzi itrɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Aklã tetsu ani akpa taʋa.”
39Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si baki tɔ linɔkpi le lize kesea ní ahakpɔ mɛ ní siwa sɛ aʋa. 40Lɛ loso e, banima beple eze ní ahakpɔ mɛ, ikutɔ banɔ alafa, ikutɔ avi tetsu. 41Lɛ Yesu akɔ aklã tetsu la ni akpa taʋa la ɛ. Efeke yɛ aŋu na edi lifunu ne, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e. Ayaʋi aklã na lɛ avini akpa la fɛ mɛ xe akɔ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si balɛ aki linɔkpi le petee e. 42Ɔnɔ kakaa aŋa, gi eke e. 43Pɔ̀ gi bɛŋa pɔ ɛ, badɔkpasi ba bɛkpɛ bidɔ mɛ gi bɛŋa ɛgɔ likpɔ, gi biyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa a. 44Ní linɔkpi lɛ klɔ gi liŋa bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, benyime ba beze akpe tietsu.
Yesu aga kuni yo aʋa
45Lɛ Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní katapokpa me tɔ bekú yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ atrɛ ní Betsaida ní limu ne kapɛ ʋla. Yesu apɛ si yikpɛ linɔkpi le kude e 46Gi akpɛ banima kude pɔ́ ɛ, emu atrɛ ní lito etɔ aʋa si yixwa Aya. 47Gi kelea keblo e, katapokpaa keze ní limu ne kusi yo; pɔ̀ Yesu tole eze ní oge no o. 48Amɔ si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzetutru ni katapokpaa ní limu ne aʋa lɛ ese linu si bɛtsani liwɔ lɛ gi lifu idɔni niklɔ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso olezatɔ nɔ ŋwisi ɔkukɔ tɔpu nɔ kimemee me kinɛ ɛ, Yesu aga kuni yo aʋa aba tsani ba. Nya apɛ si yiza ba aʋa xe e. 49Pɔ̀ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ gi azɛɛga kuni yo aʋa ɛ, begyodi si okpo bɛmɔ, niteme si bese lifu ne. Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Okpo ye!” 50Gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, belulu pɔ̀
Yesu asi ba ni le onu klɔ si, “Mlamɔ ɔna! Mɛ iliɛ ya! Mlakíse lifu u!” 51Lɛ emu eku apɔni ba ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, liwɔ lɛ onu líyɔ miɔɔ. Badɔkpasi ba onugu etse 52lɛ ese linu si bénu liboe lɛ gi likpasi ní banɔ akpe tietsu ba ba kaʋadi ya mɛ ese e. Ba begyodi ʋa bátani liboe le kuvu kura.
Yesu ayɔ ni banyanya ba ní Genesaret
53Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtsa limu ne lɛ beple eku ní Genesaret kesea mɛ; lɛ bɛka katapokpaa ní limu ne kutu yɔ ɛ. 54Agi beple ní katapokpaa mɛ pɔ́ ko e, banima bɛmɔ Yesu igyesi kyɔŋ. 55Lɛ loso e, banima bese eklani kesea mɛ petee niteme si ɔkɔ́ kakaa gi benu si Yesu ɔlɛ ko e, befeke ba banyanya ba ɛmani yɛ ní ba inyanyatɔsi lɛ aʋa. 56Lɛ ɔkɔ kakaa gi Yesu atrɛ ɛ, ní kumami yɔ mɛ, ima ʋidi ne me ani inyrɔ nɛ aʋa ko e, banima bɛkɔ ba banyanya ba ɛtsinɔ ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa. Kɔ bɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔki tɔ bagbɔni yɛ awu la kutu yɔ. Lɛ banama petee gi bɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ, ba isu ya mɛ iku igagla a.

Title: MAK 7
Content:
Bakatsitsi ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ní ba egoʋi la su u
1Gi Farisianɛ ma ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛdɔ ní Yerusalem xe bɛba ɛ, bexogo ní Yesu su. 2Bevu aŋu si Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi batɔ bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ni awla gi béplo ní ba ɔkɔ lɔ onu u. Lɛ ese linu si ba ɖii kɔ béplo awla la kiliɛ gi Farisianɛ ma bɛtrɔ ɛki ɔnɔ kakaa kinɛ ɛ.
3Farisianɛ ma ni Yudanɛ ma pɔ́, bekuni ba bakatsi ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ bɛ kude, nite si xegi béplo awla la ní ligoʋi le onu i, bátraŋa bidɔ ɔ. 4Lɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bedzi idɔnɔ kedzia mɛ ɛ, linu si beplo ke ni tɔ beplo ba awla la ní ɔtɔpu kɔ xe ableke biaŋa bidɔ ɔ. Isã dzedze itɔ gi ba bakatsi ba bɛkpɛ ɛplɛ, ŋwisi kupliʋi yo, kudɔtɔfukpoo, ni kudɔkpaa liɔ mɛ bizɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bɛ kiploploe ní ba egoʋi la onu petee, bɛzɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa.
5Nite si Farisianɛ ma ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba beʋi Yesu si, “Ege lɛ loso xe wɔ badɔkpasi ba kɔ bévu blɔ bakatsi ba ba egoʋi la gi bɛkpɛ ɛplɛ ɔzɔ mɛ na a, xe ba kɔ bizɛɛŋa bidɔ ni awla gi la su ádra na a?”
6Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Yesaya liboe le ligyɔ koŋ gi amɔ liboe edo aplɛ ní mlɔ su i! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ mlenu, kiliɛ gi aŋwlimi aplɛ si i:
Aya si, “ ‘Banɔ ba ya ɛ,
enugumeboe ko bɛkɔ ɛlɔ mɛ ɛ;
pɔ̀ ba ina nɛ kɔ ívu me kura.
7Líziã si besumu me e.
Lɛ ese linu si banima isã nɛ aʋa ko bizɛbitɛ
ŋwisi lɛ inu Aya yɛ isã nɛ na a!’
8“Mlɛyurɔ Aya yɛ isã nɛ, lɛ mlevu banima isã nɛ ɔzɔ mɛ ɛ.”
9Lɛ Yesu atrɛ yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Ni mlɔ kuboeteo me e, mlɛyurɔ Aya isã nɛ ɛplɛ lɛ mlevu isu i kɔ ni mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ isã nɛ ɛ. 10Lɛ ese linu si, Mose edo aplɛ si, ‘Bù wɔka ni wone.’ Lɛ edo dzɛ si, ‘Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aadu onugu yurɔ yɛka loo yene e, lilɛ si beye ɔniliɛ klɔ.’ 11Pɔ̀ mlɔ si, xegi kidiitɔ kilɛ ɔnutɔ awla gi aatani kɛ kukɔ odi yɛka loo yene aʋa a, pɔ̀ xe asi ba si kinu Aya kinɛ ɛ, 12kɔ libasɛ si mlɛki yɛ kudeo si ɔkipɔni yɛka loo yene e. 13Nite mlɛbitɛ, gi mlevu mlɔ bakatsi ba egoʋi la awla a, xe mlɛki si Aya isã nɛ íyi kididɔ tɔɔ ɔ. Lɛ ɛ, eboe glegle dzedze alɛ ŋwisi la ya kinɛ gi mlɛzɛbitɛ ɛ.”
Yesu apani ní kidiliɛ gi kizelulu ɔnɔ su i
14Dzɛ ɛ, Yesu axwa linɔkpi le amani isu ya lɛ asi ba si, “Liboe lɛ gi matrapani i, mlɔ petee mlata kutu tɔ mlenu lɛ ese. 15Kidiliɛ gi kidɔ oge no o, xe kiti iku ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, aní kɛ kiaki si ɔnɔ aalulù ní ɔkɔ lɔ onu u. Boŋu i, kidiliɛ gi kidɔ ní ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, kɛ kizelulu ɔnɔ. 16Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, atɔ onu!”
17Gi asɛ ní linɔkpi le su xe atrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si obu abee liɛ ya ese ɔki ba. 18Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔ mlɔ fɛ mlénu eboa la ya ese na a? Kidiliɛ gi kidɔ oge no e, kitrátani ɔnɔ kululu u. 19Lɛ ese linu si kidiliɛ klɔ ɛ, kitiiku ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ kiza eku ní yɛ lipo le me kɔ kido eza ní yɛ ɔnɔse lo me e.” Liboe lɛ gi Yesu apani nite e, libasɛ si kidɔŋaŋa kakaa ɛ, kɛ su kidra gi biaŋa fãa a.
20Lɛ atrɛ ní yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Kidiliɛ gi kido edɔní ɔnɔse lo me e, kɛ kizelulu ɔnɔ ɔ. 21Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ yɛ kimɛ ɛ mɛ, lɛ dɔni yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ begyodi nyani nyani ʋa bizɛdɔ edo. Lɛ ba bizɛgbani ɔnɔ ɛkpɛ ní eboe zimizi na kubitɛɔ mɛ ɛ, gi la mɛ atɔ enu kalɔa kulɔ̀lɔ, kuze, kunɔye, kihasiwawa, 22kuŋazi, litukpomegagla, kunɔmeno, onugududu, kunɔmobu, kaŋuzã, banɔ enyi kuxwaxwa, kusufeke ani kugadɔdɔ. 23Eboe dovo la ya petee ɛdɔ ní ɔnɔɛ kimɛ ɛmɛ lɛ la izelulu ɔnɔ ɔ.”
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ yɛ kuziŋaa ní Yesu me
24Lɛ kede e, Yesu asɛ klɔ lɛ atrɛ ní Tiro bidɔ mɛ. Eti eku kepe katɔ mɛ. Ɔ́pɛ si ɔnɔnɔ ote si yɛ ɔlɛ ní klɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ɛ, ɔ́tani isu ya kukpo o. 25Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní yɛ obidzɛʋi ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, enu si Yesu aba ni klɔ, lɛ aba Yesu klɔ kyɔŋ lɛ edu aklamasi na kese ní yɛ ketu ya ɛ. 26Ɔdzɛɛ eze Heladze gi bɛpɔ ní Foenike bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ní Siria kesea mɛ ɛ. Aki Yesu litukpo si ɔkpikpini ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no dono ní yɛ obidzɛʋi yɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ. 27Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Ki tɔ baki banuvɔ ba bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ. Líma si bakɔ banuvɔ ba bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ tɔ bakɔ aŋwia plɛ aki kudroʋio o!”
28Lɛ Heladzee ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Ee Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, lilɛ te xunyɔ; pɔ̀ xegi banuvɔ ba bɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bitɔ bizɛwɔli kokoko; niteme si kudroʋio fɛ ɛ, kuzɛɛŋa kesea binɛ mɛ ní ɔkplɔ nɔ ese e.”
29Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Kɔkpɛ liboe lɛ gi wɔpani loso e, dzitrɛ wɔ kepea mɛ. Xe woku i, wɔamɔ si ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo eza ní wɔ obidzɛʋi yɛ mɛ.”
30Gi ɔdzɛɛ eku yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, amɔ Yebi ye gi ɔfini yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ aʋa a, gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo eza ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.
Yesu ayɔ ni otoku omúmu ɔtɔ
31Lɛ kede e, Yesu asɛ ní Tiro bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀, lɛ aga Sidon xe aba Galilea Limu ne kutu xe azaatrɛ ní Ima Liɔfɔ lɛ bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ. 32Banɔ batɔ bɛgbani onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔ́zenu i, lɛ ɔ́zɛtani kunugu yo kugu fɛ ɛmani Yesu klɔ ɔ; lɛ bɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔtrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa a. 33Lɛ Yesu ebu onyimee lidze dzaa ní banima kusi i. Yesu akɔ yɛ biwlaʋi ʋɛ akpɛ ní onyimee batu ʋa mɛ, lɛ ebu sita sɛ; lɛ agbɔni onyimee kinemi ye. 34Lɛ Yesu efeke aŋu na edu lifunu ne, egu hũu, lɛ asi onyimee ní si Hebri sɛ mɛ si, “Hefata!” Lɛ ese linu si, “Dra a!”
35Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, onyimee yɛ batu ʋa bɛdra, lɛ yɛ kinemi ye ika lɛ igyɔ lɛ ekpese kunugu yo kugu gi yɛ kunugu yo me kwidra a. 36Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki banima si bakísi ɔnɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ lɛ kiliɛ gi azaakpɛ ɔsã nɔ aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa ɛ, nite ke banima fɛ bezehle liboe le. 37Lɛ banama petee gi benu liboe le e, bɛwɔ yaa. Liboe gi ɔnɔ kakaa aapani ní lɛ su ko lize si, “Kitɛ yɛ kiboebitɛɛ kidɔ nite e? Kitɛ xe yɛ kɔɔ izɛki si itoku le ize nu u, xe imumu ne fɛ izɛpani i?”

Title: MAK 8
Content:
Yesu agani banɔ akpe tiene ní bidɔŋaŋa a
1Ní ewe alaklɔ mɛ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi dzedze itɔ likpɛ likpɔ dzɛ. Lɛ gi kididɔ kize gi biaŋa ɛ, Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba manɔ ní yɛ klɔ, lɛ asi ba si, 2“Banɔ ba ya ba liboe liga mɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si ewe tatá la ya gi balɛ ní mɛ su u, lɛ ba bidɔŋaŋa bɛ fɛ biblo o. 3Xegi médi ba aʋa a, xe makpɛ ba kudeo e, biatɔ ɔpiti ní kudeo aʋa, lɛ ese linu si batɔ ba idɔ klɔ idze e.”
4Yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ ɔnutɔ aamɔ kiŋaŋa ɛki linɔkpii lɛ xe biaŋa a, xe biakè ní ɔyaya klɔ ya na a?”
5Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Aklã tasɛ alɛ mlɔ awla a?”
Bebu lɛ onu si, “Aklã tegloele.”
6Lɛ asi linɔkpi le si beze keseatsalia. Lɛ akɔ aklã tegloele la a, xe edo Aya ɖase ní la aʋa a. Lɛ ayaʋi la mɛ xe akɔ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ alɛ̀ aki linɔkpi le e. Niteme si badɔkpasi ba bɛlɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛki ba petee e. 7Akpa wli wli klakla ʋi atɔ eze ní badɔkpasi ba awla. Yesu edo ɖase ní la aʋa, lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ la fɛ alɛ aki linɔkpi le e. 8Ɔnɔ kakaa aŋa bidɔ mɛ gi eke e. Lɛ kede e, badɔkpasi ba bɛhali bidɔ mɛ gi bɛŋa xe bigɔ ɛ, biyí kusɔʋi tugloele. 9Banima ba kisrɛsrɛ mɛ kize ŋwisi akpe tiene kinɛ. 10Gi Yesu akpɛ banima ma kude pɔ ɛ, emu eku ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ atrɛ ní Dalmanuta bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ.
Farisianɛ ma bɛpɛ linugutseboe dɔni Yesu iwla mɛ
11Lɛ Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ xe bekpese eboe la kuhe ni yɛ ɛ. Bezeekeni ye edi lɛ loso e, beʋi idɔni yɛ awla si ɔbitɛ linugutseboe litɔ ɔki ba tɔ beedi gi liabasɛ si Aya yɛ anya kpɛ yɛ ɛ. 12Pɔ̀ Yesu egu hũu lɛ apani si, “Ege lɛ loso omono kelea lia ya kɛɛpɛ linugutseboe e? Owo, Misi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ! Bátraki mlɔ gyesi liɛ ya a.”
13Lɛ Yesu asɛ ní ba su u, emu eku ní katapokpaa me lɛ atsa limu ne xe atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ ɛ.
Farisianɛ ma ni Okusi ye Herodes ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ
14Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedze bákɔ aklã atɔtɔ evu sani tile gi lizee ba awla ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. 15Yesu agba ba si, “Mleze ni aŋu tɔ mledi mumɔ ní Farisianɛ ma ni Okusi ye Herodes ba kunyagbãa su.”
16Bevu liboe le edi ní batsali kusi. Lɛ bɛsi si, “Agi kúkɔ aklã tɔtɔ evu i, lɛ loso apani liboe lɛ ya te e.”
17Agi Yesu kɔ ete liboe lɛ gi bɛzeedo onu i, eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɔ kugyodi yo kwitrɛ ní liklã su u? Kɔ mleʋínu eboe la ese fukɔ na a? Kitɛ xe mlɔ begyodi ʋa bɛdɔ sra sɛ nite e? 18Bimbi bilɛ mlɔ awla pɔ̀ mlaʋímɔ na? Lɛ atukpa la alɛ mlɔ, pɔ̀ mlaʋínu na a? Mláplɛ aŋu u 19lipoe lɛ gi makɔ aklã tetsu la aki banɔ akpe tietsu ba lò o? Bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kusɔʋi tusɛ mlɛhali i?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa!”
20“Lɛ gi mayaʋi aklã tegloele la aki banɔ akpe tiene ba ɛ, bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kusɔʋi tusɛ mlɛhali i?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kusɔʋi tugloele.”
21Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔ kɔna ni abla ɛ, mleʋínu eboe la ese dzɛ na a?”
Yesu ayɔ ni kaŋupo atɔ ní Betsaida
22Gi bɛzɛklanɔ ɛ, bezeku Betsaida. Niklɔ banɔ batɔ bɛgbani kaŋupo atɔ ɛmanɔ ní Yesu klɔ. Lɛ bɛki yɛ litukpo si ɔgbɔni yɛ ɛ. 23Yesu evu kaŋupoa ɔwla lɔ lɛ agbani yɛ edono ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu ebu sita sɛ atrɔ ní kaŋupoa bimbi ʋe aʋa a. Lɛ kede e, Yesu atrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa lɛ eʋi ye si, “Wɔmɔ kiditɔ na a?”
24Onyimee efeke yɛ aŋu na lɛ ebú isu ya onu si, “Ee, mɛɛmɔ banima; pɔ̀ balɛ ŋwisi ise ko gi iga ɛza kinɛ ɛ.”
25Lɛ Yesu atrɔ awla la ní kaŋupoa bimbi ʋe aʋa dzɛ ɛ. Able kɔ onyimee edu yɛ aŋu na ke, lɛ yɛ bimbi ʋe bidra a, nite me si amɔ kidɔ kakaa tsrà a. 26Lɛ Yesu akpɛ yɛ kude si ɔtrɛ kepea ni ɔsã si “Kúdzitrɛ ní kamamia mɛ ɛ!”
Petro adra Yesu su
27Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛɛtrɛ ní kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kulɛ ní Kaisarea Filipi ɔma nɔ su mɛ ɛ. Lɛ eʋi ba ní kudeo me si, “Mlasi mɛ; nyaŋwɛ banima bizedo si, mɛ menu u?”
28Bebu le onu si, “Banɔ batɔ si wɔ wonu Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ. Banɔ batɔ fɛ si wɔ wonu Eliya, lɛ banɔ dzedze batɔ fɛ si Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ tole ɔtɔ wonu u.”
29Lɛ eʋi ba dzɛ si, “Mlɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ mlɛɛsɛ si menu u?”
Petro ebu le onu si, “Wɔ wonu Kristo ye.”
30Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si, “Mlakípani liboe lɛ ya ní mɛ su isi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ!”
Yesu apani ní yɛ kutseo su u
31Lɛ Yesu ekpese yɛ badɔkpasi ba bidɔ kubasɛ si, “Lilɛ si, Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye, ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle. Lɛ banɔtsitsi ba, Kusumu yo baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biadzi kede yɛ su u. Lɛ biaye ye, pɔ̀ ní ewe tata kede e, ayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.” 32Adra liboe le me asi ba. Lɛ loso Petro ebu ye kuka lɛ ekpese ye kutɛnɔ ɛ. 33Pɔ̀ Yesu ekyi edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba, lɛ aka aŋu mɛ aki Petro si, “Satana, titrɛ ní mɛ su! Wɔ begyodi ʋa bádɔ Aya kɔ ɔ; kisugya mɛ begyodi ba klɔ!”
34Lɛ Yesu axwa ɔnɔha lɔ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba amanɔ ní yɛ isu ya su lɛ asi ba si, “Xegi ɔnutɔ apɛ si yiku ni mɛ kude e, lilɛ si odze yɛ isu ya liboe, otu yɛ osetsase lo tɔ ɔga aze ni mɛ kude e. 35Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ligbã nɛ lialila ɛ, ní mɛ litukpo loo ní Liboe Gbã nɛ litukpo e, aaze ligbã. 36Libi woli liaze lɛ mɛ ɛki ɔnɔ, xegi kelea mɛ bidɔ mɛ petee biadzi yɛ binɛ ɛ, pɔ aalila yɛ Esobo la na a? 37loo ege ɔnɔ aakɔ̀ atsrɛ yɛ Esobo la na? 38Xegi ɔnutɔ ese kuye ní mɛ su aloo ní mɛ liboe le su ní kele zimizia lia ya mɛ gi béte Aya ɛ, kɔ Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye fɛ, aase kuye ní yɛ su xegi aba ní yɛ Ka kusudra mɛ ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba ɛ.”

Title: MAK 9
Content:
1Lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa lɛ apani si, “Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banɔ batɔ gi balɛ ní ya ɛ, batrátse kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi biamɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa gi keplee edɔ ni kigaglaɛ ɛ.”
Aya ebu Yesu yɛ kusudraa abasɛ
2Ewe teglo kede e, Yesu agbani Petro, Yakobo ni Yohanes evu lɛ bɛtrɛ ní lito gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ aʋa a; ba tete dzaa. Agi bezeedi ye e, bɛmɔ si Yesu kilɛlɛɛ mɛ kikyi. 3Yɛ awu la edzi pititi gi eze ŋle; nite si kesea aʋa ɔsaplo ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani kididɔ kuplo xe kiaxwa nite e. 4Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba bɛmɔ Eliya ni Mose gi bɛzɛɛpani ni Yesu i. 5Lɛ Petro asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, lipɛ koŋ si kwikpɛ likpɔ ní niya! Ki tɔ kuwa basa kugbaʋi tuta; tile kí wɔ, tile kí Mose ani tile kí Eliya.” 6Lifu liku ba niteme si béte liboe lɛ gi biapani i.
7Lɛ liplɛ ɛtɔ lido xe liwe ba aʋa ni lɛ kuyeo e. Ko lɛ benu ole ɔtɔ ní liplɛ lɛ mɛ si, “Mobi ye gi malɔ ɛ, yɛ iliɛ ya. Mlata yɛ kutu.” 8Bedi iklanɔ kyɔŋ, pɔ̀ bámɔ ɔnɔnɔ tɔ ɔ sani Yesu ni ba tete ko.
9Agi bɛtrɛ eple e, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla aki ba si, “Kidiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, mlakipani ní kɛ su isi ɔnɔnɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ.”
10Badɔkpasi ba bɛbitɛ ní Yesu ɔsã nɔ aʋa. Pɔ̀ ní ba tete kusi i, bezegyo eboe la kudi si, “Kuyɔyɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, lɛ pɔ̀ lɛ ese si kitɛ ɛ?” 11Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Ege lɛ loso Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛpani si, Eliya lilɛ si otu kuba na a?”
12Yesu ebu le onu si, “Li lɛ mɛ si Eliya yɛ aatu kuba tɔ aalulɔ kidɔ kakaa plɛ. Pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso bɛŋwlimi iplɛ si, Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye aamɔ ɔziã glegle lɛ batrázɛ yɛ na a? 13Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Eliya aba kooko, pɔ̀ banima bɛbitɛ ba kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛyurɔ yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi iplɛ ní yɛ su ní Aya yɛ liboe le me kinɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ayɔni ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ mɛ gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze e
14Agi Yesu ni badɔkpasi tiata ba beple edɔ ɔ xe bɛba ɛtsani badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba ɛ, bɛmɔ si linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liklani ba. Niteme si Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛzɛŋwlɛ eboe ni badɔkpasi ba. 15Kiliɛ gi linɔkpi le pɔ́ limɔ Yesu ko e, libitɛ lɛ onugutsetse; lɛ bese trɛ ní yɛ klɔ xe bɛpani yɛ ɛ. 16Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege su mlɛŋwlɛ eboe la nì ba ɛ?”
17Onyime ɔtɔ ní linɔkpi le kusi ebu le onu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mɛ mamani mɛ obinyimee ní wɔ klɔ, lɛ ese linu si ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ, gi ɛɛki si ɔ́ʋitani kunugu yo fɛ kugu u. 18Lipoe kakaa gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛdɔ ní yɛ aʋa ɛ, izɛŋwia yɛ ɛplɛ ní kesea; kɔ ɔfɔ lɔ eedo ní yɛ onu i; kɔ ɛɛta yɛ ene na ɛ; kɔ yɛ ɔnɔse lo ɛlia ɛ. Niteme si meʋi adɔ ní wɔ badɔkpasi ba awla si bakpikpinì ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no kudono ní yɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ bátanɔ ɔ.”
19“Oo! Kitɛ xe kumɔziŋaa kulɛ mlɔ omono kelea lia ya te e?” “Lɛ kɔzɛna ni lipoe woli unu mlɛpɛ si mize ní mlɔ su u? Lɛ kɔzɛna ni lipoe woli te onu maabasɛ mlɔ bidɔ kudu u? Mlagbani ɔnuvɔɛ amani mɛ!” 20Lɛ bɛgbani yɛ ɛmani Yesu i.
Gi ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛmɔ Yesu ko e, ɛŋwia ɔnuvɔɛ sa kesea. Niteme si emli aklanɔ ní kesea, lɛ ɔfɔ lɔ fɛ ɛzedo ní yɛ onu i. 21Lɛ Yesu eʋi ɔnuvɔɛ yɛka si, “Lipoe woli onu kizezee liɛ mɛ kiku ní yɛ su u?”
Ebu le onu si, “Dɔni yɛ kunuvɔɔ mɛ ke.” 22“Epoe glegle, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no izɛɛpɛ si loeye ɔnuvɔɛ, niteme si izɛŋwia yɛ kpɛ kifu ni kuni me. Lɛ loso e, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, di blɔ asigaga tɔ pɔni blɔ xegi wɔatanɔ ɛ!”
23Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ee maatanɔ. Kidɔ kakaa kiaba kɛ mɛ ɔki ɔniliɛ awla gi kuziŋa kulɛ ɛ.”
24Lɛ obika yɛ akpɛ ozi kyɔŋ si, “Kuziŋa kulɛ me awla, pɔ̀ kúsrɛ ɛ. Pɔni mɛ tɔ kusrɛ!”
25Agi Yesu amɔ egyesi si linɔkpi le lizeetipɔni ba ɛ, akpɛ ɔsã aki ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no si, “Wɔ kutoku ni omúmu ɔfuɛfuɛ, makpɛ ɔsã aki wɔ si, doza ní ɔnuvɔɛ mɛ lɛ wukídzi batiku ní yɛ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.”
26Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛkpɛ ozi gagla lɛ edugu ɔnuvɔɛ, xe edo eza yɛ mɛ ɛ. Ɔnuvɔɛ afɛ ŋwisi okpo kinɛ. Niteme si ɔnɔ kakaa azeedo si, “Ɔnuvɔɛ etse!” 27Pɔ̀ Yesu evu ɔnuvɔɛ yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ apɔni yɛ xe ayɔ ɔlɛ ɛ.
28Lɛ kede agi Yesu edzi atrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye ní kikpokpo me si, “Ege lɛ loso kútani ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ kukpikpini dono na a?”
29Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ lɔ ya elu i, Aya kuxwaxwa ko kwiata ni lɔ kukpikpini dono o. Kidɔ dzedze kakaa elu kítratanɔ ɔ.”
Yesu apani ní yɛ kutseo su dzɛ
30Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ níklɔ ɛ, bɛga Galilea ɛza. Yesu ɔ́pɛ si ɔnɔnɔ ote niklɔ gi yɛ ɔkpasi i; 31lɛ ese linu si azɛɛbasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bidɔ si: “Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye e, biabu ye kukɔ kí banama gi biaye ye e. Pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
32Pɔ̀ badɔkpasi ba bénu bidɔ mɛ gi abasɛ ba ese e, lɛ lifu ne fɛ lize ba mɛ ní kiliɛ gi biaʋi ye le ese e.
Ɔniliɛ gi yɛ asa keme e
33Lɛ kede e, bɛba Kapernaum; lɛ gi beti eku kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Liboe woli mlɛzɛŋwlɛ ní kudeo me e?”
34Pɔ̀ bébu le onu u, lɛ ese linu si bɛzɛŋwlɛ eboe ní ba tsali kusi ní kudeo me tɔ béte bamɛ iliɛ gi yɛ asa kukeme e. 35Agi Yesu eze kesea ɛ, axwa yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba; lɛ asi ba si, “Mlɔ mɛ iliɛ gi apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu yɛ ɛ, ɔkɔ isu ya kpɛ ní ɔgɔgɔ klɔ, tɔ oze mlɔ pɔ́ mlɔ osumusumu ye e.” 36Lɛ akɔ ɔnuvɔ ɔtɔ amanɔ ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ. Agi akpɛ awla yɛ ole lo e, agba ba si, 37“Ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ gi aazɛ banuvɔ ba ya elu ba mɛ tole ní mɛ linyi ne me e, mɛ azɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ gi azɛ mɛ ɛ, aní mɛ tete azɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ azɛ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ fɛ ɛ.”
Ɔniɛ klɔ gi ɔ́yɔ kedu ní blɔ su i, onu blɔ ɔnɛ
38Lɛ Yohanes asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwimɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi azɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní wɔ linyi ne me e, lɛ kwisi yɛ si ɔmɔni, lɛ ese linu si ónu blɔ mɛ tole e.”
39Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakitsi kudeo onu akí yɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani enugutseboe kubitɛ ní mɛ linyi ne me xe lɛ kede e, aapani eboe zimizi kuyurɔ mɛ ɛ.” 40Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́yɔ kedu ní blɔ su i, onu blɔ ɔnɔ. 41Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi aaki mlɔ kuni kepliʋi tiele si mlaŋwɛ gi mlenu mɛ banɔ loso e, aazi yɛ liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kikaka elu ye.
Kufekedi ki Eboe zimizi
42Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Xegi ɔnutɔ aaki si banuvɔ ba ya ba mɛ ɔtɔ aalila yɛ kuziŋaa ní mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, xe aabitɛ eboe zimizi i, liapɛ kí ɔniliɛ klɔ sanɔ xegi bɛka kuhɔ ʋidi ní yɛ ole e, xe bɛkɔ yɛ ŋwia ɛkpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ. 43Lɛ loso xegi wɔ ɔwla lɔ aaki si wɔabitɛ liboe zimizi i, tsa lɔ tuʋe! Liapɛ ki wɔ si wɔatiku ní ligbãmoblo le me nì ɔwla tole sani si iwla tiʋa ize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e. 44Niklɔ asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba ɛ, eʋitsé liwewe e, lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋíni liwewe e. 45Lɛ xegi wɔ ɔkli lɔ aaki si wɔabitɛ liboe zimizi i, tsa lɔ tuʋe. Liapɛ ɛki wɔ si wɔatiku ligbãmoblo le me ni ɔkli tole sani si ikli tiʋa ize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e. 46Níklɔ asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba ɛ, eʋitsé liwewe e, lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋini liwewe e. 47Lɛ xegi wɔ kimbi ye kiaki si wɔabitɛ eboe zimizi i, kpaʋi kɛ tuʋe! Liapɛ ɛki wɔ si wɔatiku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ni kimbi tile sani si bimbi tuʋa bize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e. 48Niklɔ ʋa ɛ, asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba eʋitsé liwewe e; lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋini liwewe e.
49“Lɛ kiliɛ gi bizɛkpɛ kiŋaŋaɛ kumɔ ɔ si kikízizi kinɛ ɛ, nite ke bɛtrákɔ kifu yɛ mɛ ɔzia nɔ ɛbla banama gi bɛtrátiku kifumoni ye me e.
50“Kumɔɔ ɛ, kidɔ gbã kùnu u. Pɔ̀ xegi kɔ ɔgyi nɔ eblo e, kitɛ mlabitɛ xe ɔgyi nɔ aaku kɔ su dzɛ ɛ?
“Lɛ loso e, mlaki tɔ kulɔlɔ kuze ní mlɔ kusi ŋwisi kumɔɔ ɔgyi nɔ kinɛ ɛ; atɔ mleze ní kusuyɔ mɛ ni mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba a.”

Title: MAK 10
Content:
Yesu abasɛ bidɔ ní onyime ni yedze ba ahanuglɔ ba kugbegbe su
1Agi Yesu asɛ ní klɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní Yudea kesea mɛ, lɛ atsa Yordan onipe lo e. Anɔkpi la ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní yɛ su dzɛ, lɛ abasi ba bidɔ mɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi azɛɛbitɛ lipoe kakaa kinɛ ɛ.
2Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba yɛ klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ si bɛ́punu yɛ ɛ. Beʋi Yesu si, “Si blɔ, dani ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si wɔatani wodze kugbe na a?”
3Yesu ebu le onu ni kuʋíʋi si, “Ɔsã woli Mose aki mlɔ ɔ?”
4Lɛ ba fɛ bebu le onu si, “Mose aki kude si onyime ɔŋwlimi kegbegbeplekpa tɔ ɔkikɔ kutete si yɛyurɔ ye dze, tɔ ɔyurɔ yɛ.”
5Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mose aki mlɔ ɔsãa nɔ ya lɛ ese linu si mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ilɛ gagla. 6Pɔ̀ ní okpese klɔ ní kelea ɔbitɛ klɔ ɛ, ‘Aya abitɛ ba onyime ni ɔdzɛ.’ 7‘Lɛ klɔ ʋa loso e, onyime aasɛ ní yɛka ni yene su lɛ aakpɛ likpɔ ni ye dze e, 8kɔ ba tiaʋa bedzi kidɔ tile!’ Lɛ loso e, bénu banɔ tiaʋa tɔɔ ɔ, bedzi kisugya tile. 9Niteme si kidiliɛ gi Aya akpɛ likpɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔkilɛ kɛ mɛ ɛ.”
10Agi bedzitrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye liboe le ese. 11Ebu le onu akí ba si, “Onyime liɛ klɔ gi aagbe yedze e, xe aagbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, awa kihasi ayurɔ yedze. 12Lɛ niteme ke ɔdzɛ liɛ klɔ gi aagbe yenye e xe aazeni onyime dzedze e, awa kihasi ayurɔ yenye.”
Yesu akrira banuvɔ ba
13Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ batɔ bɛmani banuvɔ ba ní Yesu klɔ si ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa; pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛnyra ni ba. 14Agi Yesu amɔ ba kibitɛ ɛ, amɔ kusuyeʋi ni ba, lɛ asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔ klɔ; lɛ mlakítsi kudeo nu aki ba a. Lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, banama gi balɛ ŋwisi banuvɔ ba ya elu i, ba kanɛ kenu. 15Mɛɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ kinɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratiku ka mɛ liwewe e.” 16Lɛ gi efeke banuvɔ ba ɛ, atrɔ awla ní ɔkakaa aʋa lɛ akrira ba petee e.
Ɔyasɔʋi oxonetee
17Agi Yesu eku kudeo me dzɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ ese atsani yɛ lɛ edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea ní yɛ ketu ya, lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ gbã ɛ, ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbãmoblo le na a?”
18Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔɛxwa mɛ si ɔgbã a?” “Ɔnɔnɔ ónu ɔgbã asani Aya tete ko. 19Wote Aya isã nɛ: ‘Wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukíwa kihasi i; wukízuru u; wukísɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔnɔ awla a; wukími ɔnɔnɔ ɛkpɛ kese tɔ zi yɛ kidɔ ɔ; kpɛ kubùbù ní wɔka ni wone su.’ ”
20Onyimee ebu le onu dzɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, dɔni mɛ kunuvɔ mɛ ké mɛɛbitɛ ní isã nɛ pɔ́ aʋa a.”
21Lɛ Yesu edu aŋu na ní yɛ aʋa ni kulɔlɔ, lɛ apani si, “Kidɔ tile ko kiziã si bitɛ ɛ. Trɛ zɛɛda kidɔ kakaa gi kilɛ ní wɔ awla tɔ kɔ kibɔɛ kí bazianete ba, tɔ wɔamɔ exo la ní lifunu ne; lɛ kede e, ba tɔ gaze ni mɛ kude.” 22Agi onyimee enu liboe le e, ayrɔ lɛ asɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu u.
23Agi Yesu edi aklanɔ ɛ, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Liaze e gagla kí bexonete ba si biati uku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!”
24Liboe le litu badɔkpasi ba kugyɔ, pɔ̀ Yesu atrɛ ní liboe le aʋa si, “Mɛ bebi ba! Liaze gagla xe ɔnɔ aatani kutiku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!” 25Edo apɔnɔ si, “liaze gagla ki oxonete si oti oku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ sani ki kposɔɛ si ɔga abui ye liwu le me kudo o!”
26Liboe le gi apani i, liwa axwɛ ní yɛ badɔkpasi ba aʋa, lɛ beʋi bahanuglɔ ba si, “Kɔ nyaŋwɛ koŋ aatani kubúbú kumɔ ɛ?”
27Yesu edu aŋu na ní ba aʋa lɛ ebu le onu si, “Lítratani lɛ mɛ kuba ní banima klɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ liboe kakaa lilɛ plɔplɔ ɛki Aya xunyɔ ɔ.”
28Lɛ Petro asi yɛ si “Di kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa, lɛ kwikuni wɔ kude e!”
29Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Nite lilɛ, lɛ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi asɛ yɛ kepea, xe ayurɔ yeneminyime, loo yenemidzɛ, loo yene, loo yɛka, loo yɛ bebi ba, aloo yɛ inyrɔ nɛ, kɔkpɛ mɛ ni liboe gbã nɛ loso e, 30ɔniliɛ klɔ aazi bidɔ glegle sanɔ ní abla kelea mɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ klɔ aazi beneminyime, benemidzɛ, bene, bebi ni inyrɔ ede alafa kɔpɔni keduyɔyɔ ɔ. Lɛ ní kele vuvu kaklɔ gi kɛtraba mɛ ɛ, aazi ligbãmoblo le. 31Pɔ̀ banɔ glegle gi benu batɔpu abla ɛ, biadzi banɔ gɔgɔ ɔ; lɛ banɔ glegle gi benu banɔ gɔgɔ ba abla ɛ, biadzi banɔ tɔpu u.”
Yesu Apani ní yɛ Kutseo su Kutanɛ
32Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní kudeo aʋa a, xe bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem i, Yesu etu ɔtɔ aki ba. Liboe le litu yɛ badɔkpasi ba kugyɔ, lɛ banama gi beze ní ba kedea fɛ ɛ, lifu ne lizeku ba. Yesu ebu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka dzɛ ní kudeo aʋa. Lɛ asi ba eboa la gi ɛtraba yɛ aʋa ɛ. 33Asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwitrɛ ní Yerusalem. Niklɔ biabu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukɔ kí kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba. Biatsa kutse pia ɔki yɛ; kɔ bɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ awla ɛki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma ɛ. 34Biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa; biabu sita bali yɛ aʋa; biakusi ye gɔgɔ ɛ, kɔ beye ye. Pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Yakobo ni Yohanes beʋi izekɔ ʋidi iki isu
35Yakobo ni Yohanes, gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ ɔ. Lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kidiitɔ kilɛ gi kwipɛ si bitɛ ki blɔ ɛ.”
36Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki mlɔ ɛ?”
37Bebú le onu si, “Xegi wodi ní wɔ likusigbo le aʋa ní wɔ kukusi dradra mɛ ɛ, kwipɛ si ki kuze ní wɔ su: blɔ mɛ tole oze ní wɔ kaŋaa mɛ, tɔ ɔnɔ ʋlaɛ oze ní wɔ kabaa mɛ.”
38Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mléte kidi liɛ gi kɛ mleeʋi i. Kuyeʋiyeʋi yo kepliʋia lia gi matraŋwɛ ɛ, mlaatani ka kuŋwɛ na a? Lɛ kuni yo gi lilɛ si bakpɛ aki mɛ ɛ, mlaatani kɔ kukpɛ na a?”
39Lɛ bebu le onu si, “Kwiatanɔ.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Kepliʋia lia gi matraŋwɛ ɛ, mlaaŋwɛ ka baa, lɛ kiliɛ gi biakpɛ kuni yo ki mɛ fɛ ɛ, mlaakpɛ kɔ. 40Pɔ̀ kudeo onu kúma si mɛ mibu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aaze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ loo ní mɛ kabaa mɛ ɛ. Aya abla izekɔɛ lɛ klɔ aki banɔ baklɔ gi akya ɛ.”
41Agi yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ liɔfɔ gɔgɔ ba benu liboe le e, bɛmɔ kusuyeʋio ní Yakobo ni Yohanes su u. 42Lɛ Yesu axwa ba pɔ́ akpɛ likpɔ ní isu ya a, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlete si banɔ baklɔ gi bizeebù si ba benu baʋaŋa ba akí babubitɛ ba ɛ, kigagla kilɛ ba awla ní ba aʋa, nite si baʋaŋa ba bizemi babubitɛ ba ɛkpɛ kesea ni kusufeke e. 43Pɔ̀ lima si lize nite ní mlɔ kusi i. Xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔnɔ ʋidi i, oze ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔki banɔ gɔgɔ ba. 44Lɛ xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu yɛ ɛ, lilɛ si oze mlɔ petee mlɔ ɔnɔ sumu ye. 45Lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ɔ́ba si tɔ besumu ye e. Boŋu i, kiba aba si yisumu tɔ yikɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛkɔ tɔ yibu banɔ glegle.”
Yesu ayɔ ni Bartimeo Kaŋupoa
46Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yerixo. Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ beze do ni ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ, kaŋupo ɔdɔʋi Timeo Yebi ye Batimeo azeeʋi bidɔ ní kudeo su u. 47Agi enu si Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ azɛɛza ɛ, ekpese ozi kukpɛ si, “Yesu! Dawid lipo me obi ye, di mɛ asigaga!”
48Banɔ glegle bɛka yɛ aŋu mɛ si ɔgɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀ akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa sani kutɔpu yɔ si, “Dawid lipo me obi ye, di mɛ asigaga!”
49Lɛ Yesu atɔ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlaxwa yɛ aki mɛ!”
Lɛ loso bɛxwa kaŋupoa, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Mɔ ɔna! Yɔ lɛ ɛ! Yesu yɛ ɛɛxwa wɔ ɔ!”
50Nite si Batimeo ebu yɛ liwu le etu eʋe, ayɔ lixu le, lɛ aba Yesu klɔ ɛ.
51Lɛ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege wɔɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki wɔ ɛ?”
Kaŋupoa kebu le onu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mapɛ si mimɔ dzɛ.”
52Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ga trɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔ nì wɔ ɔ!”
Lɛ onu klɔ koe ekpese bidɔ kumɔ. Nite si ekuni Yesu kude ní kudeo aʋa.

Title: MAK 11
Content:
Yesu eti eku Yerusalem ní Kuʋaŋa mɛ
1Agi beti ipɔni Yerusalem, xe beku Betania ni Betfage ní Olif ye lito le su i, Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tiaʋa ní ɔtɔ nɔ 2ni kutrɔtrɔ si, “Mlatrɛ ní kamamia lia klɔ gi kalɛ ní mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Xegi mlezekui i, mlaamɔ tedzi obi gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trɔ yɛ aʋa ʋídi gi ɔkpasi ní ohwi lo me e. Mleble ye amani mɛ ní ya. 3Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ eʋi mlo si ege lɛ loso mleeble ye na ɛ, mlasi ɔniliɛ klɔ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ; lɛ aadzi ni ye kumanɔ kpekpemi i.’”
4Agi bɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ tedzi obi ye ní ablɔ yɛ su kepe atɔ kevunu ya. Lɛ gi bezeeble ye e, 5banɔ batɔ gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ ɛ, beʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mleeble tedzi ye e?”
6Bebu le onu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ. Niteme si banɔ baklɔ ba bɛki ba kudeo. 7Agi bɛmani tedzi obi ye e, ní Yesu klɔ ɛ, bebu ba ewu la ɛtrɔ ní ɔgaɛ aʋa, lɛ Yesu emu atrɔ ɛ. 8Banɔ glegle bene ba ewu la ɛplɛ ní kudeo me, lɛ banɔ batɔ fɛ bɛtsa eseya la ɛplɛ ɛ. 9Banɔ ba klɔ gi beze ní ɔtɔ nɔ nì kedea pɔ́ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Hosana! Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ klɔ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ linyine me e! 10Aya ɔkrira blɔ Ɔkatsitsi ye Dawid yɛ kaʋaŋaa gi kɛtraba ɛ. Hosana ní lifunu ne hwii.”
11Gi Yesu eku Yerusalem i, atrɛ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ edi kidɔ kakaa aklanɔ ɛ. Pɔ̀, agi kelea keeblo onu i, asɛ atrɛ ní Betania ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba.
Yesu exo ifi akpɛ ogbose lo
12Gi kelea kɛti xe bɛsɛ ní Betania ɛ, kuʋɛ kwiku Yesu. 13Lɛ gi amɔ ogbose ɔtɔ gi awlakpa la eze ní lɔ aʋa atsisi ní ɔdzage no e, eti apɔni lɔ ni kugyodi si yɛ amɔ lisebi itɔ ní lɔ mɛ na a. Pɔ̀ gi adzɛ ɛ, awlakpa la tètè ko amɔ, lɛ ese linu si ogbose lo liyopoe le liʋí na a. 14Lɛ Yesu asi ogbose lo si, “Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́traŋa lisebi dɔni wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ!”
Niteme si yɛ badɔkpasi ba benu liboe lɛ gi apani i.
Yesu akpikpini badɔda ba ebu ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ
15Agi bezeeku Yerusalem pɔ́ ɛ, Yesu eti eku ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ; lɛ ekpese badɔda ba ni badɔdzi ba pɔ́ kukpikpini dono e. Lɛ etutru babɔtsrɛ ba ba ikplɔ nɛ ni abronuma ʋa badàdà ba egbo la eʋe e. 16Lɛ ɔ́ki kude si ɔnɔnɔ ɔkɔ bidɔdada tɔtɔ gani Kesumupea mɛ ɛ. 17Lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Aya yɛ Liboe le me si, ‘Biaxwa Mɛ kepea mɛ si kelea mɛ banima petee ba Aya ɔxwakɔ.’ Pɔ̀ lɛ mlekyi niklɔ edzì beze ba okpokɔ ɛ!”
18Agi kusɔliɔ baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba benu liboe le e, bekpese kugyodi kiliɛ gi biamɔ kude kutɔ onu u, xe biaye Yesu i. Pɔ̀ bezeese ye e, lɛ ese linu si linɔkpi le pɔ́ lɛ inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su u.
19Gi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ.
Kudɔkpasi ní ogbose tsetse lo ni kuziŋa su
20Keletitia livlɛ lɛ gi beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ; bɛmɔ si ogbose lo etse etsinɔ ní lɔ igu ne me ke. 21Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi liba lɛ mɛ aʋa ɛ; lɛ asi Yesu si, “Di! Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, ogbose lo gi woxo ifi le ɔkpɛ ɛ, etse!”
22Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlazi Aya aʋa ŋa.” 23“Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi aasi ketokpaa lia ya si, ‘kakpaʋi tɔ kazɛŋwia isu ya akpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ,’ xe azɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, si liboe lɛ gi yɛ apani liaba lɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ, lianyaba lɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ. 24Lɛ loso e mɛɛsi mlɔ si: xe mlɛxwa Aya a, xe mleʋi yɛ kiditɔ ɛ, mlazi lɛ aʋa aŋa si mlɛzi kɛ. Nite si kidɔ kakaa gi mleʋi Aya ɛ, akɔ kɛ ɔki mlɔ. 25Lɛ xegi mlalɛɛ si mlɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlakɔ liboe kakaa gi mlevu i kpɛ ní ɔna mɛ aki ɔnɔ kakaa ɛ, kukɔkyɛ yɛ, tɔ mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne fɛ ɛ, aakɔ̀ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ mlɔ. 26Pɔ̀ xegi mlákɔ akyɛ ɛ, mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne fɛ ɛ, ɔ́trakɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ mlɔ ɔ.”
Eboe Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ ní Yesu yɛ kigaglaɛ kɛ ɔdɔkɔ su
27Lɛ kede e, bedzi ba Yerusalem. Gi Yesu azaaklanɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, kusɔliɔ baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ. 28Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Kigagla woli wɔmɔ ɔ, xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kudeo o?”
29Yesu ebu le onu si, “Matraʋi mlo liboe tile. Xegi mlebu le onu i, mɛ fɛ maasi mlɔ niklɔ gi mɛ kigaglaɛ kidɔ ɔ, xe mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu i. 30Mlasi mɛ, nifɔ Yohanes amɔ kigaglaɛ adɔ nɔ xe azɛakpɛ kuni yo aki banima na a? Aya klɔ loo, banima klɔ na a?”
31Niklɔ kyɔŋ ɛ, kuboehe kwiku ní ba kusi. Lɛ bɛpani si, “Xe kwibu le onu si kigaglaɛ kidɔ ní Aya klɔ ɛ, aaʋi blo si kɔ lɔ, ege lɛ loso kúzi Yohanes aʋa ɛɛŋa na a? 32Pɔ̀ xe kwibu le onu si Kigaglaɛ liɛ klɔ kidɔ ní banima kɔ ɛ, bezeese banima.” Lɛ ese linu si bɛzeese banima ní kiliɛ mɛ gi ɔnɔ kakaa azɛ lɛ si Yohanes anya eze Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ onu i. 33Niteme si bebú le onu ki Yesu si, “Kúte e.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛ fɛ matrasi mlɔ niklɔ gi mɛ kigaglaɛ kidɔ ɔ, xe mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u.”

Title: MAK 12
Content:
Yesu ebu abee ní wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidiatɔ su
1Lɛ Yesu abasɛ ba bidɔ mɛ gani abee ʋa mɛ si: “Liba lɛ mɛ si onyime ɔtɔ awa wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ, lɛ akpɛ kuka aklani lɔ ɛ. Lɛ etu lizokpo fɛ aki wain yɛ ebi la kukaka ɛ. Lɛ awa ɔnyrɔ nɔ lipegba gyɔ́gyɔɛtɔ fɛ ɛ. Niteme si akɔ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ awla aki apaa banyrɔmɛdzɛ batɔ, lɛ aga kude e. 2Agi wain yɛ ligúpoe le lina ɛ, atsisi yɛ ɔnɔsumu ɔtɔ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ si ɔzɛ yɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔmani yɛ. 3Pɔ̀ gi ɔnɔsumu ye adzɛ ɛ, ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bevu ye kusi, lɛ bɛkpikpini yɛ ɛtsisi ni iwla pluplu i. 4Lɛ kede e, ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu dzedze ní ba klɔ. Bɛsa yɛ bidɔ ní litukpo le lɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kuyeo e. 5Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee atsisi onɔsumu dzedze dzɛ, lɛ beye ye e. Nite ke bɛbitɛ banɔ glegle atɔ gi akpɛ ɛ, bekusi batɔ, lɛ beye batɔ fɛ ɛ. 6Ɔnɔ tole kpoo gi agɔ ɔ gi biakpɛ dzɛ ɛ, yɛ eze ɔkaɛ ɔtutɔ lɔ yebinyime gi alɔ ɛ. Gɔgɔɛ atsisi yebinyimee ní ba klɔ ni kugyodi si, ‘biabu yebinyimee.’
7“Pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, ‘Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee Yebi ye iliɛ. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye tɔ yɛ kaŋasea kiadzi blɔ kanɛ.’ 8Nite si bɛsɔ́li obinyimee, lɛ beye ye e, lɛ bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ kedea ɛ.
9“Ege mlegyo edi si ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aabitɛ ɛ? Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aaba ye ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ aaye ba, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze awla ɛ. 10Lilí lɛ mɛ si mlɛkla ní Aya liboe le me si,
“ ‘Likla ɛlɛ klɔ gi beglitrɔ ba bebu iʋe si lípɛ ɛ,
lɛ liba edzi ogó no aʋa likla veve le.
11Ɔkaɛ Aya yɛ abitɛ lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ linu linugutseboe ʋidi ní blɔ aŋu mɛ!’ ”
12Lɛ Yudanɛ ma baka ba bɛpɛ si bévu Yesu u, lɛ ese linu si betè si basu ebu abee liɛ klɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ gi bezese linɔkpi le onu i, bɛyurɔ yɛ, lɛ bɛsɛ ɛ.
Beʋi Yesu eboe ní Kagyɔa Kutsatsa su u
13Lɛ kede e bɛkpɛ Farisianɛ batɔ ni Okusi ye Herodes baʋatrɔ batɔ ní Yesu klɔ tɔ bapunu yɛ gani beʋiʋi me. 14Agi bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite si wuzɛɛpani anukwarɛɛ, lɛ wɔʋíkɔ banima begyodi ʋa kɔwa lixwɛxwɛ ɛ. Woʋidi ɔnɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, lɛ woʋigyo ba izekɔ odi xe wuzɛɛpani i. Pɔ̀ wuzɛɛbasɛ banima anukwarɛ liɛ gi onu Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ ɛ. Lɛ loso e, kwipɛ si kúte xe liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su si, kutsá kagyɔ ɔki Kaisaro o? Ligyeno si kutsa kagyɔa loo kukítsa na a?”
15Pɔ̀ Yesu amɔ ba ɔdaye lo, lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mleekeni idi si mlɛpunu mɛ ɛ? Mlamani mɛ kibɔ kitɔ tɔ midi.”
16Agi bɛkɔ kibɔɛ ɛki yɛ ɛ, eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ litukpo ni linyi bitini ní kibɔɛ aʋa a?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kaisaro.”
17Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔlɔ mlakɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Kaisaro kiniɛ mlakɔ kɛ aki Kaisaro, tɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Aya kiniɛ ɛ, mlakɔ kɛ aki Aya.”
Niteme si litu ba kugyɔ.
Yesu abasɛ bidɔ ní Kuyɔyɔ dɔni Bekpo ʋa mɛ su
18Lɛ Zadukianɛ ma gi bázɛ kuyɔyɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ aʋa aŋa ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, 19“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose aŋwlimi ɔsã nɔ ya aki blɔ si, xegi onyime etse ní yedze su u pɔ̀ bápɔ gi obi ɔtɔtɔ ɛ, onyime liɛ klɔ yɛ oneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi ba ní okpo ye yɛ linyi ne me. 20Liba lɛ mɛ si, beneminyime tiegloele beze; otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ, pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ obi xe etse e. 21Lɛ ɔʋlaɛ agbani ɔdzɛɛ pɔ̀ yɛ fɛ ɔ́pɔ obi ɔtɔtɔ, xe yɛ fɛ etse e. Nite ke liba lɛ mɛ ɛki onemi tanɛɛ fɛ, 22ni bagɔgɔ ba pɔ́: niteme si ba beneminyime tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani ɔdzɛ liɛ klɔ xe betse e, pɔ̀ bamɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́pɔ obi i. Gɔgɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛɛ fɛ aba etse e. 23Lɛ xegi bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ ɛdɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní liyɔwe le aʋa ɛ, nyaŋwɛ yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze e? Gi ba banɔ tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani ɔdzɛɛ edi.”
24Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mlɛta kese kura! Mlete kidiliɛ loso o? Lɛ ese linu si, mlénu Aya yɛ Liboe le ni Aya yɛ kigaglaɛ ese e. 25Xegi bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ ɛ, biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ niklɔ ɛ, kudzɛgbanɔ kúma a. 26Abla ní bekpo ʋa kuyɔyɔɔ su i, kɔ mlákla liboeboe ní Mose keplekpaa mɛ ní ose lo gi ɛɛsɔ lɔ su iʋidi na a? Niklɔ Mose aŋwlimi aplɛ si, Aya asi yɛ si, ‘Mɛ menu Abraham yɛ Aya, Isak yɛ Aya ni Yakob yɛ Aya.’ 27Yɛ onu Aya ki banama gi balɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, lɛ aní ki bekpo ʋa a. Mlɛta kese koŋ!”
Yesu abasɛ bidɔ ní ɔsã ʋidi no su u
28Ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ɔtɔ eze ní niklɔ lɛ enu eboa la gi bezevu edi i. Gi amɔ si Yesu ebu eboe la onu mɔmɔmɔ aki Zadukianɛ ma ɛ, eti apɔni yɛ lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔsã woli ɛsaɛ veve ní isã nɛ kusi na a?”
29Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔsãa nɔ gi ɛsaɛ veve petee, lɔ onu si, ‘Israel, ta kutu! Ɔkaɛ gi onu blɔ Aya ɛ, Ɔka tole ko onu. 30Lɛ loso e, lɔ Ɔkaɛ Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee, ni wɔ esobo la petee, ni wɔ kugyodi yo petee ni wɔ isu ya mɛ kigaglaɛ petee.’ 31Ɔsã ʋla lɔ gi ɛgbani lɔ ɛkpɛ ɛ, lɔ onu si: ‘Lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.’ Ɔsã ɔtɔtɔ ɔma kunyipu isani isã tiʋa ɛlɛ ya a.”
32Lɛ Ɔsã nɔ Ɔdabasɛ yɛ asi Yesu si, “Wɔpani mumɔ, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Nite ɖii lilɛ si Ɔkaɛ ko onu Aya, lɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́ma sani yɛ ɛ. 33Lɛ tɔ lɔ Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee e, ni wɔ kugyodi yo petee, ni wɔ isu ya mɛ kigaglaɛ petee, ani tɔ lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ, bilɛ veve sanɔ si tɔ kɔ baga, bidɔkɔkɔ ni bidɔpɔʋipɔʋi ʋɛ kí Aya.”
34Agi Yesu amɔ kuboeteo uliɔ gi kulɛ ní yɛ liboe le onu kubúbú yo me e, asi yɛ si, “Woti ɔpɔni Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa.”
Lɛ ya kede e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani Yesu liboeboe kuʋi tɔ ɔ.
Nyaŋwɛ onu Mesiya yɛ
35Agi Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, eʋi si, “Kitɛ mɛ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biapani si, Kristo ye onu Dawid Yebi i? 36Gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ́ ɛhwani Dawid xe apani si,
“ ‘Aya asi mɛ Ɔkaɛ si:
Ze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ ní ya
kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi maakɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kpɛ ni wɔ kuklise o.’ ”
37“Agi Dawid ɔtutɔ lɔ axwa yɛ si ‘Ɔka’ ɛ, lɛ kitɛ Kristo ye aaze Dawid yɛ obi i?”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ba kusufekeo ni kɔ su kutuheheo
Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lizɛta Yesu kutu ni isami. 38Agi azɛɛbasɛ ba bidɔ mɛ ɛ, apani si, “Mlevu aŋu ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba su. Bizɛɛga ɛklanɔ ni ba ewu gblamadzaa na mɛ lɛ bizɛpɛ si banima bapani ba nì kubùbù ní enè na mɛ ɛ. 39Bizɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ba itsaklɔ ni izekɔ ʋidi ne ní idɔŋakplɔ̃ nɛ su u. 40Bízɛŋa kamla ní badzɛ aba gi ba benye ba betse e aʋa kɔ bɛzi ba bidɔ mɛ petee ní ba awla ɛ. Lɛ bizɛbasɛ isu ya nì Aya kuxwaxwa gblamadza mɛ ɛ. Ba kutuheheo kwianyani usanɔ!”
Ɔdzɛɛ gi yenye etse e yɛ kagyɔa
41Agi Yesu eze ní niklɔ gi bizɛɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, evu aŋu ní ba bibɔgyɔgyɔ ʋɛ su. Amɔ si bexonete gegle bɛzɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní ba exomɔmɔ la onu. 42Ɔdzɛ opiplinete ɔtɔ gi yenye etse e, aba lɛ agyɔ kɔba tiaʋa ɛ. 43Lɛ Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ lɛ asi ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, si ɔdzɛ opiplinete liɛ ya yɛ kagyɔa kɛsrɛ sani banɔ gɔgɔ ba petee ba kanìa. 44Apani si, banɔ gɔgɔ ba kɔ ɛ, bɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní ba exomɔmɔ la onu. Pɔ opiplinetee kɔ ɛ, akɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ mɛ exo la petee akɔ.”

Title: MAK 13
Content:
Yesu apani liboe aplɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ kuyaʋi yɔ su
1Agi Yesu azeedò ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole apani si, “Di ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Akla manímaní woli lu la ya te gi bɛkɔ ɛwa agba ʋidi ala ya xe eepedi te e!”
2Yesu ebu le onu si, “Dani mlɛɛmɔ agba ʋidi gaglaa la ya ɛ? Likla ɛtɔtɔ litráwɔ ní lɛ ɔtrɔ klɔ ɔ. Bɛtrátsra la petee.”
Yesu aki kugbágba ní keduyɔyɔ su
3Yesu eze ní Olif ye lito le aʋa, gi libu aŋu mɛ ɛkpɛ Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ. Lɛ Petro nì Yakobo nì Yohanes anì Andrea, ba tete bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ. 4Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Si blɔ lipoe lɛ klɔ gi eboa la ya aaba la mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ege kiabasɛ si lipoe le lina ki eboa la ya la mɛ kubaba a?”
5Lɛ Yesu agba bà si, “Mleze nì aŋu tɔ mlakíki tɔ ɔnɔnɔ omeni mlo o. 6Banɔ glegle biayɔ ɔlɛɛ ní mɛ linyi ne me, gi biabu isu ya onu si, ‘Mɛ menu ye e!’ Nite me si biameni banɔ glegle. 7Pɔ̀ bikíhwani mlɔ ɔ, xe mlenu bigu ʋɛ izi le gi itipɔni mlɔ ɔ, ni agutaboe la ní idzage ne e; lilɛ si eboa la ya elu aba la mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ líbasɛ si kelea mɛ liblo le lina a. 8Kuse kwiata bigu nì kuse, kaʋaŋaa kiayɔ kedu ní kaʋaŋaa su; kese kiasugu ní ɔkɔ kakaa, lɛ kuʋɛ kwiadɔ ɔ. Eboa la ya alɛ ŋwisi limɛ kutàta kinɛ ɛ.
9“Mlɔ ɔtutɔ mleze ni aŋu. Biavu mlo kɔtsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ ɔ. Biakusi mlo ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ; kɔkpɛ mɛ loso e, mlɛtralɛɛ ní baʋaŋa ba ni bekusi ba aŋu mɛ tɔ mlaapani liboe gbã nɛ ɔsi ba. 10Pɔ̀ xe able kelea lidu le liana ɛ, lilɛ si basɔli Liboe Gbã nɛ asi kelea petee. 11Lɛ xegi bevu mlo ɛtsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ ɛ, eboa la gi mlaapani ní niklɔ ɛ, mlakíbu litukpo me ní la su ikpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ. Xegi lipoe le lina ɛ, mlɔ kɔ mlapani liboe kakaa gi liaba mlɔ onu i. Lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi mlɛtrapani i, atrádɔ mlɔ klɔ ɔ; ɛɛtradɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ klɔ ɔ. 12Oneminyime aakpɛ oneminyime awla tɔ beye ye; lɛ Ɔka fɛ aabitɛ nite tsinɔ Yebi su u. Bebi ba biayɔ kedu ní ba baka ba ni ba bene ba su tɔ beye ba. 13Banima petee biayɔ kedu ní mlɔ su kɔkpɛ mɛ loso. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aatani kulɛɛ gaglaa kɔna ni lipoe gɔgɔ lɛ ɛ, aamɔ kubúbú.
Baxixa zimizi ba su Kuboedoplɛ
14“Xegi mlɛmɔ ebusioboe zimizi na gi izeezizi bidɔ ɔ, gi alɛɛ niklɔ ɔ gi líma si eze e, (Ɔdɔklaɛ okeni odi tɔ onu eboa la ya ese!) Lɛ kɔ banama gi balɛ ní Yudea ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ. 15Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini ní yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔkizizi lipoe si yiple eku yɛ kepea mɛ tɔ yikɔ kididɔ edono o. 16Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, okídzi itrɛ kepea mɛ si yizɛɛkɔ yɛ liwu le e. 17Lɛ liaze gagla ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ kí bamɛdzɛ ba ni bebinea ba gi ba bebi ba bɛɛmwa ɛ. 18Mlaxwa Aya tɔ eboa la ya ʋa akíba la mɛ ní kublɔ lipoe le e! 19Lɛ ese linu si ewe a la klɔ mɛ baxixa ʋa ɛ, bianyani sani báklɔ gi beze edi dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya ebu kelea gakɔna ni omono e. Lɛ baxixa ʋa klɔ elu bátraba tɔɔ ɔ. 20Pɔ̀ Aya aatí ewe ala klɔ aʋa; atɛsi ɔ́bitɛ lɛ nite e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tragɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ kɔkpɛ yɛ banɔ banɔbúbú ba loso e aati ní ewe a la klɔ aʋa a. 21Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, xegi ɔnutɔ aasi wɔ si, ‘Di imɔ Mesiya yɛ ní ya!’ loo, ‘Di, imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ ɛ!’ wukízɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a. 22Lɛ ese linu si asia na Mesiya ba ni asia na Beboedoplɛ ba biaba. Biabitɛ enugutseboe la ni eboe mamɔ edi atɔ gi biakɔ meni Aya yɛ banɔ kyakya ba fɛ ɛ, xegi biatanɔ ɛ. 23Lɛ loso e, mleze ní aŋuplɛplɛ mɛ! Masi mlɔ liboe kakaa xe ableke lipoe le liana a.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kubaba ʋlaa
24“Niteme si ewe ala gi aaba ní baxixa ʋa kede e, liwo le lialɔsi, lɛ ɔdzidzi yɛ ɔ́trakle tɔɔ ɔ, 25Badzidziebi ʋa biawɔli dɔni lifunu ne, lɛ lifunu ne bidɔ mɛ ɛ biaŋwia ní ʋɛ izeklɔ ɔ. 26Lɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima biamɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi atrába ní aplɛ la mɛ ni kigagla ʋidi ni yɛ kuklekleo. 27Lɛ aakpɛ yɛ lifunu ne baxwɛdzɛ ba kutsisi kesea akɔtɔ tene na mɛ tɔ bakpɛ Aya yɛ banɔbúbú ba likpɔ ɔdɔni kelea mɛ kapɛ tiele kɔtsini kapɛ ʋlaa, ni lifunu ne ɔduklɔ.
Kudɔkpasi ní ogbose lo su
28“Mlaki ogbose lo ɔbasɛ mlɔ bidɔ. Xegi lɔ aya la ɛtuma ɛ, kɔ mlete si kwiku ní kedzenilea mɛ. 29Nite ke xegi mlɛmɔ eboa la ya gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, tɔ mlete si lipoe le lina a. 30Ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ xe ableke banama petee gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ, biatse e. 31Lifunu ne ni kesea biaza, pɔ̀ mɛ eboe la onu atráza liwewe e.
Ɔnɔnɔ óte liwe le loo lipoe lɛ gi ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba a
32“Ɔnɔnɔ óte liwe lɛ klɔ, ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi eboa la aaba la mɛ ɛ. Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne fɛ béte e; lɛ Yebi e fɛ óte e; Ɔka Aya ko ete e. 33“Mleze ní aŋuplɛplɛ mɛ tɔ mleze ni aŋu, lɛ ese linu si mléte lipoe lɛ klɔ gi lɛ liaze ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɔ. 34Liaze ko ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ asɛ yɛ kepea mɛ xe atrɛ ní kude me kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ xe aasɛ ɛ, akɔ yɛ besumubi ba edu ní eboe la onu, lɛ aki ɔkakaa yɛ lixwɛ nɛ ɛ; lɛ asi kevunu ya ɔʋadi ye si oze ni aŋu. 35Mleze ni aŋu lɛ ese linu si mléte lipoe lɛ klɔ gi kepea ɔkaɛ aadzi i liatani ɔlagɔ loo olezatɔ loo livlɛ kuze. 36Lɛ xegi aado ní mlɔ aʋa kpoyi i, ɔ́kiba atsani mlɔ ní sra mɛ ɛ. 37Eboa la gi masi mlɔ ɛ, la ke mɛɛsi ɔnɔ kakaa si: ‘Mleze ni aŋu!’ ”

Title: MAK 14
Content:
Kusɔliɔ baka ba bɛnya si biaye Yesu
1Agi ɛgɔ ewe taʋa tɔ Yudanɛ ma baŋa ba Kutseolidɔzawe le ni Aklãmɔnyasi na liwe le e. Kusumu yo baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛpɛ kudeonu si beevu Yesu ní kikpokpo me e gani kunɔmeno me tɔ beye ye e. 2Pɔ̀ lɛ bɛsi isu ya si, “Kudi lɛ aʋa si kukíbitɛ lɛ ní liwe le me e. Xe aní nite e, keduyɔyɔ kiaba, kɔ ozi eku i.”
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ abali kumu flafla ní Yesu aʋa ní Betania
3Yesu eze ní Simon, gi anya kunya kyikyĩ yɔ edi i, yɛ kepea mɛ ní Betania. Gi azɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ aba nì kumu flafla gi kwizɛ ní alabasta keʋe me e. Kumu yɔ gi bɛbitɛ ni ose ɔtɔ gi bizɛɛxwa si nad i, kwiŋa kedzi. Adra keʋea lɛ akɔ kumu yɔ abali akpɛ ní Yesu yɛ litukpo le me e. 4Banɔ batɔ bezè niklɔ gi bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi i; lɛ bɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Ege lɛ loso ɔdzɛ liɛ ezizi kumu flafla liɔ te e? 5Biatani kɔ kudà gi kibɔɛ kiasani kibɔ silva alafa tiata gi biakɔ kɛ ɔki bepiplinete ba ɛ.” Nite si bebu ɔdzɛɛ lipɔ ni kusuyeʋi.
6Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlayurɔ yɛ ɛ! Ege lɛ loso mlɛkpɛ yɛ kunugu yo te e? Kidiliɛ gi abitɛ akí mɛ ɛ, kidɔ gbã gi kiŋa kedzi kinu u. 7Bepiplinete ba balɛ ní mlɔ kusi lipoe kakaa; lɛ mlaatani ba kupɔnɔ lipoe kakaa gi mlɛpɛ́ ɛ. Mɛ kɔ ɛ, mátraze ni mlɔ su lipoe kakaa a. 8Abitɛ kidiliɛ gi aatani aki mɛ ɛ; abali kumu flaflaa ní mɛ aʋa gi akɔ alulɔ mɛ kisugyaɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ akí mɛ kuviveo. 9Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, ɔkɔ kakaa gi biapani Liboe Gbã nɛ ní kelea petee me e, biabu ɔdzɛ liɛ yɛ kiboebitɛɛ kubasɛ gi biakɔ zɛplɛ aŋu ní yɛ aʋa a.”
Yuda adimɛ si yɛ akpɛ Yesu awla
10Lɛ kede e, Yuda Iskariot, gi onu Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole e, atrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ʋidi ba klɔ si yizɛɛkpɛ Yesu awla ɛki ba a. 11Isami iku ba gi benu liboe le e, lɛ bɛki yɛ kakaplɛ si biaki yɛ kibɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso Yuda azɛapɛ kudeonu si tɔ yibu Yesu ikɔ ɔ.
Yesu aŋa kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba
12Ní Aklãmɔnyasi na liwe tɔpu nɛ aʋa, gi lɛ bizeye kuʋesibi yo ɛki kutseolidɔzawe le ní Yudanɛ ma ligoʋi le onu i, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔ̀pɛ si kuzɛɛbla akí wɔ kí kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ ŋaŋa ʋɛ na a?”
13Lɛ loso Yesu akpɛ ba mɛ tiaʋa si: “Mlatrɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me. Onyime ɔtɔ gi etu kenifukpo e, aatsa ni mlɔ ɔ. 14Mleku ni yɛ kude atrɛ ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi aatiku i, tɔ mlasi kepea ɔkaɛ si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ si, nifɔ onu ligba ɛlɛ klɔ mɛ gi mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaze e, xe kwiaŋa kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ mɛ na a?’ 15Aabasɛ mlɔ lifune kugbake nene kutɔ, gi bɛbla a, xe bɛlulɔ ɛplɛ ɛ. Mlakpɛ kidɔ kakaa likpɔ aplɛ níklɔ akí blɔ ɔ.”
16Badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, lɛ bɛzɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ bekyi awla ní Kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ ŋaŋa ʋɛ su i.
17Agi kulagɔɔ kwina ɛ, Yesu aba ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba. 18Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, mlɔ mɛ tole gi ɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ nì mɛ ɛ, atrákpɛ mɛ ní awla a.”
19Liboe le lisugu badɔkpasi ba. Niteme si bekpese yɛ kuʋí tole tole, si, “Mɛ loo? Máka lɛ aʋa si mɛ ɛ!”
20Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Litraze mlɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole gi ɛɛkpɛ awla ní kezia mɛ ni mɛ ɛ. 21Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ liboe le lipani kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ lianyani kí ɔniliɛ gi aakpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla ɛ! Liapɛ ɔki ɔniliɛ klɔ sanɔ xegi báxa yɛ apɔ kura ɛ!”
Ɔkaɛ yɛ kuŋuplɛ bidɔŋaŋa
22Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu akɔ liklã̀ nɛ, lɛ edo Aya ɖase ní lɛ aʋa xe ayaʋi lɛ ɛ. Lɛ akɔ lɛ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba a, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlazi lɛ ata a! Mɛ kisugyaɛ kɛ ya a!”
23Lɛ kede e, akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lɛ edo Aya ɖase e, xe akɔ ka akpɛ ba awla ɛ. Lɛ ba pɔ́ bɛŋwɛ ní ka onu i. 24Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛbali ní banɔ glegle ba ligbã nɛ kuzɛɛzɛ lɛ ya a. Mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛkɔ ɛnya Aya yɛ kutrɔtrɔ onu lɛ ya a. 25Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛ si, mátraŋwɛ wain yɛ ebi yoyo la liwewe tɔɔ kɔna ni liwe lɛ klɔ gi maaŋwɛ wain vuvu yɛ ní Aya Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
26Lɛ kede e, gi bɛza ɔdzi tole e, bedo etrɛ ní Olif ye Lito le aʋa a.
Yesu edo aplɛ si Petro aanada si yete ye
27Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ pɔ́ mlɛtrase eyurɔ mɛ lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le liipani iplɛ si ‘Aya aaye ɔgagbanɔ yɛ, kɔ iʋesi le pɔ́ ise hle e.’ 28Pɔ̀ xe mayɔ adɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, maaku mlɔ ɔtɔ trɛ ní Galilea.”
29Petro ebu le onu si, “Xegi banɔ gɔgɔ ba biase ní wɔ su fɛ ɛ, mɛ Petro kɔ ɛ, mátrase yurɔ wɔ liwewe e.”
30Yesu asi Petro si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ si, xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aamè kuʋlaa olezatɔ nɔ̀ ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.”
31Pɔ̀ Petro aŋwlɛ isu ya gaglaa sanɔ si, “Xegi lizĩa si mɛ ni wɔ kwiatse kyɛ ɛ, mátranada wɔ liwewe e.”
Badɔkpasi dzedze ba pɔ́ bɛpani liboe lɛklɔ ke e.
Yesu axwa Aya ní Getsemane abɔɔ yɛ mɛ
32Bɛtrɛ ní abɔɔtɔ mɛ gi bizɛxwa si Getsemane e, lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mleze ní ya tɔ mɛ pɔ ɛ, mizɛɛxwa Aya.” 33Agbani Petro, Yakobo ni Yohanes apɔni isu ya. Axixa ní yɛ isu ya mɛ, lɛ ese linu si eku ní lipoe gagla mɛ ɛ. 34Lɛ asi ba si, “Mɛ ɔna nɔ ɛɛmɔ kuyeʋiyeʋi glegle gi míhatse e. Mleze ní ya tɔ mleze ni aŋu.”
35Agi aga atrɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ɛ, lɛ aŋwia isu ya asa kesea, lɛ axwa Aya si, xegi liaze yɛ kupɛ́pɛ ɛ tɔ ɔsriɖi kuyeʋiyeʋi yo ɔti ní yɛ aʋa a. 36Yesu axwa si, “Abba, Mɔka! Kidɔ kakaa kilí plɔplɔ ɛki wɔ. Ki tɔ kuyeʋiyeʋi yo kaŋwɛpliʋia lia kàdɔ mɛ ɔza. Pɔ̀ aní ní mɛ kupɛpɛɔ onu u, boŋu ní wɔ kupɛpɛɔ onu.”
37Lɛ edzi aba yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba klɔ, pɔ̀ amɔ si bɛdɔ sra a. Lɛ eʋi Petro si, “Simon, sra wɔɛdɔ lò o? Kɔ wɔ́tani aŋu kuze ɔnyɔsasa tole kpoo na a?” 38Lɛ agba ba si, “Mleze ni aŋu atɔ mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíwɔli ku ní kufekedi me e. Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛdimɛ, pɔ̀ kisugyaɛ kiibotsò o.”
39Asɛ dzɛ, lɛ azɛɛxwa Aya ni eboa la klɔ ké e. 40Agi edzi aba ní badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si bɛzɛdɔ sra dzɛ. Lɛ bátani isu ya onu kubu lɛ ese linu si sra sɛ sivu ba bimbi ʋe.
41Agi edzi aba kutanɛɔ ɛ, eʋi ba si, “Sra mlɛdɔ dzɛ ɛ, xe mlɛyɔ isu mɛ lo o? Lisrɛ! Ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna! Mledi bɛkɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla ɛki banɔ zimizi ba. 42Mlayɔ tɔ kusɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ mɛ awla ɛ, imɔ yɛ!”
Bevu Yesu
43Yesu azɛɛpani xe Yuda a, gi onu badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole e, aba edo o. Linɔkpi itɔ gi livu ihɛ gblamadza ʋa, ni kusekpeo e, lize ni Yuda kude. Banɔ baklɔ beze banɔ gi kusumu yo baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛkpɛ si bevu Yesu u. 44Ɔniliɛ gi atrakpɛ Yesu awla ɛ, asi linɔkpi le kibitɛ kitɔ aplɛ si, “Ɔnyime liɛ klɔ gi yɛ lidzɔ lɛ matramu i, yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi mlɛpɛ ɛ. Mlevu ye tɔ mlagbani yɛ asɛ nɔ ni sigagla.”
45Kiliɛ gi Yuda eku ní klɔ ko e, atrɛ Yesu klɔ lɛ axwa yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ!” Lɛ amu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ ɛ. 46Banima bevu Yesu lɛ bɛnya yɛ ɛ. 47Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ ba mɛ tole etso yɛ ihɛ gblamadza yɛ lɛ aŋwia yɛ ɛ. Nite si ihɛ azɛɛtsí kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ osumubi ye yɛ kutu yɔ ɛzanɔ ɔ. 48Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kizia liziã si mlamani ihɛ gblamadza ba ni kusekpeo tɔ mlaba evu me ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi ɔ́ʋibitɛ ní ɔsã nɔ aʋa na a? 49Liwe kakaa meze ní mlɔ kusi gi mabasɛ bidɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ mlévu me e. Pɔ̀ lilɛ si Aya yɛ liboe le liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.”
50Niklɔ badɔkpasi ba petee bese esɛ̀ ní yɛ su i.
51Ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ, gi enyime kusa tete ko e, eze ní Yesu kude. Bekeni edi si bévu ye, 52pɔ̀ ayurɔ kusaa akpɛ ba awla a, lɛ ese asɛ nì liya lɛ ɛ.
Yudanɛ ma Otsixwakɔ Ʋidi no ɛxwa litsi ni Yesu
53Lɛ kede e, bɛtsini Yesu ní kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ. Niklɔ kusumu yo baka ba, ɔma nɔ baka ba ni banɔ tsitsi ba, ani ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛtsa. 54Petro ezeni ba kude ní ɔdzage no ke, xe eti eku ní kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ azɛɛŋani kifu yɛ ni Lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba. 55Kusumu yo baka ba ni Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ʋidi ba bekeni edi si biamɔ kunutsatsa kutɔ ní Yesu su tɔ biaye ye; pɔ̀ bátani kutɔtɔ kumɔ ɔ. 56Banɔ glegle bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ ní Yesu awla, pɔ̀ ba eboe la ága kude tule e.
57Lɛ banɔ batɔ bɛyɔ ɛlɛɛ, lɛ bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ ní Yesu awla si i, 58“Kwinu gi apani si, ‘Maayaʋi lisɔligba ɛlɛ ya gi banima bɛwa ni awla la ɛ; lɛ ní ewe tata kede e, maawa lidzedze gi aní banɔ bɛwa lɛ ɛ.’ ” 59Pɔ̀ ba kyɛ ɛ, ba katsalia kásɔ ɔ.
60Niklɔ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye ayɔ ní ba pɔ́ aŋu na mɛ xe eʋi Yesu si i, “Kunububu kutɔtɔ kúma ní wɔ awla ní eboa la gi bɛkɔ ní wɔ su kura na a?”
61Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́pani i, xe aabu liboeboe onu u. Lɛ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye eʋi ye dzɛ si, “Wɔ wonu Mesiya yɛ gi yɛ onu Aya Dradra yɛ Yebi ye na a?”
62Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛ! Lɛ lipoe le litrába gi mlɔ petee mlamɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi odi ní Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, gi atrába ní lifunu ne aplɛ la aʋa ɛ.”
63Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye akyì yɛ ewu la lɛ apani si i, “Katsali woli lu koŋ kwipɛ ní liboe lɛ ya mɛ dzɛ ɛ! 64Mlenu yɛ libusioboe lɛ gi apani i. Ege kìnu mlɔ kugyodi o?”
Ba pɔ́ bɛzi lɛ si, aŋa lipɔ! Lilɛ si beye ye e!
65Lɛ banɔatɔ bekpese sita sɛ kubu ubali Yesu aʋa ɛ. Bɛnya yɛ aŋu na mɛ, lɛ bɛsa yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ besi yɛ si i, “Basɛ blɔ ɔniliɛ gi asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ!” Lɛ Lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba bɛgbani yɛ ɛsɛnɔ ɛ, lɛ bezeekusi ye e.
Petro anada si yetè Yesu u
66Agi Petro eze ní kepea kukaa mɛ ɛ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ ɔdzɛʋi ɔnɔsumu tole aba a. 67Lɛ gi amɔ Petro gi azɛɛŋani kifu yɛ ɛ, edi ye haã lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wɔ kyɛ, woze nì Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ kude e.”
68Pɔ̀ Petro anada lɛ si, “Méte liboe lɛ gi wɔɛpani i, lɛ menu lɛ ese fɛ ɛ.” Lɛ edo atrɛ ní kevunu ya ɛ. Niklɔ ko lɛ ɔkukɔ lɔ eme e.
69Gi ɔdzɛʋi yɛ amɔ yɛ ní niklɔ ɛ, ekpese kudo si banama gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ dzɛ si, “Onu bamɛ tole.” 70Pɔ̀ Petro anada lɛ dzɛ.
Lidze xe banɔ baklɔ gi balɛɛ ní klɔ bebu le etu Petro dzɛ si, “Wɔtratani lɛ kúnada si wonu bamɛ tole e; lɛ ese linu si wɔ kyɛ ɛ, Galilea ɔnɛ wonu u.”
71Niklɔ Petro apani si, “Matàni bidɔ si anukwarɛɛ mɛɛpani! Aya ohe kutu ki mɛ xegi asia mɛɛsɛ ɛ! Méte onyime liɛ su gi mlɛpani i!”
72Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, ɔkukɔ lɔ eme kuʋlaa, lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu liboe lɛ gi Yesu asi yɛ aʋa a si, “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aamè kuʋla ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.” nite si amɔ isu ya egyesi lɛ eku kubemi me e.

Title: MAK 15
Content:
Yudanɛ ma bɛgbani Yesu i manɔ ní Pilato klɔ ɔ
1Keletitia livlɛ lɛ fififĩ i, kusumu yo baka ba, Yudanɛ ma banɔtsitsi ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, ani Yudanɛ ma betsixwa Ʋidi ba pɔ́ bɛkpɛ likpɔ kise ise niteme si bɛtrɔ likla ní liboe tile aʋa. Bɛkpɛ Yesu bibɔ ʋɛ, lɛ bɛgbani yɛ ɛsɛnɔ; lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ awla ɛki Pilato e. 2Pilato eʋi ye si, “Wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?” Yesu ebú le onu si, “Ee, kiliɛ gi wɔɛpani lɛ ɛ, nite lilɛ.”
3Kusumu yo baka ba bɛkɔ eboe glegle ní Yesu su u. 4Lɛ loso e, Pilato eʋi ye dzɛ si, “Wɔtrabu isu ya onu lò o. Dani wɔenu kiliɛ gi bɛɛtsa wɔ onu i?”
5Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́pani liboeboe, nite si litu Pilato kugyɔ ɔ.
Pilato atsa kutsépia akí Yesu
6Ní Kutseolidɔzawe kakaa aʋa ɛ, lize ligoʋi ki Pilato si ɔyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi ɔlɛ ligba a, gi banima biaʋi i ɔki ba. 7Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Baraba ɛ, eze ní banɔatɔ gi bɛyɔ kedu u, xe beye banɔ ɔ, xe lɛ loso bɛkpɛ ba ligba ɛ, ba kusi. 8Linɔkpi le litsa lɛ banima beʋi idɔnɔ Pilato awla si ɔbitɛ kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ ɛki ba a. 9Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ Yudanɛ ma okusi ye ki mlɔ na a?” 10Etè mɔmɔmɔ si kusumu yo baka ba bɛkɔ Yesu ikpɛ yɛ awla kɔkpɛ gi bɛkɔ kaŋuzã ní Yesu su loso o.
11Pɔ̀ kusumu yo baka ba bɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ linɔkpi le me si, beʋi si, Pilato tɔ ɔyurɔ Baraba boŋu ɔki ba a. 12Lɛ Pilato eʋi linɔkpi le dzɛ si, “Kɔ ege mlɛpɛ si mibitɛ ni ɔniliɛ gi mlɛɛxwa si Yudanɛ ma okusi ye e?”
13Bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Ku ye ní ose lo su!”
14Lɛ Pilato eʋi dzɛ si, “Liboe zimizi woli abitɛ ɛ?”
Bɛkpɛ ozi lo gaglaa ɛsanɔ si, “Ku ye ní ose lo su!”
15Gi Pilato apɛ si yibitɛ ní linɔkpi le kupɛpɛɔ aʋa loso e, ayurɔ Baraba aki ba a. Aki si bekusi Yesu, lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ awla si bazekú ye ní ose lo su i.
Baguta ba bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa
16Baguta ba bɛgbani Yesu itsinɔ ní Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ yɛ kepea mɛ, lɛ bɛxwa baguta ba lihakpɔ gɔgɔ lɛ ɛkpɛ likpɔ ɛ. 17Bɛkɔ liwu kyíkyĩ ikpɛ ɛki yɛ, lɛ beyo bibu ʋe likusikuto ekume ɛki yɛ ɛ. 18Lɛ bekpese yɛ kukpɔ̀ si: “Yudanɛ ma Okusi Ʋidi ye e, oze ligbã gblamadza!” 19Bɛsa yɛ ose lo ní litukpo le; lɛ bebu sita sɛ ɛbali yɛ aʋa a; lɛ bedu aklamasi na kesea a, xe bɛkpɛ etukpo kesea ɛki yɛ ɛ. 20Agi bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa pɔ́ ɛ, bebu liwu kyíkyĩ nɛ ní yɛ su, lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ liwu le dzini kpɛ ɛki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ bɛgbani yɛ dono etsinɔ si beezeku ye ní ose lo su i.
Bekú Yesu ní ose lo su u
21Agi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Simon i. Simon aga ádɔ ní kumami yɔ mɛ xe azɛatrɛ ní Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ gi baguta ba bɛtsani yɛ ɛ, bemi yɛ aʋa si ɔzɛ Yesu yɛ ose lo kutu. Simon ɔtutɔ lɔ ádɔ ní Kirene; lɛ yɛ bebi ba beze Alɛksanda ni Rufus i. 22Bɛgbani Yesu itsinɔ ní ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Golgota ketokpaa aʋa a. Golgota lɛ ese linu si, “Litukpoxwa ozekɔ.” 23Lɛ bɛki yɛ wain gi bɛpisa ni kuwa tiitii kutɔ gi bizɛxwa si mire e, pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́ŋwɛ yɛ ɛ. 24Lɛ bekú ye ní ose lo su xe bɛta exoeʋi la ɛki yɛ bidɔ kpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ. Nite si bɛlɛ yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ. 25Lipoe lɛ gi bekú Yesu ní ose lo su i, lize livlɛ lɛ inyɔ ɔgɔtole. 26Lɛ kunutsatsaa liɔ klɔ gi bɛŋwlimi iku ní yɛ litukpo le onu i, kwipani si: “Yudanɛ ma Okusi Ʋidi ye.” 27Bekú beze tiaʋa kyɛ ní ise le su ipɔni Yesu; oze tole eze ní yɛ kaŋaa mɛ, lɛ ɔʋlaɛ eze ní yɛ kabaa mɛ ɛ. 28Liki si Aya liboe le liba lɛ mɛ si, “Beye ye ŋwisi eboe zimizi ɔbitɛbitɛ onu kinɛ na a!”
29Banama gi bɛzɛɛga ɛza ɛ, besugu ba etukpo la, lɛ bezeebu onugu me ní Yesu su si i, “Ɛhɛ̃ɛ! Aní wɔ wɔ si, wɔtrayaʋi Lisɔligba lɛ, tɔ wɔadzini le kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ? 30Ple ní ose lo su tɔ bu isu ya!”
31Niteme ke kusumu yo baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba fɛ bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa ní ba tsali kusi si, “Ebu banɔ dzedze ba, pɔ̀ ɔ́tani isu ya kubu u! 32Xegi yɛ onu Mesiya yɛ ɛ, gi onu Israel Okusi Ʋidi ye e, kɔlɔ ople ní ose lo su ablahate tɔ kwiazi yɛ aʋa ŋa a!”
Lɛ banɔ tiaʋa ba klɔ gi beku ní ise le su ipɔni Yesu kyɛ ɛ, bekpini ye e.
Yesu yɛ Kutseo
33Agi inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa isa ɛ, litumu ne lidɔ ní kesea petee aʋa inyɔsasa tita. 34Agi inyɔ tita isa ɛ, Yesu akpe ozi tatata si, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaxtani!” Gi lɛ ese linu si, “Mɔka, Mɔka, ege lɛ loso wɔyurɔ mɛ ɛ?”
35Banɔ batɔ gi beeze ní klɔ ɛ, benu yɛ ozi lo, lɛ bɛpani si, “Mlata kutu, ɛɛxwa Eliya!” 36Banɔ baklɔ ba mɛ tole ese, lɛ azɛɛkɔ ɔsapo lo o, lɛ akpɛ lɔ ní kuda nyagba nyagba mɛ ɛ, lɛ ete lo ní ose gblamadza ɔtɔ onu, lɛ akɔ kɔ aki Yesu si ɔŋwɛ ɛ. Lɛ apani si, “Mlaplɛ litɔ kese tɔ kudi xe Eliya aaba pleni ye ní ose lo su i!”
37Gi Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa dzɛ ko lɛ ada onugu lo e.
38Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, kusaa gi bɛkɔ ɛlɛ Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, kwikyĩ idɔni kaʋaa gakɔ nani kesea! 39Baguta ba ɔka ɔtɔ gi eze ní osetsase lo ɔtɔ nɔ ɔ, gi amɔ kiliɛ mɛ gi Yesu akɔ etse e, lɛ apani si, “Sugba sugba ɛ, Onyime liɛ, Aya Yebi ɔnyaa nu u!”
40Badzɛatɔ bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no gi bezeedi eboa la gi ɛzɛɛba la mɛ ɛkpɛ ɛ. Maria Magdaladzee, ni Maria gi eze Yakobo nuvɔɛ ni Yose ba onee e, kɔpɔni Salomɛ, ba fɛ beze ní badzɛ ba ba klɔ kusi. 41Lipoɛ lɛ klɔ gi Yesu eze ní Galilea ɛ, badzɛ ba klɔ beze ni yɛ kude, xe bɛzɛpɔni yɛ ɛ. Badzɛ dzedze gi bezeni yɛ kude eba Yerusalem kyɛ beze níklɔ.
Bevive Yesu
42Lize Lisɔpa kulagɔ, liwe lɛ gi bizɛbla ɛplɛ ɛki Lizemɔniwe le e, 43Yosef gi ádɔ Arimatia ɛ, aba eku. Eze banɔtsitsi ba likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ mɛ ɔnɔ gi kubùbù kwize ní yɛ su u. Lɛ yɛ fɛ azeepe Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kubabaa a. Edo igyi le atrɛ ní Pilato aŋu mɛ lɛ eʋi si bakɔ Yesu okpo ye aki yɛ ɛ. 44Pɔ̀ litu Pilato kugyɔ gi enu si Yesu etse kyikya te e. Axwa baguta ba ɔkaɛ, lɛ eʋi ye si Yesu anya etse na a. 45Lɛ gi enu baguta ba ɔkaɛ yɛ kunutsatsaa si Yesu anya etse e, Pilato ayurɔ okpo ye aki Yosef. 46Yosef edzi aklala evu, lɛ gi eple nì okpo ye ní osetsase lo su i, axla yɛ akpɛ ní aklala yɛ mɛ lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ ní ɔdrɔ ɔtɔ gi aki si bebu ní likla nɛ mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kede e, aki si bemli likla ʋidi itɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu. 47Maria Magdalene ni Maria Yose yene bɛmɔ ní niklɔ gi bɛplɛ Yesu yɛ okpo ye e.

Title: MAK 16
Content:
Yesu yɛ kuyɔyɔɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ
1Agi Lizemɔniwe le liza ɛ, Maria Magdalene, Maria Yakobo yene, ani Salomɛ bedzi bawa flafla ʋa tɔ bɛzɛɛsra ɛki Yesu yɛ okpo ye. 2Lipadzruwe le livlɛ lɛ fififĩ gi liwo le liitu i, bɛtrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su. 3-4Beʋi bahanuglɔ ba ní kudeo me si, “Nyaŋwɛ atrámli likla nɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ onu iiki blɔ abla ɛ?” (Li ze likla ʋidi). Pɔ̀ gi bedi ikpɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si bemli likla nɛ ɛzanɔ kooko. 5Lɛ loso beti eku ní ɔdrɔ lɔ mɛ ɛ; níklɔ bɛmɔ ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ gi ɛkpɛ liwu pititi itɔ ɔ xe odi ní kaŋaa mɛ ɛ. Liki si lifu liku ba.
6Asi ba si, “Lifu likíku mlo.” “Mete si Yesu gi onu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, gi bɛkú ní osetsase lo su i, yɛ mlɛpɛ́ ɛ. Ɔ́ma niya a bɛyɔni yɛ! Mledi niya gi bɛplɛ yɛ ɛ. 7Abla ɛ, mlatrɛ tɔ mlazɛɛsi yɛ badɔkpasi ba, ni Petro si: ‘Eku ɔtɔ aki mlɔ atrɛ ní Galilea; níklɔ mlamɔ yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi asi mlɔ kinɛ ɛ.’ ”
8Lɛ bese do ní ɔdrɔ lɔ mɛ gi bezesugu ni lifu i. Bédo liboeboe asi ɔnɔnɔ, lɛ ese linu si lifune liku ba.
Yesu ebu isu ya abasɛ Maria Magdalene
9Gi Yesu ayɔ ádɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ Lipadzruwe le livlɛ lɛ ɛ, ebu isu ya abasɛ Maria Magdalene ɔniliɛ klɔ mɛ gi akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele le edono e akpɛ ɔtɔ. 10Yɛ azɛɛsi yɛ bagaglɔnɛ ba. Bɛzɛɛwa awowoe la xe bezee bemi ye e; 11lɛ gi benu u gi apani si i Yesu ɔlɛ ligbã gi yɛ amɔ yɛ ɛ, bázɛ yɛ aʋa aŋa a.
Yesu ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa
12Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ebu isu ya ní kizeze me dzedze me abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa gi beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ. 13Bedziba edo liboe le ɛsi badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba, pɔ̀ bázɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Yesu ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba
14Gɔgɔɛ, Yesu ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Aka aŋu mɛ aki ba lɛ ese linu si kuziŋa kúze ba awla a; lɛ bɛkɔ ina gagla si bátrazɛ banama gi bɛmɔ yɛ si ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aʋa ɛɛŋa a. 15Asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní kelea petee me tɔ mlapani Liboe Gbã nɛ aki ɔnɔ kakaa elu. 16Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ aŋa a xe bɛkpɛ kuni ɛki yɛ ɛ, biazɛ yɛ ligbã́; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́zɛ ŋa ɛ, biabu ye lipɔ. 17Banama gi bɛziŋa ɛ, biaki ba kigagla tɔ biabitɛ enugutseboe la: biakpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudono ní mɛ linyi ne me; biagu kunugu yo ni binemi vuvu ʋɛ. 18Xe bevu bagblaga lo bɛŋwɛ aɖi kakaa ɛ, batrámɔ kutse; biatrɔ awla ní banyanya ba aʋa, gi biahaya.”
Befeke Yesu itsini lifunu ne
19Agi Yesu apani aki ba pɔ ɛ, befeke ye tsini lifunu ne lɛ eze ní Aya yɛ kaŋaa mɛ ɛ. 20Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛpani liboe le ní ɔkɔ kakaa a; lɛ Ɔkaɛ eze nì ba gi atrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki ba si ba kiboedoe kinu anukwarɛ gani enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ mɛ ɛ.

Title: LUKA 1
Content:
Liboe gbã nɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Luka aŋwlimi nɛ kinɛ ɛ
1Tiofili dimɛnɔɛ:
Banɔ glegle bekeni edi ŋwlimi eboa la gi ɛba la mɛ ní blɔ kusi i plɛ. 2Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi banama gi beze la katsalia a, xe bɛmɔ la kibabaɛ mɛ ni ba bimbi ʋe e, dɔni la okpese klɔ, gi benu Aya yɛ banɔsumu u, xe bɛpani liboe le kinɛ ɛ. 3Lɛ loso Obùbùnɛ ɛ, gi mapami eboe la mɛ tsiitsiitsii i, dɔni la okpese kɔ ɛ, mamɔ si liziã si miŋwlimi la ní la kibabaɛ onu ki wɔ. 4Liaki si wɔate anukwarɛ liɛ petee gi ɔlɛ bidɔ bɛklɔ gi bɛbasɛ wɔ mɛ ɛ.
Bɛpani Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛ Kupɔpɔɔ ɛplɛ
5Lipoe lɛ gi Herodes eze okusi xe azɛɛŋa Yudea kesea aʋa ɛ. Aya kusumu yo ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Zakaria ɛ. Adɔ ní Abiya kusumu yo baka ba lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ. Yedze linyi lize Elisabet, lɛ yɛ kyɛ eze Aron yɛ osobi i. 6Ba tiaʋa beze agbã́ gbã ní Aya aŋu mɛ, lɛ bɛbitɛ Ɔkaɛ isã nɛ petee aʋa lipɔ mobu u. 7Pɔ̀ obi ɔtɔtɔ óze ní ba awla a, lɛ ese linu si Elisabet eze okonɔ, lɛ yɛ ni yenye Zakaria betsi i. 8Liwetɔ lɛɛ, gi lina yɛ okú no aʋa a, xe Zakaria azɛɛwa esumuxwɛ na ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ. 9Ní kusumu yo egoʋi la onu i, lidɔ yɛ aʋa si, ɔzɛɛkpɛ lifi ye kifu ní lifi ye ɔsuʋɔ lɔ aʋa. Lɛ loso eti eku ní Aya yɛ lisumugba lɛ mɛ. 10Lɛ banima petee bɛlɛɛ ní oŋwe no xe bɛzɛxwa Aya ɛ. 11Lɛ Ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ alɛ ní lifi ye ɔsuʋɔ lɔ kaŋawla mɛ. 12Gi Zakaria amɔ yɛ ɛ, elulu lɛ lifu liku ye e. 13Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Zakaria, kíse lifu! Aya enu wɔ yɛ kuxwaxwa, lɛ wodze Elisabet aapɔ obinyime ɔki wɔ. Wɔaki yɛ linyi si Yohanes. 14Liaze isami glegle kiwɔ, lɛ yɛ kupɔpɔɔ kwiakpɛ banɔ glegle kyɛ isami i. 15Lɛ ese linu si, aaze ɔnɔ ʋidi ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ. Líma si ɔŋwɛ wain loo kuda gagla a. Dɔni yɛ kupɔpɔɔ mɛ ɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ aayi ye. 16Lɛ aadzi ni Israelbanɛ glegle manɔ ní Ɔkaɛ gi onu ba Aya yɛ klɔ ɔ. 17Yɛ aaku ɔtɔ ki Ɔkaɛ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ ni kigagla mɛ ŋwisi oboedoplɛɛ Eliya kinɛ. Lɛ aakpɛ baka ni bebi likpɔ, lɛ aakyi banama gi bénu batu ba kyɛ, aadzi ni ba manɔ ní Aya yɛ kude gyɔgyɔɔ aʋa a. Tɔ aabla banɔ plɛ ki Ɔkaɛ.” 18Lɛ Zakaria eʋi ɔxwɛdzɛɛ si, “Kitɛ maate si, liboe lɛ gi wɔɛpani i, lilɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si mɛ metsi i; lɛ modze kyɛ etsi i!” 19Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Mɛ menu Gabriɛl. Mizɛɛlɛɛ ní Aya gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ si migasi wɔ liboe gbã ɛlɛ ya ɛ, yɛ aŋu mɛ. 20Liboe lɛ gi mamanɔ ɛ, wɔ́zɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa a. Pɔ̀ litraba lɛ mɛ ní lipoe trɔtrɔ lɛ aʋa. Agi wɔ́zɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa onu i, wɔadzi omúmu zɛkɔna ni liwe lɛ gi mɛ kakaplɛa kiaba ka mɛ ki wɔ ɛ!” 21Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima bezeepe Zakaria lɛ béte kidiliɛ gi kɛ loso awɔ lisumugba lɛ mɛ te e. 22Gi edo aba ɛ, ɔ́tani kupani i, lɛ loso banima bɛmɔ egyesi si Aya ebu kiditɔ abasi yɛ ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Gi ɔ́tani kupani onu i, awla ko abasi banima. 23Agi yɛ kusumu yo axwɛwawa la eblo e, Zakaria edzi atrɛ ní yɛ kepea. 24Lɛ kede e, yedze Elisabet akɔ limɛ. Lɛ ekpo isu ya badzidzi tietsu nyɔŋ ɔ. 25Lɛ apani si, “Gɔgɔɛ, Ɔkaɛ apɔni mɛ gi ebu mɛ kuyeo azanɔ ní banima aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
Bedo Yesu kupɔpɔɔ ɛplɛ
26Ní Elisabet yɛ limɛ nɛ kukɔkɔ lɛ ɔdzidzi glonɛɛ mɛ ɛ, Aya akpɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ Gabriɛl ní Nazaret ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea kesea mɛ. 27Atsini odu lo ní ɔdisami ɔtɔ gi óte onyime e, gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawla ɛki onyime ɔtɔ ɔ, gi bɛzɛxwa si Yosef i. Yosef, onu okusi ye Dawid yɛ osobi. Lɛ ɔdisami nɔ linyi linu Maria a. 28Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ atrɛ ní yɛ klɔ lɛ apani yɛ si, “Kusuyɔ ki wɔ. Ɔkaɛ ɔlɛ ni wɔ, lɛ akrira wɔ kpaŋu u.”
29Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ yɛ eboe la ɛki si Maria apisa lɛ eʋi isu ya si kunɔpanɔ liɔ ya kɔ ese si kitɛ ɛ. 30Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Maria, wukíse lifu u. Aya apɛ lipo me aki wɔ. 31Wɔakɔ limɛ, gi wɔapɔ obinyime e, lɛ wɔaki yɛ linyi si Yesu u. 32Aaze ɔnɔ ʋidi gi biaxwa yɛ si Aya kigaglaɛ petee Ɔkaɛ Yebi.
