42Ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Osumubi woli onu ɔgbã ɛ nì oboete e?” Yɛ onu iliɛ gi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ kepea akpɛ awla akɔ ɔ, gi yɛ aaki besumubi dzedze ba ba kiŋaŋaɛ ní lipoe gbã nɛ aʋa a. 43Biakrira osumubi liɛ klɔ, xegi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aaba klani yɛ onu gi ɛɛwa nite me axwɛ na ɛ. 44Sugba ɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ yɛ exo la petee akɔ kpɛ osumubi liɛ klɔ awla si odi be aʋa. 45Pɔ̀ xegi osumubi liɛ klɔ aasi isu ya si, liadze xe mɛ kepea ɔkaɛ adzi i, xe aakpese besumubi benyime ni badzɛ ba kukusi i, xe ɛɛŋa xe ɛɛŋwɛ emu i; 46Lɛ xe kepea ɔkaɛ aadzi ní lipoɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ gi osumubi ye ógyo odi, ni liwe lɛ aʋa gi ɔ́plɛ aŋu i, Yɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aafli ye kukpe kukpe aakɔ̀ yɛ ɔkpɛ batu gagla benete ba kusi i.
47Lɛ loso e, osumubi liɛ klɔ gi ete yɛkaɛ yɛ kupɛpɛɔ, pɔ̀ xe ɔ́blaa ɔki kɔ aʋa kubitɛ ɛ, biafiaʋi yɛ biseʋi glegle ŋwisi kutuhehe kinɛ. 48Pɔ̀ osumubi liɛ klɔ gi óte yɛkaɛ kupɛpɛɔ xe ata kese e, biahe kutu ki yɛ taʋɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ glegle e, biaʋi bidɔ glegle dɔni yɛ iwla mɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ ɛsanɔ ɛ, biaʋi bidɔ glegle sanɔ dɔni yɛ awla.
Yesu amani kulɛlɛ ɛ
49Maba si míkpɛ kifu kesea aʋa, gi nya mapɛ si kikpese kusɔ kooko xe e. 50Pɔ̀ lilɛ si miga baxixa ba mɛ, ŋwisi kuni kpɛkpɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ maxixa isu ya mɛ kɔkpɛ ni lipoe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ. 51Kigyo mlegyo edi si mɛ kubaba ɛ, kwiamani kusuyɔ ní kelea mɛ lo o? Owo, kútramani kusuyɔ pɔ̀ kulɛlɛ ɛ. 52Dɔnɔ abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, ní banɔ tietsu ní kepe me e, ba mɛ tiata biayɔ kedu ní tiaʋa su u, lɛ tiaʋa kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní tiata su u. 53Baka ba biayɔ kedu ní ba bebinyime ba su u, lɛ bebinyime ba biayɔ kedu ni ba baka ba su u. Bene biayɔ kedu ni ba bebidzɛ ba su, lɛ bebidzɛ ba kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní ba bene ba su u. Banadze ba biayɔ kedu ní ba beblidze ba su, lɛ beblidze ba kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní ba banadze ba su u.
Eboe baba la ese kununu yo
54Yesu asi banima si, “Xegi mlɛmɔ aplɛ la gi ɛdɔ ní keweku ya ɛ, kɔ mlɔsi si dzeni ye atrádɔ ɔ; lɛ izɛdɔ kyɛ ɛ. 55Lɛ xegi liwɔ lɛ lifu idɔnɔ ni kalea ɔza lɔ ɛ; kɔ mlɛsi si kana mɛ kɛtraze kpikpi, gi lizɛba lɛ mɛ te kyɛ ɛ. 56Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ boe bitɛ ba! Xegi mlɛtani kesea ni liwɔ lɛ mɛ kizezee kudi i, gi mlɔ kiboedoe kizɛba kɛ mɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso xe mlatrátani abla eboe la ese kunu u?”
Kusi kululɔlulɔ
57“Ege lɛ loso mlatrátrɛ mlɔ isu ya mɛ edi xe mlate kidiliɛ gi mlabitɛ ɛ? 58Xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ liboe ní wɔ su u, xe atsini wɔ ní otsixwakɔ ɛ, kenidi tɔ mlalulɔ liboe le ní mlɔ kusi xe ableke mlaaku otsixwaklɔ ɔ. Xe aníte e, aatsini wɔ ní otsixwa yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ, kɔ yɛ kyɛ akɔ wɔ akpɛ ní ɔsã nɔ aʋa odidi ye awla ɛ, kɔ bɛkpɛ wɔ ligba lɛ ɛ. 59Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, níklɔ wɔaze ga kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi wɔtsa liʋɛ kakaa a, gi bɛnya ɛki wɔ ɛ.”

Title: LUKA 13
Content:
Mlekyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ xegi aníte mlaatse e
1Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ batɔ beze ní iklɔ gi bɛsi Yesu kiliɛ gi Pilato eye Galileanɛ atɔ ɔ, xe apisa ba ika lɛ ni bidɔ mɛ ɛ gi bɛzɛpɔʋi ɛki Aya a. 2Yesu ebu le onu si “Kigyo mlegyo edi si Galileanɛ baklɔ gi beye te e, ba bɛsa eboe zimizi na kubitɛ sani Galileanɛ gɔgɔ ba na a? 3Aníte lilɛ ɛ! Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xegi mlékyi ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaatse e! 4Aloo banɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtiaʋa klɔ gi Siloam lifune ligba lɛ likpa ebu u, xe betse e, kɔ ba benu banɔ zimizi ba sani banama petee gi bali Yerusalem na a? 5Kura! Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi mlékyi ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaatse e.”
Abee ní mangɔ gi óbu libiitɔtɔ su u
6Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki ba si: Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi akpɛ mangɔ ni yɛ wain ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ, Adzɛ si yigu esebi ní mangɔ yɛ mɛ, pɔ ɔ́mɔ litɔtɔ ɔ. 7Lɛ loso asi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa odidi ye si, “Agɔ tata nyɔŋ la ya gi mɛɛba ni ya pɔ́ mámɔ, lisebitɔtɔ ní ose lo me e. Lɛ loso e tsa lɔ tuʋe e! Líma si ozezizi kesea ki mɛ ɛ.”
8Pɔ ɔnyrɔ nɔ ɔʋadi ye asi yɛ si, “ ‘Ɔka,’ ‘yurɔ lɔ ligɔ tile dzɛ ɛ. Maatu lɔ su tɔ maakpɛ biŋaŋa lɔ su. 9Xegi eyo galigɔ ɛ, liapɛ; pɔ xe aníte e, wɔatani kuki si biatsa lɔ fãa.’ ”
Yesu ayɔni ɔdzɛ bafa ɔtɔ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa
10Ní Sabat liwe etɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma Ɔtsaklɔ. 11Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ eze niklɔ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔtɔ evu ye agɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtaʋa nyɔŋ ɛ. Ɔdzɛɛ axa eku gi ɔ́zɛtani kugyɔ ɔ xe alɛɛ kedu ya kura a. 12Gi Yesu amɔ yɛ ɛ, axwa yɛ atsisi lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔdzɛ, wɔ kunyaa, kwiyurɔ wɔ!” 13Lɛ atrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa a, ko lɛ ayɔ xe agyɔ ɔlɛ ɛ, niteme si ɔdzɛɛ akpɔ Aya!
14Pɔ̀ Yudanɛ ma Ɔtsaklɔ ɔʋadi ye, amɔ kusuyeʋi si Yesu ayɔ ni ɔnyanya ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a. Lɛ loso apani asi banima si, “Ewe teglo alɛ gi kiawa axwɛ ɛ, lɛ loso lilɛ si mlaba ní ewe teglo ala klɔ mɛ tɔ bayɔni mlɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ aní ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a.”
15Lɛ Ɔkaɛ azɛ lɛ yɛ onu si, “Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ boebitɛ ba,! Mlɔ mɛ ɔkakaa izebu yɛ tedzi ye loo ligume nyime ne edono ní kuka mɛ gi izɛgbani bɛ zɛki bɛ kuni ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a. 16Abla Abraham ye obidzɛ liɛ gi Ozimizi ye evu anya agɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtaʋa nyɔŋ la ya ɛ; Kɔ bakíble ye adɔ ni yɛ kunyaa mɛ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa na a?”
17Kuye kwiku yɛ ahwafianɛ ma petee pɔ̀ banima kɔ ɛ, isami iku ba ní enugutseboe ala petee gi Yesu azaabitɛ su u.
Abee ní lisebi sisami nɛ su
18Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “Kitɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ɛ? Lɛ ege maakɔ ka kusrɔnɔ ɔ?” 19Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami gi onyime ɔtɔ akpɛ ní yɛ kayaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ. Lisebi le litsi gi lidzi ose ʋidi ɔtɔ gi kudzɔʋi yɔ kwiwa evu na ɛkpɛ ní lɔ ayaa la mɛ ɛ.
Abee ní kunyasi su
20Yesu eʋi dzɛ si, ege maakɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa srɔnɔ ɛ? 21Kalɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ akɔ kunyasi sisami kutɔ akɔ apisa kunɔ kpaŋukpaŋu utɔ gi kwiki si amɔwɔ yɛ petee eho kinɛ ɛ.
Kevu nu pɔpɔa ki ligbã́ nɛ
22Yesu aga aklanɔ ní ima ni kumami yɔ mɛ azaabasɛ bidɔ gi azaatrɛ ní Yerusalem i. 23Ɔnutɔ eʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, kɔ banɔ kiklakla mɛ sisami itɔ ko kiamɔ kububu na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, 24Mlekeni edi tɔ mleti iku gani kevunu pɔpɔa mɛ; lɛ ese linu si meetrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si; banɔ glegle bɛtráŋwlɛ si beti eku pɔ̀ batrátanɔ ɔ. 25Xegi kepea ɔkaɛ ayɔ xe ada opupo lo e, xe mlalɛ ni oŋwe no o, xe mlɛsa opupo lo o si, “Ɔkaɛ, Kwiki wɔ litukpo o, dra opupo lo ki blɔ ɛ!”
Pɔ̀ aasi mlɔ si, “Méte mlo loo niklɔ gi mlɛdɔ ɔ!” 26Niklɔ mlɔ kyɛ mlaabù isu ya onu si, “Blɔ ni wɔ kwiŋa lɛ kwiŋwɛ kyɛ ɛ, lɛ wɔbasɛ bidɔ ní blɔ ima nɛ ablɔ ʋa aʋa a!”
27Pɔ̀ aasi mlɔ dzɛ si, “Méte mlo loo niklɔ gi mlɛdɔ ɔ! Mlasɛ ní mɛ su, mlɔ litukpo me gagla benete ba. 28Mlaabemi gi mlata ene na a, xegi mlɛmɔ Abraham, Isak, Yakob ani beboedoplɛ ba petee ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe bɛŋwia mlɔ xunyɔ ɛkpɛ ni oŋwe no e. 29Banɔ biadɔ ní kewetu ya, keweku ya, kaʋa ni kale gi biaŋa lɛ biaŋwɛ bidɔ ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ. 30Nite me si banama gi ba benu banɔ gɔgɔ ba abla ɛ, ba biaze banɔ tɔpu ba, lɛ banama gi benu banɔ tɔpu abla ɛ, ba biaaze banɔ gɔgɔ ba.”
Yesu alɔ Yerusalem
31Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖii, Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ bɛsi ye si, “Sɛ ní niya tɔ trɛ ní ɔkɔ dzedze lɛ ese linu si Herodes ɛɛpɛ si yiye wo.”
32Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlazɛsi wayu liɛ klɔ si, ‘Matrakpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne e dono, lɛ maayɔni banyanya ba kyɛ omono ni kivo o. Liwetanɛ we le e, maagù mɛ axwɛ na.’ 33Pɔ linu si mize kudeo me omono, kivo ni kivodé. Líma si beye oboedoplɛ ní ɔkɔkɔ sani Yerusalem.
34“Wɔ Yerusalem, Woye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba, lɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi Aya atsisi i, wɔsa ba akla na. Tasɛ mapɛ si mikpɛ wɔ bebi ba likpɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkukɔnee izewe yɛ bebi ba kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ wɔ́ki mɛ kudeo onu u! 35Lɛ loso e, wɔ lisumugba lɛ lilɛ kiwɔ pluplu. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, mlatrámɔ mɛ tɔɔ kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi mlaakpɛ osayee lo si, ‘Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e!’ ”

Title: LUKA 14
Content:
Yesu ayɔ ni onyime ɔtɔ
1Liba lɛ mɛ ní Sabat liwe etɔ aʋa si Yesu atrɛ ní Farisianɛ ma ɔnɔ ʋidi ɔtɔ yɛ kepea mɛ bidɔ ɔŋa kɔ; lɛ banima bezevu aŋu ní Yesu su mɔmɔmɔ ɔ. 2Gi si yidi i, onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ ikli ni iwla iye e, aba edo ní yɛ aŋu mɛ. 3Yesu eʋi Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma si, “Blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si bayɔni ɔnyanya ní Sabat liwe le aʋa loo kitɛ ɛ?” 4Pɔ̀ banima bapani i. Lɛ Yesu ebu onyimee kuka a, ayɔni yɛ, lɛ akpɛ yɛ kude e.
5Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ Yebi i, loo yɛ ligume liwɔli iku ní vudo ye me ní Sabat yɛ aʋa a, mlaatrábu ba kyɔŋ ní Sabat yɛ ɔtutɔ aʋa na?” 6Pɔ̀ bátani liboe lɛ ya onu kubu kí yɛ ɛ.
Kudɔbasɛ ní Kusububɔ ni Kunɔdimɛnɔ su
7Gi Yesu akpɛ lɛ lixaŋu kiliɛ gi banɔkpekpe ba bɛzɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ki isu ya ɛ, Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki ba petee si, 8Xegi ɔnutɔ axwa wɔ amanɔ ní ɔdzɛ ɔgbanɔkplɔ su i, wukíze ní ozekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɔ ɔ; lɛ ese linu si wóte xe bekpe ɔnɔ gbɔgbɔ sani wɔ amanɔ ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su u. 9Xegi liba lɛ mɛ nite e, kɔ kepea ɔkaɛ aabasɛ wɔ si, yɔ ní wɔ ozeklɔ ki onyime liɛ ya. Liaki si wɔayɔ ni kuyeo me kɔ wɔzedi ni ozekɔ lɔ gi óku aŋu i. 10Boŋu i, xegi bɛxwa wɔ ɛtsini ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i, wukize ni ɔgyɔgyɔ kɔ ɔ, tɔ xe kepea ɔkaɛ aba ɛ, aasi wɔ si, “Ɔʋia, yɔ tɔ zeeze ní ɔkɔ gbã ɔtɔ kɔ sanɔ.” Liaki si kubùbù kwiaze ní wɔ su ní banɔxwaxwa ba petee aŋu mɛ sanɔ. 11Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ kakaa gi emuni isu ya ɛ, biaple ni ye, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi epleni isu ya ɛ, biamuni ye.
12Lɛ Yesu asi kepea ɔkaɛ si, xegi wɔ si wutrɔ ɔkplɔ ɛ, kíxwa wɔ baʋia nɛ, wɔ benemi, wɔ baŋanɛ loo banama gi ɔwla mɛ ɔlɛ ba a; lɛ ese linu si ba kyɛ ɛ, biadzini wɔ kuxwa gani lɛ mɛ ɛ, kɔ bɛtsa wɔ kuxwaxwaa liʋɛ nɛ ɛki wɔ ɛ. 13Lɛ loso xegi wɔtrɔ ɔkplɔ ɛ, xwa bepiplinete ba, banama gi ba kapɛ tiele ketse e, bafa ba ani kuŋupoo, 14kɔ Aya akrira wɔ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si ba batrátani wɔ liʋɛ nɛ kutsa ki wɔ ɔ. Aya aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ɔki wɔ ní liwee lɛ aʋa gi eboe gbã na babitɛbitɛ ba biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ.
Abee ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ trɔtrɔ ʋidi lo su
15Lipoe lɛ gi banama gi beze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ni Yesu ba mɛ tole enu liboe le e, asi yɛ si, “Banama gi biaŋa bidɔ ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ ʋidi lo su ni lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, isami koŋ bɛtra mɔ.”
16Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Onyime ɔtɔ atrɔ ɔkplɔ ʋidi ɔtɔ, lɛ axwa banɔ gbí si bagaŋa bidɔ ni yɛ ɛ. 17Agi bidɔ mɛ liŋapoe le lina ɛ, akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye si ɔzɛsi banɔxwaxwa ba si, ‘Mlaga ba, kidɔ kakaa kiflɔ.’
18“Pɔ̀ ba petee bekpese ba baxixa ʋa kubu basɛ tole tole e. Ɔnɔ tɔpu yɛ asi ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Medzi kese katɔ gi lilɛ si mizɛɛtapo kamɛ odi i, lɛ loso e, zi mɛ kuxixaa ki mɛ.’ 19Ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ si, ‘Medzi egume nyime liɔfɔ tɔ míkɔ ɛsɔ mɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ, nite si kudeo me malɛ te gi matrɛsɔ ni la edi i, lɛ loso mátratani ku ba a.’
20“Ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ si, ‘magbani ɔdzɛ vuvu lɛ loso mátratani kuba a.’
21“Ɔnɔsumu ye azɛɛki yɛ ɔkaɛ kunutsatsaa. Ɔkaɛ amɔ kusuyeʋi gagla lɛ asi yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Kɔsi tɔ trɛ ní ɔma nɔ ablɔ ʋa aʋa ni igbade ne me, tɔ zɛɛxwa bepiplinete ba, bafa ba, kuŋupoo ni banama gi kapɛ tiele ketse ki ba ɛ manɔ.’
22“Gi liŋwe ne si lɛdɔ ɛ, ɔnɔsumu ye edzi aba lɛ asi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ ɛ si, ‘Lixwɛ nɛ gi wɔkpɛ mɛ ɛ, mawa lɛ. Pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, izekɔ lɛ iʋíblo o.’ 23Nite si ɔkaɛ asi ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Do trɛ ní inyrɔ nɛ bede ʋidi ʋa aʋa ni ikli lɛ bede ʋa me tɔ xwa ɔnɔ kakaa gi wɔamɔ manɔ ɔ, tɔ mɛ kepea keyi. 24Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama petee gi bɛxwa ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, ba mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́trakpɛ mɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ aʋa kididɔ ní onugu me e.’ ”
Ɔdɔkpasi kuzeze, kúnu kidɔ plɔplɔ ɔ
25Liwe etɔ lɛ gi Yesu ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ, ekyi lɛ asi ba si, 26“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aba mɛ klɔ ɛ, ɔ́tratani mɛ ɔdɔkpasi kudzi xegi ɔ́lɔ mɛ sani ɔka loo one e, odze loo bebi, beneminyime loo benemidzɛ, loo yɛ tutɔ yɛ isu ya kyɛ. 27Banama gi bátratani ba tutɔ ba isetsase le kutu u, xe biakuni mɛ kude e, bátratani mɛ badɔkpasi kuze e.
28“Xegi mlɔ mɛ tole ɔtɔ atrɔ si yiwa lifunu ligba a, liziã si oze kese ní ɔtɔpu kɔ, tɔ obu akɔnta atɔ odi si tiasɛ ligba lɛ liazɛ ɛ, lɛ kibɔ kisrɛ ní yɛ awla gi aatani ligba lɛ kuwa gù na a. 29Xegi óbu ɔkliɔ lɔ klɔ ɛ, ɔ́tratani ligba lɛ kuwa gù u, xe akpɛ ɔxɔ lɔ pɔ ɛ. Nite si banama petee gi biamɔ yɛ kibitɛ ɛ, biamwɛ yɛ. 30Kɔ bɛpani si, ‘Onyime liɛ ekpese ligba lɛ kuwa pɔ̀ ɔ́tani lɛ kugù u.’
31“Xegi okusi ɔtɔ akɔ baguta akpe liɔfɔ si yitrɛta kigũ ni okusi dzedze gi baguta akpe avi taʋa balɛ yɛ awla ɛ, aaze kese gi aadi si kɔ yɛ atani kigũ kuta ní okusi liɛ klɔ na a? 32Xegi ete si yɛ ɔ́tratanɔ ɛ, kɔ akpɛ banɔ ní okusi liɛ klɔ kɔ lipoe lɛ gi ba kusi kwidze e, tɔ beʋi kusuyɔ. 33Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ liboe le si, Nite ke mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani mɛ ɔdɔkpasi kuze e sanɔ si ayurɔ kidɔ kakaa gi kilɛ yɛ awla ɛ.”
Kùmwɛ gi kupɛ ɛ
34“Kùmwɛ kuzeze ɔgyi, pɔ̀ xegi ɔgyi nɔ eblo ní kɔ mɛ ɛ, bátratani ɔgyi kukpɛ ní kɔ mɛ tɔ ɔ. 35Kúpɛ ɛki kididɔ tɔ ɔ, kiŋwia ko biaŋwia kɔ oʋe. Xegi kutu kuli mlɔ ɛ, tɔ mlenu.”

Title: LUKA 15
Content:
Abee Ní Oʋesi gi Ɛlila Su u
1Liwetɔ lɛ gi babɔgyɔ glegle atɔ ni banɔ zimizi ba beti ipɔni Yesu si beenu yɛ eboe la ɛ, 2Farisianɛ ma ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛɛta ànyà na si, “Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, ɛɛzi banɔ zimizi ba lɛ izɛɛŋa bidɔ ni ba kyɛ ɛ.”
3Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ akí ba si; 4Xe iʋesi alafa tole ilɛ mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ awla a, xe tole ɛlila ní lɛ kusi i, ɔ́trayurɔ iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le ní lɛ bidɔ mɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔ, xe iipɛ oʋesi ɔlɔ gi ɛlila a kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aamɔ lɔ na a? 5Lɛ xe amɔ lɔ ɛ, aafeke lo trɔ ní yɛ aŋwladɔ na aʋa nì isami 6xe akɔ lɔ amani kepea mɛ ɛ. Kɔ axwa yɛ baʋia nɛ ba ni yɛ axolika ba kpɛ likpɔ kɔ asi ba si, “Mlamɔ isami ni mɛ; mamɔ mɛ oʋesi ɔlɔ gi ɛlila na a.” 7Mɛɛsi mlɔ si niteme ke biamɔ isami glegle ní lifunu ne ní ɔnɔ zimizi tole gi ekyi yɛ ɔna mɛ su u, sani banɔ avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole ba ya gi benu banɔ gbã xe bázia kukyikyi i.
Abee ní Kibɔ gi ki lila Su u
8Loo ɔdzɛ gi bibɔ pititi liɔfɔ bilɛ ní yɛ awla a, xe tile kilila kɛ su i, ɔ́trasu kani i, xe aagba yɛ kepea mɛ tɔ yipɛ kibɔɛ tsiitsiitsii kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi aamɔ kɛ ɛ? 9Lɛ xe amɔ kɛ ɛ, aaxwa yɛ baʋia nɛ ba ni yɛ axolika ba kpɛ likpɔ xe aasi ba si, ‘Mlamɔ isami ni mɛ; Mamɔ mɛ kibɔɛ liɛ gi kilila ɛ.’ 10Nite me ké mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba biamɔ isami glegle kɔkpɛ ɔnɔ zimizi tole gi ekyi yɛ ɔna mɛ loso o.
Abee Ní Obinyime gi alila su u
11Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bebinyime tiaʋa beze ní yɛ awla a. 12Obinuvɔɛ asi yɛ ka si, ‘Ɔka, kɔ mɛ ɔŋa klɔ kí mɛ.’ Lɛ alɛ yɛ bidɔ mɛ aki ba tiaʋa ɛ.
13“Ewe klakla atɔ kede e, ɔnuvɔɛ ada yɛ bidɔ mɛ lɛ akɔ kibɔɛ xe ekú kude me e. Atrɛ ní kese dzedze katɔ aʋa gi niklɔ azeezizi yɛ kibɔɛ gani ligbãŋaŋa mɛ ɛ. 14Gi ezizi yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee e, kuʋɛ gagla kutɔ kwidɔ ní kesea lia klɔ aʋa, nite si eku ɔzia mɛ gi kididɔ kigɔ yɛ awla tɔ ɔ. 15Lɛ loso e, akɔ isu ya apɔni kesea klɔ aʋa ɔnɔ gi aki yɛ axwɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ si ozeedi yɛ iha lɛ aʋa a. 16Nya azɛapɛ si yiŋa iha lɛ kiŋaŋaɛ, pɔ́ ɔnɔnɔ ɔki yɛ kitɔtɔ si ɔŋa a.
17“Gɔgɔɛ enyime lɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Mɔka yɛ baxwɛwa ba pɔ́ ɛ, ba kiŋaŋaɛ kisrɛ sani ba kuŋaŋa, lɛ mɛ pɔ̀ kuʋɛ kuha mɛ kuye ni ya a! 18Maayɔ, maatrɛ ní mɔka klɔ lɛ maasi yɛ si, Mɔka matá Aya ni wɔ ese. 19Mégyeno si wɔaxwa mɛ si wobi tɔ ɔ, bitɛ mɛ ŋwisi wɔ baxwɛwa ba mɛ tole kinɛ ɛ.’ 20Lɛ loso e ayɔ ekú kudeo me gi ɛɛtrɛ ní yɛka klɔɛ ɛ. “Pɔ̀ gi eze ní ɔdzage no e, yɛka amɔ yɛ atsisi; yɛ ɔna nɔ ekyi evu ye, lɛ ese e xe azɛɛkpɛ awla ni yɛ ole lo o, xe amu yɛ adzɔ la ɛ. 21Lɛ obi ye apani si, ‘Mɔka matá Aya ni wɔ ese. Mégyeno si wɔaxwa mɛ si wobi tɔ ɔ.’
22“Pɔ̀ yɛ ka axwa yɛ banɔsumu ba lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mlakɔ si, tɔ mlaakɔ liwu gblamadza gbã nɛ petee amanɔ tɔ mlakɔ lɛ akpɛ aki yɛ. Mlakpɛ asukpɛɛ ní yɛ kíwlaʋi yɛ tɔ mlakpɛ afɔkpa ʋa yɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ. 23Atɔ mlazevu ligume obi liɛ gi amɔ isu ya mɛ ɛ, mleye ye tɔ kumɔ isami. 24Lɛ ese linu si lize ŋwisi mobinyime liɛ etse e, pɔ̀ abla ɛ, ɔlɛ ligbã́; alila, pɔ̀ abla ɛ, bɛmɔ yɛ. Lɛ bekpese isami nɛ kumɔ ɛ.
25“Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, yebinyime tsitsi ye eze ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ. Gi atrédzi i xe eti apɔni kepea mɛ ɛ, enu idzi ni evu kuyoyo. 26Lɛ axwa banɔsumu ba mɛ tole lɛ eʋi ye si, ‘liboe woli liitrɛ lɛ aʋa a?’ 27Ebu le onu akí yɛ si, ‘Wonemi ye yɛ edzi aba kepea, lɛ wɔka eye ligume obi liɛ gi eku kumu u, lɛ ese linu si amɔ Yebi ye gi alila a xe edzi aba ni isu mɛ pɛ̀pɛ̀ mɛ.’
28“Pɔ̀ obinyime tsitsi ye eyeʋi isu ya gbɛgbɛ si ɔdimɛ si yitiku kepea mɛ ɛ; lɛ yɛka aba a xe aki yɛ litukpo si oti oku kepea mɛ ɛ. 29Pɔ̀ ebu le onu akí yɛka si, ‘Dí, mɔka agɔ ala ya petee gi mawa axwɛ na aki wɔ ŋwisi ɔnɔdzidzi kinɛ ɛ, xe máta wɔ isã nɛ ese edi i. Ege wɔki mɛ ɛ? Ɔmu tete fɛ ɛ wɔ́ki mɛ edi tɔ mɛ ni mɛ baʋia nɛ ba kwiakɔ mɔ isami i! 30Pɔ̀ wobi liɛ ya ɛ, azeezizi wɔ bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ nì bawawadze ba pɔ̀, gi edzi aba kepea ɛ, woye ligume obi gi liku kumu aki yɛ ɛ.’ 31Yɛka ebu le onu si, ‘Mobi ye, wɔlɛ ní mɛ sú lipoe kakaa, lɛ kidɔ kakaa gi kinu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, wɔ kínɛ kinu. 32Pɔ̀ lilɛ si kuŋa liwe tɔ kumɔ isami, lɛ ese linu si lize si wonemi ye etse, pɔ̀ abla ɛ ɔlɛ ligbã́; lize si alila, pɔ abla ɛ bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ.’ ”

Title: LUKA 16
Content:
Ɔdɔaʋadi Ɔɖaye ɔnɛɛ
1Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi ɔdɔaʋadi eze yɛ awla a. Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si yɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye e azeezizi yɛ kibɔɛ. 2Lɛ loso axwa yɛ lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Liboe woli lɛ ya gi meenu ní wɔsu u? Bu akɔnta kí mɛ ní kiliɛ gi wɔɛkɔ ɛga ní mɛ bidɔ mɛ su u, lɛ ese linu si wɔtratani mɛ bidɔ aʋa kudi tɔ ɔ.’
3“Ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi isu ya si, ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ atrá kpikpini mɛ ní mɛ lixwɛ nɛ mɛ. Ege maabitɛ abla ɛ? Kigagla kíma ní mɛ mɛ̀ gi maakɔ wa axwɛ gagla a, lɛ kuye kwiaku me si miʋi bidɔ ɔ. 4Mete kidiliɛ gi maabitɛ ɛ! Tɔ xe bɛyurɔ mɛ ní axwɛ na mɛ fɛ ɛ, Maamɔ baʋianɛ gi biazɛ mɛ kpɛ ní ba kupeo me e.
5“Lɛ loso axwa yɛkaɛ yɛ baʋɛnete ba pɔ́ ɔ. Lɛ eʋi ɔtɔpu yɛ si, ‘Tiasɛ liʋɛ wɔdɔ ni mɛ ɔkaɛ su u?’
6“Ebu le onu si, ‘Olif ye kumu ŋaŋa gago alafa tole.’
“Lɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi yɛ si, ‘Zi wɔ liʋɛ nɛ keplekpaa, ze kesea tɔ ŋwlimi avi tetsu.’
7“Lɛ eʋi ɔnɔ ʋla yɛ si, ‘Wɔ pɔ tiasɛ liʋɛ wɔdɔ ɔ?
“Ebu le onu si ‘Kimimi ikotoku akpe tole.’ Lɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi yɛ si, ‘Zi wɔ́ liʋɛ nɛ keplekpea tɔ ŋwlimi alafa ɔgɔtiaʋa.’
8“Ɔkaɛ akpɔ ɔdɔaʋadi nyani nyani liɛ si, ebu ɔdaye ɔkli lɔ ya; lɛ ese linu si kelea lia ya mɛ banima bete liboe ní kiliɛ gi biaga ní ɔɖaye lo me ni ba hanuglɔ ba, sani banama gi benu kuklekle me banɔ ɛ.” 9Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Lɛ loso e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si: mlakɔ kelea mɛ exo la evu baʋia ba tɔ, xe eblo e, tɔ biazɛ mlɔ kpɛ ni kupe moblo me.
10“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi biaka yɛ aʋa ní eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, biaka yɛ aʋa ní eboe ʋidi la kyɛ mɛ; lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi óɖi anukwarɛ ní eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, ɔ́traɖi anukwarɛ ní eʋidi la kyɛ mɛ ɛ. 11Xegi mlátani anukwarɛ kudo nì kelea mɛ exo la ɛ, nyaŋwɛ aaká ní mlɔ aʋa nì lifunu ne exo la a? 12Lɛ xe mlátani ɔnɔ dzedze bidɔ aʋa kudi i, nyaŋwɛ aaki mlɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ kiniɛ ɛ?
13“Ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani baka tiaʋa kusumu u; aatrɔ tole ahwafi kɔ adimɛ ni ɔʋla ɛ, loo aanu kutu ki tole kɔ akpɛ ɔʋla ɛ kakpaa ɛ. Wɔtratani Aya nì exo la kusumu kpɛ likpɔ ɔ.”
Yesu yɛ Eboe Dodoatɔ
14Agi Farisianɛ ma benu eboa la petee e, bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa lɛ ese linu si bɛdimɛ ni kibɔ ɛ. 15Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ mlenu banɔ baklɔ ba gi mlɛbitɛ isu ya tɔ mlaaŋwui banɔ gbã ní banɔ aŋu mɛ, pɔ̀ Aya ete mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kidiliɛ gi kizɛ kedzi ní banɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, kíyi kididɔ ní Aya aŋu mɛ.
16“Mose Ɔsã nɔ ni beboedoplɛ ba ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi bɛ biizɛwa axwɛ na gakɔ nani Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ lipoe le; dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, bɛɛpani ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ka Liboe Gbã nɛ su, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa eekeni idi si yitiku ni kigagla a. 17Pɔ̀ linu kidɔ plɔplɔ ɛki lifunu ne ni kesea tɔ bilila sani si ba yurɔ Ɔsã nɔ kapɛmi sisami gɔgɔa.
18“Onyime kakaa gi aayurɔ yedze e, xe aagbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, awa kihasi; lɛ onyime liɛ klɔ gi aagbani ɔdzɛ liɛ gi bɛyurɔ ɛ, yɛ fɛ awa kihasi.
Onyime Oxonetee nì Lazaro
19“Onyime oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi yɛ bidɔ kpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ, biŋa kedzi glegle lɛ azɛɛŋa ligbã liwe kakaa a. 20Ɔzíanete ɔtɔ fɛ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Lazaro e, ebi la ɛtsa ɔnɔ zizi yɛ, lɛ bɛzɛɛmani yɛ ní oxonetee yɛ kevunu ya. 21Azeegyo edi si yɛ amɔ kiŋaŋa sisami liɛ gi kizɛɛwɔli dɔnɔ ní oxonetee yɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ aʋa a. Kudroʋi yo kɔ kwizeemini yɛ ebi la mɛ.
22“Ɔzianetee etse lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba befeke ye tɔ ozeze ní Abraham su u. Oxonetee kyɛ etse lɛ bevive ye e. 23lɛ ní kifumoni ye me e, gi eze ní kuyeʋiyeʋi glegle me e, efeke yɛ aŋu na lɛ amɔ Abraham ní ɔdzage no gi Lazaro odi ní yɛ su i. 24Lɛ akpɛ ozi axwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔka Abraham! Di me asigaga, tɔ kpɛ Lazaro tɔ ɔkpɛ yɛ kiwlaʋi yɛ ní kuni me tɔ ɔkɔ yɔ mɛ kinemie, lɛ ese linu si malɛ ní kuyeʋiyeʋi me ní kifui liɛ mɛ.’
25“Pɔ̀ Abraham apani si, ‘mɛ obi ye plɛ aŋu si, ní wɔ ligbã́ nɛ mɛ ɛ wɔzi wɔ bidɔ gbã mɛ, ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi Lazaro kɔ azɛ bidɔ nyani nyani ʋɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, ɛɛmɔ isami nɛ ní ya, lɛ wɔ́ wɔli ní kuyeʋiyeʋi yo me e. 26Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, kupɛ ʋidi kufini ní blɔ ni mlɔ kusi, gi kwikisi banama gi bɛpɛ si bɛtsa ɛdɔni ní ya ɛba mlɔ klɔ ɛ, batrátanɔ, nite me ke ɔ́nɔnɔ ɔ́tradɔ ní mlɔ klɔ ɛba ní ya gi kulɛ ɛ.’
27“Lɛ oxonete apani si, ‘Kɔlɔ ɛ, maki wɔ litukpo ɔka Abraham, kpɛ Lazaro ní mɔka kepea mɛ, 28níklɔ gi mɛ beneminyime tietsu balɛ ɛ. Tɔ ɔzɛku le kpɛ ní ba mɛ tɔ bakíba kuyeʋiyeʋi uliɔ ya mɛ ɛ.
29“Lɛ Abraham apani si, ‘Mose ɔsã nɔ ni beboedoplɛ ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi bɛ bilɛ, wɔ benemi ba benu liboe lɛ klɔ gi bi basɛ ɛ.’
30“Oxonetee ebu le onu si, ‘Owo Ɔka Abraham,’ ‘Pɔ̀ xe ɔnutɔ aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe atrɛ ní baklɔ ɛ, biakyi ní ba eboe zimizi na mɛ.’ 31Pɔ̀ Abraham apani si, ‘Xe batrá nu Mose ni beboedoplɛ ba eboe la ɛ, batrázɛ lɛ xe ɔnutɔ ayɔ adɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ fɛ.’ ”

Title: LUKA 17
Content:
Eboe zimizi
1Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Kidiliɛ gi kiaki si banɔ biabitɛ eboe zimizi i, kitraba ba pɔ̀ litraze gagla a ɛki mlɔ mɛ iliɛ gi yɛ aʋa kiaga a xe kiaba ɛ! 2Liapɛ ɔki yɛ xe bɛka lihɔkla ʋidi ní yɛ ole lo o xe bɛkɔ yɛ ŋwia ɛkpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ, sani si tɔ ɔki banuvɔ ba ya mɛ tole ɔbitɛ liboe zimizi. 3Lɛ loso mlevu aŋu ní mlɔ kiboebitɛɛ su u!
“Xegi wɔ onemi nɛ ata wɔ ese e, tɛni yɛ; xegi ekyi yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, tɔ kɔkyɛ yɛ. 4Xe ata wɔ ese tegloele ní liwe tile me e, xe edzi aba wɔ klɔ tegloele si i, ‘Mekyi ɔna mɛ,’ lilɛ si kɔkyɛ yɛ.”
Kuziŋaa
5Lɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bɛsi ɔkaɛ si, “Kítɔ blɔ kuziŋaa kuze gagla sanɔ.”
6Lɛ ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Xe mlɔ kuziŋa kulɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami nɛ fɛ ɛ, mlaatani kupani si ose ɔlɔ si, ‘Kpaʋi isu ya ni wɔ igu ne tɔ zɛkpɛ isu ya ní axu la mɛ!’ lɛ aanu kutu kí mlɔ ɔ.
Ɔnɔsumu gbã ɛ yɛ Axwɛ na
7“Xegi mlɔ mɛ tole yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye ádɔ ɔnyrɔ mɛ loo iʋesi le aʋa odi klɔ edzì i, aasi yɛ si ɔkɔsi tɔ ɔŋa yɛ bidɔ mɛ na a? 8Aníte! boŋu i, kisi asi yɛ si, ‘kyí awla ní mɛ kiŋaŋaɛ su, tɔ ka kusa ole tɔ pe me gi mɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ xe mɛɛŋwɛ kuda ɛ; lɛ klɔ kede e, tɔ wuiŋa wɔ bidɔ mɛ.’ 9Ɔnɔsumu ye ɔ́ziã ɖase ɛki isã nɛ aʋa gi abitɛ ɛ, loo aziã a? 10Niteme ke mlɔ fɛ xe mlɛbitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bɛsi mlɔ si mlabitɛ ɛ, mlapani si, ‘Banɔsumu ko kunu; blɔ axwɛ ko kwiwa.’ ”
Yesu Ayɔni Benyime Liɔfɔ
11Agi Yesu azaatrɛ ní Yerusalem i, aga Samaria ni Galilea kumɔ aʋa. 12Gi atrátiku ní kamami katɔ mɛ ɛ, benyime liɔfɔ gi bɛɛnyà kunya kyikyi yɔ bɛtsani yɛ ɛ. Bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no 13lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi gagla si, “Yesu! Ɔkaɛ! Dí blɔ asigaga a!”
14Yesu amɔ ba lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlaki kusumu yo baka ba batapo mlo edi.” Gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si ba isu ya idra.
15Agi ba mɛ tole amɔ si yɛ isu ya idra ɛ, edzi aba, lɛ azɛɛkpɔ̀ Aya ni ole gagla a. 16Adɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ní Yesu ketù ya lɛ edo yɛ ɖase e. Onyimee eze Samaria ɔnɛ.
17Yesu eʋi si, “Aní benyime liɔfɔ su ɛdra na a?, Nífɔ ɔgɔtole gɔgɔ ba balɛ ɛ? 18Ege lɛ loso ɔbaba tole liɛ ko edzi aba do Aya ɖase e?” 19Lɛ Yesu apani asi yɛ si, “Yɔ tɔ ga trɛ; wɔ kuziŋa kwiyɔni wɔ.”
Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ka kubabaa
20Farisianɛ batɔ beʋi Yesu lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kiaba ɛ, Ebu le onu aki ba si, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, kátraba ŋwisi bidɔ gi biamɔ kinɛ ɛ. 21Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trapani si, ‘Dí, imɔ ka ní ya a! loo imɔ ka ni ní kɔlɔ ɔ!’ lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, kakpasi ní mlɔ mɛ.”
22Lɛ asi badɔkpasi ba si, “Lipoe le litraba gi mlaapɛ si mlɛɛmɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye yɛ ewe a la klɔ la mɛ tile, pɔ mlatrá mɔ lɛ ɛ. 23Banɔ batɔ biaze gi biasi mlɔ si i, ‘Dí, imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ!’ loo, ‘Dí imɔ yɛ niya!’ Pɔ̀ mlakíze ni ba kude e.’ 24Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi dzeni ye izɛtsi kifu yɛ ɛ, xe kizeekle dɔni ayɛɛ kapɛ tiele tsini kapɛ ʋla ɛ, nite ke Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaze ní yɛ liwe le aʋa. 25Pɔ̀ ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, lilɛ si ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle tɔ banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla bekyi kede akpɛ yɛ ɛ. 26Kiliɛ gi lize ni Noa lipoe le e, nite ke liaze ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ewe la mɛ ɛ. 27Banima bɛzɛŋa lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ ɛ, benyime ba ni badzɛ ba bɛzɛgbani ba ahanuglɔ ba kɔzɛna ni liwe lɛ gi Noa eti eku ní onitsahu lo me xe kuni yo kwiyi i, xe kwiba ɛgbani ba petee sɛnɔ ɛ.
28“Liaze ŋwisi Lot lipoe le. Banima bɛzɛŋa lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ ɛ, bezee dzi lɛ bɛzɛda bidɔ ɔ, bɛzɛkpɛ bidɔ lɛ bɛzɛɛwa agba a. 29Liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi Lot edo ní Sodom i, lɛ kifu yɛ ni kifu yɛ akla na ɛdɔ dɔni lifunu ne e, xe eye ba petee e. 30Nite ke litraze xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaŋwi i.
31“Ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini ní yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔki ple eku ní kepea mɛ si yitrɛkɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ; nite ke ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ni ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa ɛ, okídzi trɛ kepea mɛ si yizɛkɔ kididɔ ɔ. 32Mlaplɛ aŋu ní Lot yedze aʋa! 33Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ; lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aalila yɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aabu le. 34Ní elesi ala klɔ mɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banɔ tiaʋa biafɛ ní ɔtɔsi tole aʋa; pɔ̀ biasɛ ni tole e, lɛ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ. 35Badzɛ tiaʋa biaze kuhɔɔ aʋa gi biazɛhɔ adeʋi, biasɛ ni tole pɔ̀ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ. 36Benyime tiaʋa biazɛwa axwɛ na ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ, biasɛ ni tole, lɛ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ.”
37Badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, nifɔ ɔ?” Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Níklɔ gi kidɔ tsetse kifini i, níklɔ opéte ʋa bizɛkpɛ likpɔ.”

Title: LUKA 18
Content:
Abee ní Ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze Nì Otsixwa yɛ su
1Lɛ Yesu ebu abee aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba tɔ yikɔ ɛbasɛ ba si liziã si bazɛxwa Aya lipoe kakaa tɔ ba ina nɛ ikí gbɔ̀ ɔ. 2Apani si “Otsixwa ɔtɔ eze ní ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ gi óse Aya a, lɛ ɔ́kɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ. 3Ɔtrɛtrɛ ɔtɔ yedze fɛ eze ní ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ gi azɛɛba yɛ klɔ nì kugyodi si tɔ ɔtsa litsi ɔki yɛ ɛ, Apani si, ‘Tsa litsi kí mɛ ní mɛ nì ɔnɔ gi apɛ si yitafa mɛ kusi i!’
4“Pɔ̀ kɔki lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ ɛ, otsixwa yɛ ɔ́wa lixwɛxwɛ ní lɛ su. Gɔgɔɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si meʋíse Aya loo kɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ, 5pɔ̀ kɔkpɛ kunugu yo gi ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze liɛ ɛɛkpɛ mɛ loso ɛ, maadi lɛ aʋa si matsa litsi gyɔgyɔ aki yɛ ɛ. Xe aníte e, yɛ mɔklɔ kubaba lipoe kakaa ɛ, kwikpɛ mɛ kupepe.’ ”
6Lɛ Ɔkaɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Mlenu liboe lɛ gi otsixwa nyani nyani liɛ klɔ apani i. 7Kɔ Aya ɔ́tratsa litsi kí yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ banima gi beebemi ikí yɛ elesi nì kemize kí kupɔnɔ na a? Ɔ́trakɔsi xe aapɔni ba na a? 8Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, aakɔsi aatsa litsi kiba. Pɔ̀ xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba kesea aʋa ɛ, aamɔ kuziŋa na?”
Abee Ní Farisiɔnɛ Ni Ɔbɔgyɔɛ Su
9Yesu ebu abee akí banama gi bɛka ní isu ya aʋa si bɛɛpɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe bɛɛplɛ banɔgɔgɔ ba kesea ɛ. 10“Liba lɛ mɛ si benyime tiaʋa bemu itrɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ Aya ɔxwa kɔ: tole eze Farisiɔnɛ, lɛ ɔʋlaɛ eze ɔbɔgyɔ ɔ.
11“Farisiɔnɛ ebu isu ya lidze lɛ ɔlɛ kedu ya xe axwa Aya si, ‘Medo wɔ́ Aya ɖase e, si kuŋazi kúma mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, katafa kama mɛ mɛ̀, lɛ ménu ɔhasinɛ ɛ, ŋwisi banɔ gɔgɔ ba kinɛ ɛ. Medo wɔ ɖase si máma ŋwisi ɔbɔgyɔ liɛ kɔlɔ kinɛ ɛ. 12Mizɛɛnya onugu taʋa ní ogle no me, lɛ mizɛɛki wɔ mɛ bidɔ mɔmɔ ʋɛ kapɛ liɔfɔa a.’
13“Pɔ̀ ɔbɔgyɔɛ alɛɛ ní ɔdzage no lɛ ómu ni yɛ aŋu mɛ lifunu ne kyɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ azɛɛsa awla yɛ kakɔa mɛ lɛ apani si, ‘Aya, di me asigaga, mɛ ɔnɔ zimizi ye e!’
14“Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, aní Farisiɔnɛ pɔ̀ ɔbɔgyɔɛ yɛ liboe ligyɔ ní Aya kɔ ɔ, xe bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeemu ni isu ya ɛ, biapleni ye, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeepleni isu ya ɛ biamuni ye.”
Yesu Akrira Banuvɔ ba
15Banɔ batɔ bɛmani ba bebi ba ní Yesu klɔ tɔ ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa, tɔ ɔkrira ba. Agi badɔkpasi ba bɛmɔ nite e, bɛtɛni ba, 16pɔ̀ Yesu axwa banuvɔ ba amani yɛ isu ya lɛ apani si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔklɔ lɛ mlakítsi kudeonu aki ba a, lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, ba elu kanɛ kenu. 17Mɛɛsi mlɔ si! Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɔ́zɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ kinɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratiku ka mɛ liwewe e.”
Oxonete Ɔʋaŋa yɛ
18Yuda ɔnɛ ɔka ɔtɔ eʋi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ gbã ɛ, ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e?”
19Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔɛxwa mɛ si ɔgbã a? Ɔ́nɔnɔ ónu ɔgbã, Aya ko. 20Wote isã nɛ: ‘Wukísɛ ádzɛ ni enyimeboe e; wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukízuru u; wukisɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔ awla a; kpɛ kubùbù ní wɔka ni wone su.’ ”
21Onyimee ebu le onu si, “Dɔni mɛ kunuvɔ mɛ ké mɛɛbitɛ ni isã nɛ pɔ́ aʋa a.”
22Agi Yesu enu liboe lɛ ɛ, asi yɛ si, “Kigɔ́ kidɔ tile dzɛ gi lilɛ si bitɛ ɛ. Da wɔ bidɔ mɛ petee tɔ kɔ kibɔe kí bazianete ba, tɔ wɔamɔ exo ní lifunu ne; lɛ kede e, bá tɔ gaze ni mɛ kude e.”
23Pɔ̀ gi onyimee enu liboe le e, Líku ye isami i, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu. 24Yesu edi ye lɛ apani si, “Liaaze gagla xe bexonete ba biati uku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ! 25Sugba ɛ, liaze plɔplɔ ɛki kposɔɛ si ɔga trɔ̀ni yɛ liwu le me odo sani si oxonetee oti oku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.”
26Banama gi benu liboe le e, beʋi ye si, “Kɔ, nyaŋwɛ aamɔ kubúbú i?”
27Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kidiliɛ gi ɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kubitɛ ɛ, kilɛ plɔplɔ ɛki Aya yɛ kubitɛ.”
28Lɛ Petro apani si, “Dí! Kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa xe kwikuni wɔ kude e.”
29Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi ayurɔ yɛ kepe loo yedze loo beneminyime loo bapɔnɛ loo bebi kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa loso e, 30aamɔ bidɔ glegle sanɔ ni abla kelea mɛ kɔpɔni ligbã moblo le ní kelea lia gi kiaba mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu Apani Dzɛ Ní Yɛ Kutseo Su
31Yesu ebú badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka lɛ asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwitrɛ ni Yerusalem niklɔ kidɔ kakaa gi beboedoplɛ ba bɛŋwlimi ni Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye su i, kiaba kɛ mɛ. 32Biakpɛ yɛ awla ki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ, gi biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa, biakpini ye, lɛ biabu sita bali yɛ aʋa a. 33Biafiaʋi yɛ litam lɛ biaye ye e, pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aadzi ligbã́.”
34Pɔ̀ badɔkpasi ba bénu la ya litɔtɔ ese e; eboe la ese kununu yo kwikpo ba, lɛ béte kidiliɛ su gi Yesu azɛɛpani i.
Yesu Ayɔni Kaŋupo Ɔdɔʋi ye
35Gi Yesu eti apɔni Yerixo e, kaŋupo atɔ keze ní kudeo su, gi keze eʋi bidɔ ɔ. 36Gi enu linɔkpi le onu gi lizɛza ɛ, eʋi si, “Liboe woli liiba a?” 37Bɛsi yɛ si, “Yesu Nazaret Ɔnɛɛ yɛ ɛɛza.”
38Lɛ akpɛ ozi si, “Yesu! Dawid Yebi ye! Di me asigaga!”
39Banama gi beze ni ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, bɛtɛni yɛ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si ɔgɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀ akpɛ ozi lo gagla asanɔ si, “Dawid Yebi ye! Di me asigaga!”
40Lɛ Yesu alɛɛ xe aki si bagbani kaŋupoa mani yɛ ɛ. Gi eti apɔni yɛ ɛ, Yesu eʋi ye si, 41“Ege wɔpɛ si mibitɛ kiwɔ ɔ?”
Ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, mapɛ si mimɔ dzɛ.”
42Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kɔlɔ mɔ! Wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔ ni wɔ.” 43Onyimee bimbi ʋe bidra kyɔŋ lɛ ekuni Yesu kude e, gi azɛɛkpɔ̀ Aya a. Gi linɔkpi le limɔ nite e, ba pɔ́ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya.

Title: LUKA 19
Content:
Yesu Ni Zaxeo
1Gi Yesu eti eku ní Yerixo o, xe azɛɛza ɛ, 2Babɔgyɔ ba ɔka ɔtɔ eze níklɔ gi yɛ linyi lize Zaxeo, eze oxonete. 3Azeekeni edi si yimɔ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi Yesu onu i, pɔ̀ eze ɔnɔ kpekpe lɛ ɔ́tani Yesu kumɔ kɔkpɛ linɔkpi le loso o. 4Nite si ese ekú ɔtɔ kí linɔkpi le lɛ azeemu ni ose ɔtɔ mɛ si yimɔ Yesu gi atrága niklɔ ɛza ɛ.
5Agi Yesu ana niklɔ ɛ, emuni aŋu na lɛ asi Zaxeo si, “Kɔsi tɔ ple, Zaxeo, lɛ ese linu si wɔ kepea mɛ mátraze omono o.” 6Zaxeo akɔsi eple ní ose lo me, lɛ azɛ yɛ ni isami i.
7Banama pɔ́ gi bɛmɔ lɛ ɛ, bekpese kutɛ si, “Onyime liɛ ya atrɛ edzì ɔbaba ɛki onyime gi onu ɔnɔ zimizi i!”
8Pɔ̀ Zaxeo ayɔ ɔlɛɛ, lɛ asi Ɔkaɛ si, “Ta kutu, Ɔkaɛ! maakɔ mɛ bidɔ mɔmɔ ʋɛ mɛ kulɛlɛɔ kapɛ aki bazianete ba, lɛ xe memi ɔnutɔ akpɛ fɛ ɛ, Maadzini kidiliɛ klɔ ede tene kutsa ki yɛ.”
9Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kubúbú kwiba kepea lia mɛ omono, lɛ ese linu si onyime liɛ fɛ ɛ, onu Abraham yɛ osobi. 10Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba si yipɛ tɔ yibu banama gi bɛlila ɛ.”
Abee Ní Sika Kibɔ Su u
11Gi banima bɛzɛɛta yɛ kutu i, Yesu ebu abee aki ba. Yesu eti apɔni Yerusalem lɛ bezeegyo edi si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kiaba kpekpemi i. 12Lɛ asi ba si, “Ɔka ʋidi ɔtɔ eze gi azaatrɛ ní kese katɔ aʋa gi bɛtredu ye kukusi i, xe adzi ba a. 13Xe aasɛ ɛ, axwa yɛ banɔsumu liɔfɔ ba lɛ akí ba mɛ ɔkakaa sika kibɔ tile lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mlakɔ kɛ akpɛ axwɛwawa mɛ,’ tɔ mledi kidiliɛ gi mlamɔ trɔ xe masɛ ɛ.”
14“Pɔ̀ yɛ akɔanɛ ma bápɛ yɛ liboe, lɛ loso e, bɛkpɛ banɔ ní yɛ kude tɔ basɛ okusi ʋidi ye si, ‘Kúpɛ onyime liɛ si oze blɔ okusi.’
15“Pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, bedu ye kukusi yo xe edzì aba. Lɛ aki si bɛxwa yɛ banɔsumu ba ɛmani yɛ klɔ si tɔ yitè kidiliɛ gi bɛmɔ ɛtrɔ ní kibɔɛ liɛ gi yɛ aki ba aʋa ɛ.
16“Ɔtɔpu yɛ aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, mamɔ sika bibɔ liɔfɔ kɔpɔni kiliɛ klɔ gi wɔ kimɛ ɛ.’
17“Asi yɛ si, ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wonu ɔnɔsumu gbã! Agi wodo anukwarɛ ni eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, Maakɔ wɔ odu ni imaʋidi liɔfɔ onu.’
18“Ɔnɔsumu ʋlaɛ fɛ aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, mamɔ sika bibɔ tutsu kɔpɔni kiliɛ klɔ gi wɔ kimɛ ɛ.’
19“Lɛ asi iliɛ ya si, ‘Wɔaze ní ima ʋidi titsu onu.’
20“Ɔnɔsumu dzedze aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, imɔ wɔ sika yɛ kibɔɛ; mabla kɛ ní kavlɔʋi mɛ. 21Mazeesé wo, lɛ ese linu si wonu onyime gagla. Wuzɛɛkɔ kidiliɛ gi kínu wɔ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ wuzɛɛkɔ bidɔ gi wɔ́kpɛ ɛ.’
22“Yɛ ɔkaɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Wɔ ɔnɔsumu litukpo me gagla onete! Maakɔ wɔtutɔ wɔ eboe la bu wɔ lipɔ! Wote si menu ɔnɔ gagla, mizɛɛkɔ kidiliɛ gi kínu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ mizɛɛkɔ bidɔ gi mákpɛ ɛ. 23Agi wote nite e, ege lɛ loso wɔ́kɔ mɛ kibɔɛ ɔkpɛ ní kibɔɛ ɔbla klɔ ɔ; atɔ xe medzi i, maazi kɛ ni kitrɔtrɔ ɛ?’
24“Lɛ asi banama gi bɛlɛɛ niklɔ si, ‘Mlazi sika yɛ kibɔɛ ní yɛ awla tɔ mlakɔ kɛ aki ɔnɔsumu liɛ gi bibɔ liɔfɔ bɛ bilɛ ní yɛ awla ɛ.’
25“Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si, ‘Ɔka, bibɔ liɔfɔ bilɛ ni yɛ awla kooko!’
26“Ebu le onu si, ‘Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa awla gi kidɔ kilɛ ɛ, biapɔnɔ ɔki yɛ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ awla gi kididɔ kima ɛ, kisisami iliɛ gi kilɛ yɛ awla ɛ, biazɛ kɛ. 27Pɔ̀ mɛ ahwafianɛ ma gi bápɛ si mize ba okusi i, mlagbani ba amanɔ tɔ mleye ba ní mɛ aŋu mɛ.’ ”
Yesu Eti eku ní Yerusalem
28Gi Yesu apani eboa la ya pɔ́ ɛ, eze ní ba ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem i. 29Agi beti apɔni Betfage ni Betania níklɔ gi bizɛxwa si Kumu yɔ ise le ketokpaa su i, akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tiaʋa ní yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ, lɛ asi ba si, 30“Mlatrɛ ní kamamia ní mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ; xe mleti iku i, mlaamɔ tedzi obi gi bɛkpɛ ogbe no me e, gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trɔ ní yɛ aʋa ódi i. Mleble ye amani niya. 31Xe ɔnutɔ aaʋi mlo si ege lɛ loso mleeble ye na ɛ, mlasi yɛ si Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ.”
32Bekú kudeo me lɛ bɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ. 33Agi bezeeble tedzi obi ye e, yɛ benete ba beʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mleeble ye e?”
34Bebú le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ.”
35Lɛ bɛgbani tedzi obi ye mani Yesu i, lɛ bɛkɔ ba ewu la ɛtrɔ ní ɔgaɛ aʋa lɛ bɛpɔni Yesu xe emu atrɔ ɛ. 36Agi azɛɛkpɛ yɛ atsinɔ ɛ, banima bene bá ewu la ɛplɛ ní kudeo me.
37Agi eti apɔni Yerusalem i, ni niklɔ gi kudeo kwikyi ple ní Olif ye ise le ketokpaa su i, yɛ badɔkpasi ba likpi le likpese Aya ɖase kudo ni kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ni ozi gagla ní eboe ʋidi glegle ala la gi bɛmɔ su i si, 38“Aya ɔkrira okusi ye klɔ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e! Kusuyɔ ní lifunu ne ni kusudra kí Aya!”
39Lɛ Farisianɛ batɔ ní ɔha lɔ̀ kusi i, bɛpani kí Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kpɛ ɔsã kí wɔ badɔkpasi ba tɔ bagɔ tsriɖi!”
40Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi bɛgɔ tsriɖi i, akla na ɔtutɔ aakpɛ ozi lo.”
Yesu Ebemi ní Yerusalem Litukpo
41Agi eti apɔnɔ xe amɔ ɔma ʋidi no e, ebemi ní lɔ litukpo. 42Lɛ apani si, “Atɛsi mlete omono kidiliɛ gi kízia ɛki mlɔ kusuyɔ ɛ! Pɔ̀ abla ɛ bekpo ke ní mlɔ su. 43Lipoe le litraba gi mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma biaklani mlɔ lɛ biatsí mlɔ bede ʋa, lɛ biapɔ́ mlɔ ɔkpɛ ní kapɛ kakaa. 44Biayaʋi wɔ petee lɛ biaye banama gi balɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ, batráyurɔ likla ɛtɔtɔ ní lɛ ozeklɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si mlamɔ lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya aba si yibu mlo o!”
Yesu Atrɛ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ Mɛ
45Lɛ Yesu eti eku Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ekpese badɔda ba kukpikpinɔ dono e, 46asi ba si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Liboe le me si, Aya apani si ‘Mɛ Ligba lɛ ɛ, biaxwa lɛ si Aya lixwa Gba.’ Pɔ̀ mlekyi le ɛbitɛ beze ba òkpò kɔ́ ɔ!”
47Liwe kakaa Yesu abasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ. Kusumu yo baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛpɛ si beeye ye, 48pɔ̀ bámɔ kudeonu xe biaye ye, lɛ ese linu si banima pɔ́ bezeenu yɛ eboe la a, lɛ bápɛ si liboeboe lidɔ ba ɛza a.

Title: LUKA 20
Content:
Beʋi Yesu Yɛ Kigaglaɛ kɛ Ɔdɔ Klɔ
1Liwetɔ lɛ gi Yesu azabasɛ banima bidɔ mɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, xe azaasɔli Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛ, Kusumu yo baka ba, Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛba, 2lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Si blɔ, kude woli wɔmɔ xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya a? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kude o?”
3Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Abla ɛ mlaki tɔ miʋi mlo liboe. Mlasi mɛ, 4Nyaŋwɛ aki Yohanes kigaglaɛ xe azaakpɛ kuni yo aki banima a? Aya kɔ́ lidɔ loo dɔni banima kɔ́ na a?”
5Lɛ bekpese eboe la kuvu udi ní ba tsali kusi si, “Liboe woli kwiapani i? Xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni Aya kɔ ɛ,’ aaʋi blo si, ‘Kɔlɔ, ege lɛ loso, mlaazi Yohanes aʋa aŋa ɛ?’ 6Pɔ xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni banima klɔ ɛ,’ linɔkpi lɛ ya pɔ́ liasa blɔ akla, lɛ ese linu si bɛzi lɛ si Yohanes eze oboedoplɛ.”
7Lɛ loso e bebu le onu si, “Kúte niklɔ gi kidɔ ɔ.”
8Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔlɔ mɛ fɛ, mátrasi mlɔ kude kɔkɔ kuliɔ gi mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.”
Abee ní Ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa Bedidi ba Su
9Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki banima si: “Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi awa wain ɔnyrɔ, lɛ akɔ lɔ aki ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba si biatsa ɔgyɔ ɔki yɛ lɛ asɛ ní kepea lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ ɛ. 10Agi wain yɛ ligu nɛ lina ɛ, akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu tole atsisi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba tɔ ɔzɛ yɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔmani yɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bekusi ɔnɔsumu ye e, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi iwla pluplu i. 11Lɛ atsisi ɔnɔsumu dzedze e; pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bekusi yɛ fɛ ɛ, bɛkpɛ yɛ kuyé, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi iwla pluplu i. 12Nite si atsisi ɔnɔsumu tánɛ; ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛkpɛ yɛ libi fɛ, lɛ bɛkpikpini yɛ.
13“Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee eʋi isu ya si, ‘Kitɛ mabitɛ ɛ? Maatsisi mɛ ɔtutɔ mobinyimee gi malɔ ɛ; nyafɛ biakpɛ kubùbù yo ní yɛ su!’
14“Pɔ̀ gi ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bɛpani nì bahanuglɔ ba si, ‘Mledi, onetee Yebi ye iliɛ ya. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye, atɔ yɛ kaŋasea kedzi blɔ kanɛ!’ 15Lɛ loso e behe ye ebú ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ beye ye e.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “kitɛ wain ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aabitɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba ya ɛ? 16Aaba, kɔ eye benyime ba klɔ, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze awla ɛ.” Agi banima benu le e, bɛ pani si, “Likíba lɛ mɛ!”
17Yesu edi ba lɛ eʋi si, “Kɔlɔ ege, liboe lɛ ya gi bɛŋwlimi libasɛ ɛ?
“ ‘Likla ɛlɛ klɔ gi bagbatrɔ ba bɛyurɔ si lima liboeboe me e,
lɛ lidzi ogó no aʋa likla nɛ ɛ.’
18“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aadɔ likla ɛlɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, avini kukpe kukpe; lɛ xe likla ɛlɛ klɔ liadɔ ní ɔnutɔ aʋa ɛ, liahɔ yɛ pliplipli.”
Kuʋiʋi Ní Kibɔ Gyɔ̀gyɔ̀ Su
19Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni kusumu yo baka ba bɛpɛ́ kudeonu si bévu Yesu ní niklɔ kyɔŋ, lɛ ese linu si betè si basu ebu abee; pɔ̀ bezese banima a. 20Lɛ loso e bɛpɛ kudeonu lɛ bɛtsa ní kikpokpo me. Bɛtsa kibɔ ɛki benyime batɔ, tɔ babitɛ ŋwisi banɔ gbã benu u, pɔ̀ tɔ bapunu Yesu gani beʋiʋi me e, tɔ biakɔ yɛ ɔki Roma banɛ ma kesea ɔʋadi ye yɛ kigagla ɛ. 21Banɔpunu ba ya ba ɛ, beʋi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite si wɔ eboe la gi wuzɛɛpani i, ni kidiliɛ gi wuzɛɛbasɛ banima ɛ, bina. Kwite si woʋidi ɔnɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ wuzɛɛbasɛ anukwarɛɛ ní Aya yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ ki ɔnɔ onu u. 22Si blɔ, liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su si kugyɔ kibɔ ɔki Roma banɛ ma Ɔka ʋidi ye, loo kukígyɔ na a?”
23Pɔ̀ Yesu amɔ ba ìmɔ nɛ bede ʋa, lɛ asi ba si, 24“Mlabasɛ mɛ kibɔ pititi itɔ. Nyaŋwɛ aŋu mɛ ni linyí lítiní kɛ aʋa a?”
Bebu le onu si, “Roma banɛ ma ɔka ʋidi ye.” 25Lɛ loso Yesu asi ba si, “Xe nite e, kɔlɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Roma banɛ ma ɔka ʋidi ye kinɛ ɛ, mlatsa kɛ aki yɛ, tɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Aya kinɛ ɛ, mlakɔ kɛ aki Aya a.”
26Ní banima aŋu na mɛ klɔ ɛ, bátani yɛ kuvu ní liboeboe me, Ni kiliɛ gi ebu le onu i, lidzi onugutsetse ki ba lɛ loso bɛgɔ tsriɖi i.
Kudɔbasɛ ní Kuyɔyɔ Dɔni Bekpo ʋa mɛ su
27Lɛ Zadukianɛ batɔ, gi bázɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa si banima biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ bɛpani si, 28“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose aŋwlimi kí blɔ ní ɔsã nɔ mɛ si, ‘Xe onyime etse e, xe ye yedze agɔ ɔ pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ bebi i, lilɛ si onyime liɛ klɔ yeneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi gi biakɔ si benu yenemi ye okpo ye yɛ bebi i.’ 29Liba lɛ mɛ si beneminyime tiegloele beze; otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ lɛ etse e, pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ obi i. 30Lɛ ɔʋlaɛ agbani ɔdzɛɛ ɛ, 31lɛ ɔtanɛɛ fɛ ɛ. Nite ke lize ki ba tiegloele ba pɔ́ xe betse e, gi bápɔ bebi i. 32Gɔgɔɛ, ɔdzɛɛ kyɛ etse. 33Abla ɛ, ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi bekpo ʋa biayɔ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze e, gi ba tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani yɛ edi i?”
34Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Benyime ni badzɛ ní kelea lia mɛ ɛ, bizɛgbani ba ahanuglɔ ba, 35pɔ̀ benyime ni badzɛ ba ya gi bɛna si biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe biaze ligbã́ nɛ ní kelea lia klɔ gi kiaba mɛ ɛ, batrágbani baglɔ ɔ. 36Biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba lɛ batrátani kutse tɔ ɔ. Benu Aya yɛ Yebi, lɛ ese linu si bɛyɔni ba dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. 37Lɛ Mose ebu le abasi mɔmɔmɔ si biayɔ nì bekpo ʋa. Ní bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ klɔ mɛ gi apani ní ose lo gi ɛɛsɔ su i, apani ní Ɔkaɛ su si; onu ‘Abraham yɛ Aya, Isak yɛ Aya ani Yakob yɛ Aya.’ 38Yɛ ónu bekpo ʋa Aya boŋu i, bagbagbe ba ba Aya onu, lɛ yɛ ba pɔ́ balɛ ligbã nɛ akɔ ɔ.”
39Lɛ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Wobu le onu mɔmɔ!” 40Lɛ ɔna óze ba lipo si biaʋi ye liboeboe tɔ ɔ.
Nyaŋwɛ Yebi Onu Ɔnɔbu ye e
41Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kitɛ mɛ biapani si ɔnɔbu ye aaze Dawid yɛ osobi i? 42Gi Dawid ɔtutɔ apani ní Psalomo ʋa keplekpa mɛ si:
“ ‘Aya asi Mɛ Ɔkaɛ si,
“ze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ
43kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi maakɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kpɛ ní wɔ kukliseo.’ ”
44Dawid axwa yɛ si ‘Ɔkaɛ’; lɛ Kitɛ liaze si Ɔnɔbu ye aatani Dawid yɛ osobi kuze e?”
Yesu Aki kugbagba si Bedi mumɔ ní Ɔsã nɔ Badɔbasɛ ba Su
45Agi banima pɔ́ bɛzɛta yɛ kutu i, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, 46“Mleze nì aŋu ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba su; gi bizɛpɛ si biazɛga za ní ba ewu gblamadza la mɛ ɛ, xe bɛzɛpɛ si bazɛpani ba nì kubùbù ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa a; gi bizɛkya ibùbùzekɔ ɛki isu ya a, gi bɛgɔ ɛplɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ, ani ikɔ gbã nɛ ní iŋaŋakplɔ nɛ su i. 47Lɛ bizɛɛpɛ kudeonu ní batrɛtrɛ ba bedze ba su ŋwisi kipɔnɔ si bɛpɔni ba na a, pɔ̀ kɔ bezuru ba kupeo o, lɛ kede e, bizɛbasɛ isu ya nì Aya kuxwaxwa gblamadza! Ba kutuheheo kwianyani koŋ!”

Title: LUKA 21
Content:
Ɔtrɛtrɛ Yedze ɔtɔ yɛ Kagyɔa
1Yesu edi aklanɔ lɛ amɔ bexonete ba gi bɛzɛgyɔ ba bidɔ mɛ kpɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ kepimia mɛ ɛ, 2lɛ amɔ ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze opiplinete ɔtɔ gi akɔ yɛ ɔla kyikyi yɛ kibɔ sisami itɔ akpɛ ní kepimia mɛ ɛ. 3Apani si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛ,” si “ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze ɔzianete liɛ ya ɛ, agyɔ kibɔ asani banɔ gɔgɔ ba pɔ́. 4Lɛ ese linu si, banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, bɛgyɔ ba bibɔ ʋɛ dɔni kidiliɛ mɛ gi biabu kɔ ní ba exo la onu u; pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtrɛtrɛɛ yedzee kɔ akɔ yɛ kidɔ kakaa akɔ gi kɛ aʋa aaze ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.”
Yesu Apani ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ Kuyaʋi yɔ Su
5Badɔkpasi batɔ bɛzɛpani ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ su, kiliɛ gi lipedi i, ni lɛ akla gbã na ani bidɔkɔkɔɛ ʋɛ gi bɛɛki Aya ɛ. Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si, 6“Bidɔ bɛ ya petee gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, lipoe le litrába gi likla ɛtɔtɔ lítraze ní lɛ ozekɔ ɔ, la petee aatsra.”
Baxixa ni Keduyɔyɔ Biaba
7Beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, lipoe woli liaba lɛ mɛ ɛ? Lɛ liboe woli liaba gi liabasɛ si lipoe le lina si liba lɛ mɛ ɛ?”
8Ebu le onu si, “Mleze ni aŋu; tɔ bakímeni mlo o. Banɔ glegle biaba mɛ linyi ne me, lɛ biapani si, ‘Mɛ menu ye!’ lɛ ‘Lipoe le lina!’ Pɔ̀ mlakikuni ba kude e. 9Mlakíse lifu xe mlenu bigu ʋɛ ni keduyɔyɔ onu u; la ya pɔ́ ɛtraba kpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ líbasɛ si kelea lidu le lina kyɔŋ ɔ.”
10Atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Kese kiayɔ kedu ní kese su; lɛ kaʋaŋaa kiayɔ kedu ní kaʋaŋaa su. 11Kese kiahwa nyani nyani lɛ kuʋɛ ni bànya biadɔ ní ikɔ glegle; lɛ eboe mamɔ edi ni eboe kulifu aaba dɔni lifunu ne e.
12“Pɔ̀ xe able eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ ɛ, biayɔ kedu ní mlɔ su u; biavu mlo kɔ tɔ baxwa etsi ni mlo ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ lɛ biakpɛ mlɔ ní agba; biatsini mlɔ ní bekusi ba ni baʋaŋa ba aŋu mɛ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso. 13Lɛ ya liaze kudeonu mɔmɔ kí mlɔ tɔ mlaapani Liboe Gbã nɛ. 14Mlakíkpɛ isu ya kunugu kpɛ ɔtɔ ní kiliɛ gi mlaabú isu ya onu u, 15lɛ ese linu si maakí mlɔ eboa la, ni kuboeteo gi mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani la onu kulɛɛ loo la kunada a. 16Mlɔ bapɔnɛ ba ni beneminyime ba, mlɔ baŋanɛ ba, ni mlɔ baʋianɛ ba kyɛ; biakpɛ mlɔ awla lɛ biaye mlɔ mɛ batɔ ɔ. 17Ɔnɔ kakaa atrɔ mlɔ ahwafi kɔkpɛ mɛ loso. 18Pɔ̀ mlɔ litukpo le kuya tule kyɛ kútralila a. 19Mledu ɔkli kese gagla tɔ mlamɔ kubúbú.
Yesu Apani ní Yerusalem Kuyaʋi yɔ sú
20“Xe mlɛmɔ gi baguta ba bɛklani Yerusalem i, tɔ mlete si lɔ́ lìzizipoe le lina. 21Atɔ banama gi balɛ ní Yudea ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ; lɛ banama gi balɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, bedo; lɛ banama gi balɛ ní iʋa nɛ nì kumami nɛ mɛ ɛ, bakítiku ní ɔma ʋidi no me e. 22Lɛ ese linu si la klɔ ɛtráze kutuhehe ewe gi aaki eboa la gi bɛŋwlimi plɛ ɛ, aaba la mɛ. 23Lianyani ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ kí bamɛdzɛ ba ni bebine ba! Baxixa glegle biaba kesea lia aʋa, lɛ Aya yɛ kutuheheo kwiaba banɔ ba ya aʋa a. 24Banɔ batɔ biatse ní ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa onu, lɛ batɔ fɛ ɛ, biavu ba tsinɔ ní kuse dzedzeo petee aʋa. Lɛ babubitɛ ba biayaʋi Yerusalem kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi bɛki ba ɛ.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye yɛ Kubabàa
25“Eboe mamɔ edi la aaba liwo le, ɔdzidziɛ ani badzidziebi ʋa aʋa. Ní kesea aʋa ɛ, kuseo kwiaxixa, banima biase, axu la anyra na kuwawaa, lɛ ɔna aado ní banima lipo o. 26Banima biatse òkpokpo kɔkpɛ lifu ne gi béte kidiliɛ ɛ gi kitrába kesea aʋa a, lɛ ese linu si kudɔkpaa ní lifune e kwiahwa ní kɔ izeklɔ. 27Lɛ biamɔ ‘Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye’ gi atrába ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa a ni kigagla ní kuklekle ʋidi me. 28Xe la ya ekpese e, mlayɔlɛɛ tɔ ɔna okú ní mlɔ lipo, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ kubúbú yo kwiti pɔnɔ.”
Bidɔ Kpasikpasi ni Ogbose lo Su
29Lɛ Yesu ebú abee aki ba si, “Mlegyo ogbose lo ni ise gɔgɔ lɛ edi i. 30Xe mlɛmɔ lɛ awlakpa vuvu na ɛ, mlete si kedzenilea keti pɔnɔ. 31Niteme ke, xe mlɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, mlete si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔnɔ.
32“Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, eboa la pɔ́ atrába la mɛ ɛ, xe ableke banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ, biatse. 33Lifunu ne ni kesea biaza, pɔ̀ mɛ eboe la atráza kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ.
Liziã si Mleze ni Aŋu
34“Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ! Mlakíki kuŋwɛŋwɛ kpaŋukpaŋu, kumumu ni begyodi ní kelea mɛ su tɔ bizɛ mlɔ lipoe le xe aníte e, liwe lɛ klɔ lialili mlo 35ŋwisi kupè kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si liaba ɔnɔ kakaa aʋa ní kelea mɛ ɔkɔ kakaa. 36Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ tɔ, mlaxwa Aya lipoe kakaa si ɔki mlɔ kigaglaɛ, tɔ mlaga eboa la pɔ́ gi ɛtrába mɛ, tɔ mlalɛɛ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
37Ni ewe a la klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu azabasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ xe ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, azɛɛza ketokpaa lia gi bizɛxwa si olif ye ise le ketokpa aʋa. 38Lɛ livlɛ kakaa ɛ, banima pɔ́ bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ tɔ benu yɛ eboe la a.

Title: LUKA 22
Content:
Kusumu yo baka ba bɛtrɔ si Biaye Yesu
1Aklamɔnyasi na liwe ŋaŋa nɛ gi lɛ bizɛxwa si Kutseolidɔzawe le litipɔnɔ ɔ. 2Kusumu yo baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, bezese banima lɛ loso e, bɛzɛ pɛ́ kudeonu gi biaye Yesu ní kikpokpo me e.
Yuda Adimɛ Si Yɛ aabu Yesu Kukɔ
3Lɛ Satana eti eku u ní Yuda gi bizɛxwa si Iskariot i, gi onu badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole me e. 4Lɛ loso Yuda edo atrɛ lɛ ezeegu kunugu yo ni kusumu yo baka ba ni lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba ba baka ba kiliɛ gi aabu Yesu kukɔ ɔki ba ɛ. 5Isami iku ba, lɛ bɛdimɛ si biatsa kibɔ ɔki yɛ ɛ. 6Yuda adimɛ ní lɛ aʋa lɛ ekpese kude gbã kutɔ onu kupɛ gi kɔ aʋa aaga xe aabu Yesu kukɔ ɔki ba xegi banima báma ní yɛ su i.
Kublabla kí Kutse Lidɔzawe le Kuŋaŋaa
7Aklamɔnyasi na Liwe le lina gi lilɛ si beye kutse lidɔzawe le keʋesibi ya ɛ. 8Lɛ loso Yesu akpɛ Petro ni Yohanes ni eboa la si, “Mlazɛbla ní Kutselidɔzawe le kiŋaŋa ɛ su aki blɔ.”
9Beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔpɛ si kubla bɛ aplɛ ɛ?”
10Ebu le onu si, “Xe mleti iku ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, onyime ɔtɔ gi etu kenifukpo ɛ, aatsani mlɔ. Mlekuni yɛ kude atrɛ ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi aatiku i, 11tɔ mlasi kepea ɔkaɛ si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ si, Nífɔ bababa ba kugbakeo liɔ mɛ gi mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaze xe kwiaŋa Kutselidɔzawe le bidɔ mɛ ɛ?’ 12Aabasɛ mlɔ lifunu kugbake ʋidi utɔ mɛ gi bɛlulɔ ɛ. Mlabla kidɔ kakaa aplɛ ní niklɔ.”
13Agi bɛsɛ ɛ, bɛzɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛbla ɛki kutseolidɔzawe le kiŋaŋaɛ ɛ.
Ɔkaɛ yɛ Bilagɔdɔ ŋaŋa ʋɛ
14Agi lipoe le lina ɛ, Yesu eze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ni yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba. 15Asi ba si, “Linu mɛ kupɛ́pɛ si miŋa Kutselidɔzawe le kiŋaŋaɛ liɛ ni mlɔ xe ableke maamɔ kini ye e! 16Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Mátraŋa ʋɛ elu tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi lɛ ese kununu yo kwiaba ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
17Gi Yesu akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia ɛ, edo Aya ɖase, lɛ apani si i, “Mlazɛ tɔ mlɔmɛ ɔkakaa ɔkpɛ onu. 18Mɛɛsi mlɔ si dɔni abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, mátraŋwɛ wain liɛ ya tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kɛba a.”
19Lɛ akɔ lìklã nɛ, xe edo Aya ɖase e, lɛ ayaʋi lɛ mɛ ɛ, xe akɔ aki ba ɛ, lɛ apani si i, “Lɛ ya linu mɛ kisugyaɛ gi bɛki ní mlɔ litukpo o. Mlabitɛ nite tɔ mlazakɔ aplɛ aŋu ní mɛ aʋa.”
20Niteme ke akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia kí ba ni kiŋaŋaɛ kede, lɛ apani si, “Kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ya kenu Aya yɛ kunyánya vuvu yɔ gi anya nì mɛ ìka lɛ ɛ, gi bɛbali ní mlɔ litukpo o. 21Pɔ̀ mledi i, ɔniliɛ gi aakpɛ mɛ awla ɛ, odi ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su nì mɛ ɛ. 22Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya atrɔ lɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ babaa ki ɔniliɛ gi aabu ye kukɔ ɛ.” 23Lɛ bekpese ba ahanuglɔ ba kuʋi si ba mɛ owoli atrábitɛ liboe lɛ klɔ na a.
Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ ní ba mɛ iliɛ gi onu Oʋidi ye su u
24Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ kwiku ní ba kusi dzɛ ní ba mɛ iliɛ gi biamɔ si yɛ onu oʋidi ye su u. 25Yesu asi ba si, “babubitɛ ba ba bekusi ba ɛ, bɛmɔ kigagla ní ba akɔanɛ ma aʋa, lɛ banama gi bɛmɔ kigaglaɛ ní ba aʋa ɛ, bizɛpɛ si bɛbasɛ si ba bizedi ba aʋa. 26Pɔ̀ mlɔ kɔ ɛ, líma si lize nite ní mlɔ kusi i. Boŋu i, ɔnɔ ʋidi ye ní mlɔ kusi i, oze ŋwisi ɔsisami yɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔlɛ ní mlɔ onu i, oze ŋwisi ɔnɔsumu ye kinɛ ɛ. 27Lɛ nyaŋwɛ asa keme e,? Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su lo o, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi eesumu na a? Aní yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i? Pɔ̀ malɛ ní mlɔ kusi ŋwisi ɔnɔsumu kinɛ ɛ. 28Mlɔ mlenu banama gi mlɛlɛɛ ní mɛ su u, ní mɛ kupepeo me e. 29Lɛ makɔ kukusi ŋaŋa aki mlɔ ɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Mɔka akɔ akí mɛ kinɛ ɛ. 30Mlaaŋa tɔ mlaŋwɛ bidɔ ní mɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su ní mɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ni tɔ mlaaze ní ekusigbo aʋa, tɔ mlaaŋa Israel akpɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa la aʋa.
Yesu asi Petro si Aanada si Yete Ye
31“Lɛ Yesu apani si, Simon, Simon, ta kutu! Satana eʋi kude si yipí mlɔ ŋwisi amu kinɛ ɛ. 32Pɔ̀ maxwa Aya ní wɔ litukpo Simon, tɔ wukíwɔli ní wɔ kuziŋa mɛ ɛ. Lɛ xe wodzi ba mɔklɔ ɛ, tɔ kpɛ wɔ benemi ba kigagla.”
33Pɔ̀ Petro ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, mabla si mitrɛ ligba ni wɔ tɔ mitse ni wɔ fɛ.”
34Yesu apani si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ, Petro si, xe able ɔkukɔ loglo lo aamè omono e, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.”
Kibɔ Okotoku Ogudo ni Ihɛ Piɔpiɔ
35Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Lipoe lɛ gi makpɛ mlɔ xe mlévu kibɔ okotoku, ogudo, loo afɔkpa ɛ, kiditɔ kiziã mlɔ na a?” bebu le onu si “Kididɔ kíziã blɔ.”
36Asi ba si, “Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, xe kibɔ kotoku ɔlɛ ní wɔ awla ɛ, kɔ yɛ ni ogudo lo; lɛ xe ihɛ gblamadza ɔ́ma ni wɔ awla ɛ, da wɔ liwu le aʋa lini nɛ tɔ zekɔ dzi ɔtɔ. 37Lɛ ese linu si bɛŋwlimi plɛ ní kuŋwlimi dradra mɛ si, ‘Lɛ bebù ye kpɛ ní banɔ zimizi ba kusi i’, lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, lilɛ si liba lɛ mɛ kí mɛ ɛ. Ee, kidiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi ní mɛ su i, kihà kɛ mɛ kuba.”
38Badɔkpasi ba bɛpani si, “Ɔkaɛ Di, imɔ ihɛ gblamadza tiaʋa ni niya.” Ebu le onu si “bɛsrɛ,”
Yesu Axwa Aya ní Kumu yɔ Ise le Ketokpaa aʋa
39Yesu edo atrɛ ní Kumu yɔ ise le ketokpaa aʋa ŋwisi kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ni yɛ kude e. 40Agi beku niklɔ ɛ, asi ba si, “Mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíwɔli iku ní kufekedi me e.” 41Lɛ ebu lidze ní basu taʋɛ ɛ, lɛ adɔ yɛ aklámasi na aʋa a, xe axwa Aya si i: 42“Ɔka, xe linu wɔ kupɛpɛ ɛ, tɔ ti kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ní mɛ aʋa, aní mɛ kupɛpɛ onu xunyɔ, pɔ̀ wɔ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa biabitɛ ɛ.” 43Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dɔni lifunu ne ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ lɛ akpɛ yɛ kigagla ɛ. 44Lɛ ní kuyeʋiyeʋi me e, axwa Aya ni kimbi kyíkyĩ sanɔ, lɛ yɛ ohihe lo ɛzɛwɔli ní yɛ su ɛdɔ kesea ŋwisi ìka akpɔ kinɛ ɛ.
45Agi ayɔ adɔ ní Aya ɔxwaklɔ aba yɛ badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si beku sra mɛ, kɔkpɛ kupepe ni ɔna nyipu loso. 46Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛdɔ sra sɛ ɛ? Mlayɔ tɔ mlaxwa Aya atɔ mlakíwɔli iku ní kufekedi me e.”
Bevu Yesu
47Agi azeegu kunugu yo e, linɔkpi itɔ gi Yuda badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole eze ɔtɔ akɔ ɛ, lìba. Eti apɔni Yesu tɔ yimu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ, 48pɔ̀ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Yuda, kibú woebú Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ekɔ ni adzɔ kumumu na a?”
49Agi banama gi beze ní Yesu su bɛmɔ liboe lɛ gi litraba ɛ, beʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ kuwa blɔ ihɛ gblamadza ʋa su axwɛ na a?” 50Lɛ ba mɛ tole aŋwia yɛ ihɛɛ, lɛ atí kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ ɔnɔdzidzi ye yɛ kaŋaa mɛ kutukpaa zanɔ ɛ.
51Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si, “Lisrɛ!” lɛ agbɔni onyimee yɛ kutu yɔ xe ayɔni yɛ ɛ.
52Lɛ Yesu asi kusumu yo baka ba, lisɔligba lɛ bepepe ba ni bakatsi ba, gi bɛba yɛ ovu klɔ si, “Kiba mleba ni Ihɛ gblamadza ba ni kusekpeo si mlevu me ŋwisi oboebitɛ kinɛ na a? 53Meze ní mlɔ kusi liwe kakaa ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ pɔ̀ mlévu me e. Pɔ̀ mlɔ lipoe le lina a, gi litumu ne me ɔʋaŋaɛ ɛɛŋa aʋa a.”
Petro Anada si yete Yesu
54Agi bevu ye e, bɛgbani yɛ sɛnɔ ɛtsinɔ ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ. Petro ezenì ba kude ní ɔdzage no. 55Bɛkpɛ kifu ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea kusi yo gi bɛzɛŋani i, lɛ Petro kyɛ eze ní ba kusi i. 56Ɔnɔsumu ɔdisami ɔtɔ ɛmɔ yɛ gi odi i. Eti apɔnɔ lɛ edi ye mɔmɔmɔ lɛ apani si i, “Onyime liɛ ya fɛ eze ni Yesu kude.”
57Pɔ̀ anada lɛ si i, “Ɔdzɛ, Méte ye kura a.”
58Lídze xe ɔnɔ dzedze fɛ amɔ yɛ ɛ, lɛ apani si i, “Wɔ fɛ wonu ba mɛ tole.” Petro ebú le onu si, “Onyime, Ani mɛ!”
59Ŋwisi ɔnyɔsasa tole kede e, ɔnɔ dzedze fɛ edu ɔkli kese si, “Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si ɔniliɛ ya fɛ eze ní yɛ su, lɛ ese linu si Galilea ɔnɛ onu u.”
60Petro ebu le onu si, “Onyime, Méte liboe lɛ klɔ su gi wɔɛpani i!” Kiliɛ gi eegu kunugu yo ko e, lɛ ɔkukɔ loglo lo eme e. 61Lɛ Yesu ekyi xe edi Petro e. Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ gi Ɔkaɛ apani asi yɛ si, “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ loglo lo aamè omono e, wɔanada mɛ tatá.” 62Lɛ edo atrɛ oŋwe no o, xe azeebemi tiitiitii i.
Bɛkpɛ Yesu Kakpaa
63Benyime baklɔ gi bezeepe Yesu i, bekpese yɛ kakpaa kukpɛ lɛ bekusi ye kyɛ ɛ. 64Bɛnya yɛ aŋu na mɛ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Si blɔ! Nyaŋwɛ asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ?” 65Lɛ bɛtrɛ ní aʋa ekpini Yesu isanɔ ɔ.
Bɛ Tsini Yesu ní Otsixwakɔ Ʋidi lo
66Agi kelea kɛti i, kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba ani Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛtsa, lɛ bɛgbani Yesu i manɔ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ. 67Bɛpani si, “Xe wɔ wonu Kristo ye e, tɔ si blɔ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Xe masi mlɔ ɛ, mlatrázi mɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a, 68lɛ xe meʋi mlo liboetɔ ɛ, mlatrábu le onu u. 69Pɔ̀ dɔni abla kɔ tsinɔ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atráze ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete yɛ kaŋaa mɛ.”
70Lɛ ba pɔ́ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ kido woedo si Aya Yebi wonu na a?”
Lɛ ebu le onu aki ba si, mlɔ mlɛpani si, “yɛ menu.”
71Lɛ bɛpani si i, “Ege lɛ loso kwipɛ banɔ gi biaŋa katsalia dzɛ ɛ? Blɔ ɔtutɔ kwinu le dɔni yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ onugu lo me.”

Title: LUKA 23
Content:
Bɛtsini Yesu ní Pilato Klɔ
1Lɛ ɔnɔha lɔ pɔ́ ɛyɔ ɔ, xe ɛgbani Yesu itsini Pilato klɔ ɛ. 2Niklɔ bekpese eboe la kukɔ ní yɛ su si, “Kwivu onyime liɛ ya gi ɛɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ blɔ akɔanɛ ma mɛ si bayɔ kedu u, xe ɛɛsi ba si bakítsa ɔgyɔ lɔ akí Roma banɛ ma okusi ʋidi ye e, lɛ apani si yɛ yenu Kristo ye gi onu okusi i.”
3Lɛ Pilato eʋi ye si, “Wɔ́ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Nite wɔ ɛpani.”
4Lɛ Pilato asi Kusumu yo baka ba ni linɔkpi le si, “Mámɔ kesetata tɔtɔ gi maakɔ obu onyime liɛ ya lipɔ ɔ.”
5Pɔ̀ bɛzɛtù le ekpɛ gagla sanɔ si, “Gani yɛ bidɔ basɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ, ɛɛkpɛ ɔpisáse ní banima mɛ ní Yudea kesea petee me. Ekpese le adɔ ni Galilea lɛ eku ní ya abla ɛ.”
Bɛtsini Yesu ní Herodes klɔ
6Agi Pilato enu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, eʋi si, Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, Galilea ɔnɛ onu na a. 7Agi enu si Yesu ádɔ ní kesea lia aʋa gi Herodes ɛɛŋa ɛ, akɔ yɛ atsisi Herodes gi eze ní Yerusalem ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ.
8Liku Herodes isami gi amɔ Yesu i, lɛ ese linu si enu yɛ onu lɛ azaapɛ si yimɔ yɛ lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ lɛ ya a. Azeedi kudeonu si yimɔ Yesu gi ɛɛbitɛ enugutseboatɔ ɛ. 9Lɛ loso ɛ, Herodes eʋi Yesu eboe glegle, pɔ̀ Yesu óbu litɔtɔ onu u. 10Kusumu yo baka ba nì Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ɛ, bedoeba ɔtɔ nɔ, lɛ bɛkɔ eboe ní yɛ su gagla a. 11Herodes nì yɛ baguta ba kyɛ bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa, lɛ kede e, bɛkɔ liwu gbã etɔ kpɛ kí yɛ, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi Pilato e. 12Dɔni liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Herodes ni Pilato bedzi baʋia; kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛ, ofu eze ní ba kusi.
Pilato atsa Kutsépia akí Yesu
13Pilato axwa kusumu yo baka ba, ni baʋaŋa ba ani banima akpɛ likpɔ. 14lɛ asi ba si, “Mlɛgbani onyime liɛ ya ɛmani mɛ si yɛ ɛɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ banima mɛ tɔ bayɔ kedu u. Abla ɛ, agi mapani nì yɛ ní mlɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, mámɔ yɛ kesetataa tɔ́tɔ ní eboa la gi mlɛkɔ ní yɛ su mɛ ɛ. 15Nite ke Herodes fɛ ɔ́mɔ kesetataa tɔ́tɔ ɔ, lɛ loso edzini ye atsisi blɔ. Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, ɔ́bitɛ kididɔ ɔ, gi biakɔtsà kutsépia kí yɛ ɛ. 16Lɛ loso e, maaki tɔ bafiaʋi yɛ litam tɔ maayurɔ yɛ.” 17Lize si Pilato ɔyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi bɛkpɛ ligba aki ba ní Kutseolidɔzawe kakaa aʋa a.
18Lɛ ba petee bɛkpɛ ozi si, “Ye ye! tɔ yurɔ Baraba kí blɔ ɔ!” 19Bɛkpɛ Baraba ligba kɔkpɛ keduyɔyɔ katɔ ni kunɔye kutɔ gi biba ɔma ʋidi no me loso o.
20Nya Pilato apɛ si yiyurɔ awla ní Yesu su, lɛ loso alìɔʋi linɔkpi le onu dzɛ ɛ. 21Pɔ̀ bɛtrɛ lɛ aʋa ni ozi lo si i, “Kú ye ní ose lo su! Kú ye ní ose lo su!”
22Pilato eʋi ba kutánɛ si, “Kese woli ata a? Mámɔ kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ, gi kizia yɛ kutse e! Maaki tɔ bafiaʋi yɛ litam tɔ maayurɔ yɛ.”
23Pɔ̀ bɛtrɛ ní ozi lo kukpɛkpɛɔ aʋa nì ile gagla si bekú Yesu ní ose lo su u. Gɔgɔɛ ba ozi lo ɛki si adimɛ ní lɛ aʋa a. 24Lɛ Pilato atsa litsi le aki Yesu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi beʋi kinɛ ɛ. 25Ayurɔ onyime liɛ klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ́ ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi bɛkpɛ ligba kɔkpɛ keduyɔyɔ ni kunɔye e, lɛ akɔ Yesu akpɛ ní ba awla tɔ babitɛ yɛ kiliɛ gi bɛpɛ ɛ.
Baguta ba Bekú Yesu ní Ose lo Su
26Lɛ baguta ba bɛgbani Yesu sɛnɔ ɛ, lɛ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani Simon, Kirene ɔnɛɛ gi ádɔ ní kamamiatɔ mɛ ɛ, xe atrába ní ɔma ʋidi no me e. Bemi ye aʋa, lɛ bɛkɔ osetsase lo ɛtrɔ yɛ si otu tɔ oze ni Yesu kude e. 27Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize nì yɛ kude; badzɛ batɔ gi bɛzɛtaní i, xe beze bemi kí yɛ kyɛ ɛ, beze ní ba kusi. 28Yesu ekyi edi ba lɛ asi ba si, “Yerusalem badzɛ ba a! Mlakíbemi aki mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ mlebemi akí isu ya ni mlɔ bebi ba a. 29Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ewe la ɛtraba gi banima biapani si, ‘Lipɛ kí badzɛa ba awla gi banuvɔ báma ɛ, gi bápɔ bebi i, xe bakí bebi limwa ɛ!’ 30Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima biasi eto la si, ‘mlakpa adɔ ní blɔ aʋa!’ ani kutokpaa si, ‘mlewe blo!’ 31Lɛ xegi bɛbitɛ la ya elu ɛyurɔ mɛ gi ma lɛ ŋwisi ose wɔwɔ kinɛ ɛ, kitɛ liaze ki mlɔ gi mlalɛ ŋwisi ose kpakpa kinɛ ɛ?”
32Bɛgbani benyime tiaʋa dzedze gi beze banɔ zimizi fɛ evu u, gi bɛtreye pɔni Yesu i. 33Agi bɛzɛna niklɔ gi bizɛxwa si “Litukpoxwa lɛ ɛ,” bekú Yesu ní ose lo su. Lɛ bekú banɔ zimizi tiaʋa ba kyɛ, tole ní yɛ kaŋaa mɛ ni ɔʋlaɛ ní yɛ kabaa mɛ. 34Yesu apani si, “Ɔka! kɔkyɛ ba lɛ ese linu si, béte kidiliɛ gi bɛɛbitɛ ɛ.” Bɛlɛ yɛ ewu la kpɛ ba kusi gani exoeʋi la kutata mɛ.
35Banima bɛlɛɛ gi bezeedi i, pɔ̀ Yudanɛ ma baka ba kɔ ɛ, bezeebu onugu me tsini yɛ su si, “Ebú banima; kitɔ obu isu ya xe yɛ onu Kristo ye e gi Aya akya ɛ!”
36Baguta ba fɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa; beti apɔnɔ yɛ lɛ bɛki yɛ kuda nyagba nyagba a, 37lɛ bɛpani si, “Bú isu ya xe wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye e!”
38Ní yɛ etukpo la onu i, bɛŋwlimi eboa la ya si, “Yɛ onu Yudanɛ ma Okusi ye.”
39Banɔ zimizi ba mɛ tole gi bekú ose lo su ipɔni yɛ ɛ ekpini ye si, “Aní wɔ wonu Kristo ye e? Bú isu ya tɔ bú blɔ fɛ!”
40Ɔnɔ ʋlaɛ, kɔ, atɛni ɔtɔpu yɛ si, “Woʋíse Aya lo o? Wɔzi kutuheheo kiliɛ gi yɛ fɛ azɛ ɛ. 41Blɔ kɔ kwimɔ blɔ liʋɛ tsatsa lɛ, lɛ ese linu si kwimɔ kutuhehe uliɔ gi kwisrɔni kidiliɛ ɛ, gi kwibitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ ɛ, ɔ́ta kesea tɔtɔ ɔ.”
42Lɛ asi Yesu si, “Plɛ aŋu ní mɛ aʋa Yesu, xe wɔba ŋwisi Okusi kinɛ ɛ!”
43Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ si, omono e, wɔaze ní Paradiso ye me nì mɛ.”
Yesu yɛ Kutseo
44Liaze ŋwisi kemize inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa kinɛ ɛ, lɛ litumu ne lizɛ kesea aʋa petee kɔzɛna ni inyɔ tita a: 45lɛ ese linu si liwo le limɔni kuyi i, lɛ Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kusaa gi kusunu i, kwilɛ ní kupɛ tuʋa ɛ. 46Yesu akpɛ ozi lo ni ole gagla si, “Ɔka! wɔ iwla lɛ mɛ makɔ mɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ akpɛ!” Agi apani nite ko e, lɛ ada onugu i.
47Baguta ba ɔkaɛ amɔ kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akpɔ̀ Aya si, “Sugba ɛ, ɔniliɛ ya onu ɔnɔ gbã!” 48Agi banama gi bɛlɛɛ ní niklɔ ɔ, xe bezeedi bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ liboe lɛ klɔ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, ba pɔ́ bɛtàni lɛ bedzitrɛ ní ba kupeo me ní asigaga mɛ ɛ. 49Banama petee gi bete Yesu mɔmɔmɔ ɛ, kɔpɔni badzɛa ba ya gi bekuni yɛ kude dɔni Galilea ɛ, bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no gi bezeedi bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Yesu Kuviveo
50Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Yosef i, ádɔ ní Arimatia gi onu Yuda ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Eze ɔnɔ gbã gi kubùbù kwize ní yɛ su u. Eze ní Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ba kusi xunyɔ, 51pɔ̀ ɔ́trɔ ní ba begyodi ʋa ni ba kiboebitɛ aʋa a, lɛ azeepe Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kubaba a. 52Yɛ atrɛ ní Pilato klɔ, lɛ eʋi si bakɔ Yesu okpo ye aki yɛ ɛ. 53Lɛ azeepleni okpo ye ní ose lo su u, xe axla yɛ akpɛ ní kusa pititi kutɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ ní ɔdrɔ vuvu u, gi bebu ikpɛ ní liklakpɔ ɛtɔ mɛ ɛ, gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔfɛ ní lɔ mɛ odi me e. 54Lize Lisɔpa, liblawe le gi Sabat yɛ ihakpese e.
55Badzɛa ba gi bezeni Yesu kude dɔni Galilea ɛ, bekuni Yosef kude lɛ bɛzɛmɔ ɔdrɔ lɔ ni kiliɛ gi bɛplɛ Yesu ní lɔ mɛ ɛ. 56Gi bedzitrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, xe bɛzɛbla ní kumu nì bidɔ flafla bɛ su ki okpo ye e, beze emɔni ní sabat yɛ aʋa ní ɔsã nɔ onu u.

Title: LUKA 24
Content:
Yesu yɛ Kuyɔyɔ Dɔni Bekpo ʋa mɛ
1Lipadzruwe le olezatɔ nɔ ɛ, badzɛ ba bɛtrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ sú, bevu bawá flafla ʋa gi bɛbitɛ ɛ. 2Bɛmɔ si bemli likla nɛ za nɔ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ onu, 3Pɔ̀ gi beti eku i, bámɔ Ɔkaɛ Yesu yɛ okpo ye. 4Agi bɛlɛɛ ɛ, xe bezee bù lɛ su i, bɛmɔ benyime tiaʋa gi balɛ ní ba su ní ewu klekle me e. 5Lifu liku badzɛ ba lɛ gi bɛbubɔ ɔ, xe bɛ kpɛ aŋu na mɛ kesea ɛ, benyime ba beʋi ba si “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛpɛ ɔnɔ gbagbe ní bekpo ʋa kusi i? 6Ɔ́ma ní ya; ayɔ. Mlaplɛ aŋu sì asi mlɔ ní Galilea si; 7‘Biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kí banɔ zimizi ba, tɔ beku ní ose lo su, lɛ ní ewe tata kede e aayɔ dzi ligbã.’ ”
8Lɛ badzɛ ba bɛplɛ aŋu ní yɛ eboe la aʋa ɛ. 9Agi bedzi dɔni ɔdrɔ lɔ su i, bɛzɛɛsi badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba ni banɔ gɔgɔ ba pɔ́ eboa la petee gi bɛmɔ ɛ. 10Badzɛ ba klɔ beze Maria Magdaladzee nì Yohana nì Maria gi onu Yakobo yene e ani badzɛ gɔgɔa ba gi bɛpɔni ba ɛ, ba bɛsi banɔxwaxwa ba eboe la petee. 11Pɔ̀ banɔxwaxwa ba bɛkɔ lɛ si eboa la gi badzɛ ba bɛpani i, enu anukpadzeboe lɛ loso bázɛ ba aʋa aŋa a. 12Pɔ̀ Petro ayɔ lɛ ese atrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su i: abùbɔ edi pɔ̀ basa ʋa gi bɛxla yɛ ɛkpɛ tètè ko amɔ ɔ. Lɛ edzi atrɛ ní kepea mɛ gi azeegyo o liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ edi i.
Badɔkpasi Tiaʋa Bɛmɔ Yesu Ní Emaus Kudeo me
13Ní liwe lɛ klɔ ke aʋa ɛ, banɔ tiaʋa gi beze ni Yesu kude e, bɛzɛɛtrɛ ní Emaus kamamia tɔ mɛ, ŋwisi itiplɛkɔ tigloele dɔni Yerusalem. 14Bɛzɛka sika ní eboa la gi ɛba la mɛ su u. 15Agi bezevu eboe la edi nì ba ahanuglɔ ba ɛ, Yesu ɔtutɔ lɔ eti apɔni ba lɛ azɛɛga ni ba ɛ, 16bɛmɔ yɛ pɔ̀, bamɔ yɛ egyesi i. 17Yesu eʋi ba si, “Liboe woli su mlɛpani gi mlɛtrɛ ɛ?” bɛlɛɛ zĩi ní asigaga mɛ ɛ. 18Bamɛ tole gi bizɛxwa si Kleopa ɛ, eʋi ye si “Wɔ tètè ko wonu ɔbabaɛ ni Yerusalem gi óte eboa la gi ɛba lamɛ ewe ala ya mɛ lo o?”
19“Eʋi ba si eboe woli i?”
Bebú le onu si, “eboa la gi ɛba Yesu u, gi ádɔ Nazaret aʋa ɛ.” “Onyime liɛ ya eze Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ, lɛ Aya ni banima pɔ́ bɛkɔ yɛ si onu ɔnɔ gagla ni liboe kakaa gi edo o, ni kidɔ kakaa gi abitɛ mɛ ɛ. 20Blɔ kusumu yo baka ba ni baʋaŋa ba bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkɔ tɔ batsà kutsépia aki yɛ tɔ bekú ye ní ose lo su. 21Blɔ kugyodi yo kwize si yɛ atrábu Israel. Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, omono liwe tanɛ gi eboa la ɛba lamɛ ɛ. 22Kɔ sanɔ ɛ, badzɛ batɔ ní blɔ kusi bɛmani liboetɔ gi litu blɔ kugyɔ ɔ, bɛpiɔ ɛtrɛ ní Yesu ɔdrɔ lɔ su, 23pɔ̀ bámɔ yɛ okpo ye e. Bedziba ɛsi blɔ si bɛtsani bidɔ; Bɛmɔ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi bɛsi ba si ɔlɛ ligbã́ a. 24Blɔ iha lɛ itɔ idzɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ su lɛ izɛmɔ kiliɛ ɖii gi badzɛ ba bɛpani i, pɔ̀ bámɔ yɛ ɛ.”
25Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kitɛ xe mlɛdɔ kuga nite e, lɛ kitɛ xe mlɔ begyodi ʋa bɛyɔ ní beboedoplɛ ba eboe la aʋa kuziŋaa su u? 26Kɔ líziã si Kristo ye ɔmɔ ɔziã nɔ tɔ lɛ kede e, aatiku ní yɛ Kusudraa mɛ na a?” 27Lɛ Yesu ebú eboa la gi bɛŋwlimi ní yɛ su ese aki ba dɔnɔ ní liboe le petee me e. Ekpese adɔ nɔ ní Mose kuplekpaa ni beboedoplɛ ba petee bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ mɛ ɛ.
28Agi beti apɔni kamamia lia mɛ gi bɛtrɛ ɛ, Yesu abitɛ ŋwisi kitsa ɛtsa eza a. 29pɔ̀ bɛtrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa si “Ze ní blɔ su; kelea keeblo lɛ litumu ne liidɔ ɔ.” Lɛ loso e, eti eku ni ba lɛ eze ni ba su i.
30Gi beze ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i, akɔ liklã̀ nɛ lɛ akrira lɛ ɛ, lɛ kede e, ayaʋi lɛ lɛ akɔ lɛ aki ba ɛ. 31Lɛ ba aŋu na ɛdra ɛ, xe bɛmɔ yɛ egyesi i, ko lɛ alila ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ. 32Beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si “dani lize ŋwisi kifu kizɛsɔ ní blɔ mɛ ɛ, gi azeegu kunugu yo aki blɔ ní kudeo aʋa a, xe azeebu kudɔŋwlimi yɔ ese akí blɔ ɛ?”
33Bɛyɔ kyɔŋ lɛ bedzitrɛ Yerusalem i, niklɔ bɛmɔ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba gi bɛkpɛ likpɔ ni banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ. 34gi bɛpani si, “Ɔkaɛ anya yɔ! Ebú isu abasi Simon!”
35Lɛ banɔ tiaʋa ya kyɛ ɛ, bɛdra lɛ su si ba kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ní kudeo aʋa ɛ, nì kiliɛ gi bɛmɔ Ɔkaɛ gyesi gi ayaʋi liklã̀ nɛ aki ba ɛ.
Yesu Ebu Isu Abasi Yɛ Badɔkpasi ba
36Agi banɔ tiaʋa ba ya bɛzɛɛsi ba eboa la ya ɛ, Ɔkaɛ ɔtutɔ alɛɛ ní ba kusi lɛ asi ba si, “Kusuyɔ kimlɔ.”
37Besugu, lɛ lifu liku ba lɛ begyodi si bɛɛmɔ okpo. 38Pɔ̀ asi ba si, “Ege nì lifu mlese e? Ege lɛ loso mlaʋízi liboe lɛ ya aʋa ɛɛŋa a? 39Mledi mɛ kuwla mɛ ni mɛ kuklikpɔ, tɔ mlete si mɛ ɔtutɔ. Mlagbɔni mɛ edi, lɛ ese linu si kigyɛ ni axwa aʋíze okpo su ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ si bilɛ mɛ su u.”
40Gi apani ní te e, abasɛ ba yɛ kuwla mɛ ni yɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ. 41Kɔkpɛ gi liboe le litu ba kugyɔ ɔ, xe liku ba isami lɛ loso e, bázɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa dzɛ si yɛ, lɛ eʋi ba si, “kiŋaŋa ɛtɔ kilɛ ní mlɔ awla gi biaŋa na a?” 42Bɛki yɛ likpaa gi bɛpɔʋi i, 43lɛ azɛ lɛ xe ata nɛ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ.
44Lɛ asi ba si, “Eboa la ya ɖii masi mlɔ gi meze ní mlɔ kusi i: kidɔ kakaa gi bɛŋwlimi ní mɛ su u ní Mose Isã nɛ mɛ nì, beboedoplɛ ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ, anì Psalomo ba kuplekpaa mɛ ɛ, lilɛ si kiba kɛ mɛ.”
45Niklɔ adra ba begyodi ba mɛ tɔ benu kuŋwlimi yɔ ese. 46lɛ asi ba si, “Eboa la ya bɛŋwlimi plɛ si: Kristo ye aamɔ kini, lɛ aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní ewe tata kede e, 47lɛ ní yɛ linyi ne me e, ɔna mɛ kukyikyi ni kesetata kukɔkyɛ biasɔ̀li bɛ kí kese kakaa, bia kpese dɔni Yerusalem. 48Mlɔ mlenu katsalia aki eboa la ya. 49Lɛ mɛ ɔtutɔ maatsísi mlɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ dradra lɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mɔka aka aplɛ kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ lilɛ si mleze ní ɔma ʋidi lo me kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi kigaglaɛ kiadɔ ní lifunu ne xe kiaba mlɔ aʋa ɛ.”
Befeke Yesu i tsini Lifunu ne
50Gi agbani ba edono ní ɔma ʋidi lo me atsini Betania ɛ, emuni yɛ iwla lɛ lɛ akrira ba ɛ. 51Gi azɛɛkrira ba ɛ, asɛ ní ba su lɛ befeke ye tsini lifunu ne e. 52Besumu ye, lɛ bedzitrɛ ní Yerusalem ni isami glegle e. 53Nite si beze Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ lipoe glegle gi bezee do Aya ɖase e.

Title: YOHAN 1
Content:
Liboe le lizɛki ligbã́ nɛ
1Ní okpese kɔ ɛ, Liboe le lize; Liboe le lize nì Aya, lɛ Liboe le linu Aya a. 2Dɔni kelea okpese kɔ ɛ, eze nì Aya. 3Aya abitɛ kidɔ kakaa gani yɛ aʋa; kididɔ kíma gi bɛbitɛ ɛ, xe óze lɛ mɛ ɛ. 4Ligbã́ nɛ lize yɛ mɛ, lɛ ligbã́ nɛ, lɛ lize kuklekleo ki banima a. 5Kuklekleo kwikle ku ní litumu ne me, lɛ litumu ne lítani kɔ aʋa ku ŋa a.
6Aya akpɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gi bizɛxwa si Yohanes, 7aba ŋwisi katsalia ɔŋaŋa kinɛ tɔ ɔdra kuklekleo su, tɔ gani yɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔnɔ kakaa aanu liboe le tɔ aazi ŋa. 8Aní yɛ ɔtutɔ eze kuklekleo o; kiba aba si yidra kuklekleo su u. 9Kuklekleo ɔtutɔ lɔ gi kuzekle kí banima petee e, kwitra ba kelea mɛ.
10Aba kelea mɛ, pɔ gi Aya abitɛ kelea gani yɛ aʋa fɛ ɛ, kelea kámɔ yɛ egyesi i. 11Aba yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ akɔanɛ ma klɔ, pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ akɔanɛ ma bázɛ yɛ ɛ. 12Pɔ̀ banɔaklɔ petee gi bɛzi yɛ ɛ, xe bɛzi yɛ linyi ne aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ; ba ko akpɛ kigaglaɛ si bedzi Aya yɛ bebi. 13Bédzi Aya yɛ bebi gani kipɔpɔ mɛ ɛ, loo onyime ni ɔdzɛ ba kutrɔtrɔ mɛ, loo gani obika yɛ kupɛpɛ mɛ; Aya ɔtutɔ onu ba Ɔka.
14Liboe le lidzi ɔnɔ gi eyi nì lipomepɛpɛ ni anukwarɛ ɛ, lɛ eze ní blɔ kusi i. Kwimɔ yɛ kuklekleo, kuklekleo liɔ klɔ gi azɛ ŋwisi Yɛka yɛ obinyime tolee kinɛ ɛ,
15Gi Yohanes amɔ yɛ ɛ, apani ní yɛ su nì ozi si, “Yɛ onu Ɔniliɛ su gi mapani si, ‘Yɛ aaba mɛ kede e, pɔ̀ emu asani mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔlɛ xe bɛpɔ mɛ ɛ.’” 16Lipomepɛpɛ lɛ kusrɛsrɛɔ ní yɛ mɛ loso e, akrira blɔ petee, lɛ aki blɔ kukrira trɔ kukrira aʋa a. 17Aya akí Ɔsã nɔ gani Mose aʋa, pɔ̀ lipomepɛpɛ ni anukwarɛ kɔ ɛ, Yesu Kristo aʋa biga edo. 18Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́mɔ Aya ʋídi i, Yebinyime tolee, gi ɔʋífili ní Yɛka su i, yɛ ebu Ɔka yɛ abasi blɔ.
Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛɛ apani si aní yɛ yenu Kristo ye
19Lɛ ya linu Yohanes yɛ liboe me dradra lɛ, gi Yudanɛ ma baka ba ní Yerusalem bɛkpɛ kusumu yo bakaatɔ ni Lewianɛ batɔ ní Yohanes klɔ tɔ beʋi ye si, Nyaŋwɛ onu u? 20Yohanes ógbe liboe le onu kubúbú, pɔ̀ apani wee lɛ adra lɛ mɛ si, “Aní mɛ menu Kristo ye e.”
21Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ nyaŋwɛ wònu, wɔ wonu Eliya na a?” Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Owo aní yɛ menu u,” lɛ beʋi si, “Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ wònu na a?” Ebu le onu si, “Owo.” 22Gɔgɔɛ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ si blɔ ɔniliɛ gi wonu i, lilɛ si kuzɛ kunububu tsini banɔaklɔ gi bɛkpɛ blɔ ɛ. Liboe woli wɔɛpani ní isu ya su na a?”
23Yohanes ebu le onu nì Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ Yesaya liboe le si, “Mɛ menu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ole lo eeyì ní ɔyaya klɔ si, ‘Mlebu kude gyɔgyɔ akí Ɔkaɛ tɔ ɔga!’ ” 24Farisianɛ bɛ kpɛ banima, 25lɛ beʋi Yohanes si, “Xe ani wɔ́ wonu Kristo ye e, loo Eliya, loo Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ, kɔ ege loso wuzɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima a?”
26Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima, pɔ̀ ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ní mlɔ kusi gi mléte e. 27Yɛ atrába ní mɛ kede, pɔ̀ mégyeno gi maable yɛ afɔkpa ʋa igbé ne e.”
28Eboa la ya petee ɛba la mɛ ní Betania ní Yordan onipe lo oge lɔ kɔlɔ, niklɔ gi Yohanes azaakpɛ kuni yo aki banima ɛ.
Yesu yɛ onu Aya Yɛ keʋesibi ya
29Keletitia ɛ, Yohanes amɔ Yesu gi atrába yɛ ɔza lɔ ɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mledi imɔ Aya yɛ Keʋesibi ya gi akɔ̀ akɔ si kiakɔ kelea mɛ eboe zimizi na sɛnɔ ɛ. 30Yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ su gi mapani si, ‘Onyime ɔtɔ atrába ní mɛ kede e, gi ekeme asani mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔlɛ xe ableke bɛpɔ mɛ ɛ.’ 31Mɛ ɔtutɔ méte ɔniliɛ klɔ gi onu u, pɔ̀ kidiliɛ loso gi maba si míkpɛ kuni iiki banima ɛ, kɛ kinu si tɔ mikɔ ebu ye basɛ Israel banɛ ma.”
32Lɛ Yohanes adra Yesu su si, “Mamɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ gi eeple ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ɛ, dɔni lifunu ne lɛ eze yɛ aʋa ɛ. 33Nya mátrate yɛ, pɔ̀ Aya a, gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ si mikpɛ kuni yo aki banima ɛ, apani asi mɛ si, ‘Wɔtramɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ gi eeple dɔ onyime ɔtɔ aʋa ɛ; yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aakɔ̀ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kpɛ kuni kí banima a.’ 34Lɛ Yohanes apani si, Mamɔ lɛ, lɛ mɛɛdra lɛ mɛ ɛsi mlɔ si yɛ onu Aya Yebinyime e.”
Yesu Yɛ badɔkpasi tɔpu ba
35Agi kelea kɛti i, Yohanes alɛ ní klɔ dzɛ nì yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa, 36Gi amɔ Yesu gi azɛɛza ɛ, apani si, “Mledi, Aya yɛ Keʋesibi ya!”
37Lɛ gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa ba benu yɛ liboe le e, bekuni Yesu kude e. 38Gi Yesu ekyi xe amɔ si bali ni yɛ kude e, eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛpɛ ɛ?” Bebu le onu si, “Rabi” Lɛ ese linu si Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ “Nifɔ onu wɔ oze klɔ ɔ?”
39Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlaga di,” bize ŋwisi kemize inyɔ tine me kinɛ ɛ, Lɛ yɛ ni ba bɛtrɛ xe bɛzɛ mɔ niklɔ gi Yesu eze e, lɛ beze ní yɛ su kele gɔgɔa petee e.
40Ba mɛ tole gi enu Yohanes yɛ liboe le e, xe eze ni Yesu kude e, yɛ eze Andrea Simon Petro yeneminyime. 41Lɛ onu klɔ ʋa ɛ, apɛ́ yeneminyime Simon amɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kwimɔ Mesiya yɛ.” Le ese linu si, “Kristo ye.”
42Lɛ Andrea agbani Simon amani Yesu i. Yesu edi ye lɛ apani si, “Wɔ linyí linu si Simon, Yohanes Yebi, pɔ̀ biaxwa wɔ si Kefas.” Gi lɛ ese linu si Petro gi lɛ ese ní si Hela sɛ mɛ linu “liklakpɔ ɔ.”
Yesu axwa Filipo ani Natanael
43Agi kelea kɛti i, Yesu atrɔ si yɛ atrɛ ní Galilea. Amɔ Filipo lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kuni mɛ kude!”
44Filipo adɔ́ Betsaida, ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ gi Andrea ni Petro bɛdɔ ɛ. 45Filipo amɔ Natanael lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kwimɔ ɔniliɛ klɔ su gi Mose aŋwlimi akpɛ ní Ɔsã nɔ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, xe Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba fɛ bɛŋwlimi plɛ ɛ. Yɛ onu Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, Yosef yebinyime.” 46Lɛ Natanael eʋi si, “Kidɔ gbã ɛtɔ kíatani kudɔ ní Nazaret na a?” Lɛ Filipo ebu le onu si, “Ga ba tɔ ga di,” 47Agi Yesu amɔ Natanael gi atrába yɛ klɔ ɛ, apani yɛ su si, “Israel obi ɔtutɔ iliɛ ya; asia áma yɛ mɛ ɛ!”
48Lɛ Natanael eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ mɛ wote me e?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mamɔ wɔ gi woze ní ogbose lo ese e, xe ableke Filipo axwa wɔ ɔ.” 49Natanael ebu le onu si, “Rabi, wɔ́ wonu Aya Yebi ye! Wɔ́ wonu Israel Okusi ye!”
50Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Wɔziŋa gi masi wɔ si mamɔ wɔ ní ogbose lo ese e? Wɔtramɔ eboe gi ekeme sani lɛ ya a!” 51Lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, mlɛtramɔ lifunu ne si lidra lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi beemu u, xe beeple dɔ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aʋa a.”

Title: YOHAN 2
Content:
Lidzɛgbanɔwe le ní Kanaa
1Liwetanɛ we le e, kudzɛgbanɔ kwize ní Kana ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea. Yesu yene eze níklɔ, 2lɛ bɛxwa Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba fɛ tsinɔ ní ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ ɔ. 3Agi kudaa kwiblo e, Yesu yene asi yɛ si, “Kudaa kwiblo.”
4Yesu ebu le onu si, “One ege lɛ loso wɔɛkpɛ mɛ ní lɛ mɛ ɛ?” “Mɛ lipoe le liʋína sukɔ ɔ.”
5Yesu yene asi besumubi ba si, “Liboe kakaa gi aasi mlɔ ɛ, mlabitɛ ní lɛ aʋa.”
6Bedu akla izɔ tiglo níklɔ kí kuni gi kɔsu axwɛ Yudanɛ ma bizɛwa ní ba kusuploo ligoʋi le me e, lɛ kuni galɔn avi taʋa tsini avi tata kuzeku ní ɔzɔ kakaa mɛ.
7Lɛ Yesu asi besumubi ba si, “Mlakpɛ kuni ní izɔ lɛ mɛ.” Lɛ bɛkpɛ kuni yo ní izɔ lɛ mɛ xe iyi i.
8Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Abla ɛ, mlesi kutɔ atsini bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ɔʋadi ye.” Besi ko ɛtsini yɛ,
9lɛ gi bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ɔʋadi ye akpɛ kuni uliɔ gi kwikyi dzi wain yɛ onu edi i. Yɛ óte niklɔ gi wain yɛ ádɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ besumubia ba gi ba besi kuni yo kɔ bete e. Lɛ ebu ɔdzɛnyee kuka, 10lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kuda gbã ɔnɔ kakaa izɛ tu kɔ ní ɔdzɛ ɔgbanɔ kɔ ɔ, kɔ xegi banɔxwaxwa ba bɛŋwɛ ɛ xe kwiimu ba ɛ, kɔ ableke bɛmani kuliɔ gi kúpɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ wɔkɔ kuda gbã ɔbla gakɔna ni abla a!” 11Yesu abitɛ linugutseboe tɔpu i lɛ ya ní Kana ní Galilea; niklɔ ebu yɛ kigaglaɛ abasɛ, xe yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Yesu akpikpini badɔda ba ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ
12Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ni yene, yɛ beneminyime ba, ani yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ trɛ ní Kapernaum. Beze niklɔ ewe klakla atɔ.
13Agi Yudanɛ ma Kutseolidɔzawe ŋaŋa nɛ lihana ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yerusalem. 14Ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, amɔ banima gi bɛzɛda egume, iʋesi ni abronuma ʋa ani banɔatɔ gi bɛzɛtsrɛ kibɔ ɛ, gi bedi ní ba ikplɔ nɛ su i. 15Lɛ loso Yesu aaʋì igbé lɛ akɔ lɛ akpikpini baga ʋa petee dono ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, iʋesi ni egume; ehle babɔtsrɛ ba bibɔ ʋɛ lɛ ekyi ba ikplɔ nɛ ewe e; 16lɛ akpɛ ɔsã akí banama gi bɛɛda abronuma ʋa si, “Mlebu bidɔ bɛ ya dono ni ya! Mlakíkɔ Mɔka kepea mɛ akpɛ kedzí me e!”
17Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛplɛ aŋu si bɛŋwlimi kpɛ kuŋwlimi dradraa mɛ si, “Aya, isu kukɔkyɛ kí wɔ kepea ɛ, kwiisɔ ní mɛ mɛ̀ ŋwisi kifu kinɛ ɛ.” 18Lɛ Yudanɛ ma bebu le onu ni kuʋiʋi si, “Linugutseboe woli wɔabitɛ gi liabasɛ blɔ si wɔmɔ kigagla si wɔabitɛ eboa la ya na a?” 19Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlayaʋi Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya, maadzini le kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ.”
20Lɛ Yudanɛ ma beʋi Yesu si, “Wɔtradzini Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya ɛwa ní ewe tata mɛ na a? Agɔ avitene ni teglo bɛkɔ ɛwa Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya!” 21Pɔ̀ Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ su gi Yesu azɛɛpani i, lɛ lize yɛ ɔnɔ se lo. 22Lɛ gi Aya ayɔni yɛ adɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛplɛ aŋu si Yesu apani liboe lɛ ya aplɛ lɛ bɛzi kuŋwlimi dradra ni liboe lɛ klɔ gi Yesu apani aplɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ.
Yesu ete Ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ Kizeze me
23Agi Yesu eze ní Yerusalem ní Kutseolidɔzawe ŋaŋa nɛ mɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa lɛ ese linu si bɛmɔ enugutseboe ala gi abitɛ ɛ. 24Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́yurɔ isu ɔki ba a, lɛ ese linu si ete ɔnɔ gbagbe kakaa. 25Lɛ líziã si ɔnɔnɔ ɔpani ní basu ɔki yɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si yɛ ɔtutɔ ete kidiliɛ gi kilɛ ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.

Title: YOHAN 3
Content:
Yesu abasi Nikodemo bidɔ
1Ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi yɛ linyí linu Nikodemo o, ádɔ Farisianɛ ma lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ lɛ eze Yudanɛ ɔka tole. 2Ní elesi atɔ mɛ ɛ, Nikodemo atrɛ ní Yesu klɔ lɛ asi yɛ sì, “Rabi, kwite si wonu ɔdɔbasɛ gi ádɔ ní Aya kɔ ɛ. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ma enugutseboe ala gi wɔɛbitɛ ɛ, kubitɛ mɛ xe Aya ɔ́ma ni yɛ kude e.”
3Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ: ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ kuze sani si bedzini ye kupɔ ɔ.”
4Lɛ Nikodemo eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ mɛ biadzini ɔnɔtsitsi kupɔ na a? Ɔ́tratani kudzi iku yene lipo le me kuʋla a, xe biadzini ye kupɔ ɔ!”
5Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ, Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kutiku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, xe bápɔ yɛ gani kuni ni Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ. 6Bapɔnɛ ba bizɛpɔ ɔnɔ ní kisugya mɛ, pɔ̀ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ izɛpɔ ɔnɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ. 7Likítu wo kugyɔ gi masi wɔ si lilɛ si bedzini wɔ apɔ ɔ. 8Liwɔ lɛ lizeefu itrɛ niklɔ gi lipɛ ɛ; wɔanu le onu pɔ̀ wɔtrate lɛ ɔdɔ kɔ loo lɛ ɔtrɛ kɔ ɔ. Nite ke lilɛ kí ɔnɔ kakaa gi bɛpɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ.”
9Lɛ Nikodemo eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ liaba lɛ mɛ nite e?”
10Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wònu ɔdɔbasɛ ʋidi ní Israel lɛ wónu la ya ese a?” 11Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ; kuzɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi kwite su u, lɛ kuzɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi kwimɔ su u, pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ ɔ́tɔtɔ ɔ́pɛ si yizi blɔ liboe me dradra lɛ ɛ. 12Mlázi mɛ aʋa ŋa a, gi mɛɛsi mlɔ kelea lia mɛ eboe la a; kitɛ mlaazi mɛ aʋa ŋa a, xe masi mlɔ eboe la gi ɛɛtrɛ la aʋa ní lifunu ne e? 13Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ ómu ɔ́trɛ ní lifunu ne oʋídi i, sani Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi yɛ ádɔ lifunu ne aba ɛ. 14Lɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Mose emuni ɔlaɛ ɔgblaga yɛ, gi bɛxla ní ose lo aʋa ní ɔyaya klɔ kinɛ ɛ, nite ké lilɛ si bemuni Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye, 15tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa gi aazi yɛ aʋa ŋa ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le.
16Lɛ ese linu si Aya alɔ ɔnɔ gbagbe ní kesea aʋa gbɛgbɛ nite si akɔ yebinyime tolee akɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi aazi yɛ aʋa ŋa ɛ, ɔ́tratse e, pɔ̀ aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e. 17Lɛ Aya ɔ́tsisi yebinyime ní kelea mɛ banima kɔ si obu ba lipɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ tɔ yibu ba gani yɛ aʋa a. 18Banɔaklɔ gi bɛzi Obi ye aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, Aya ɔ́traxwa litsi ni ba a, xe aabu ba lipɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ banama gi bázɛ ŋa ɛ, Aya ebu ba lipɔ koko lɛ ese linu si bázɛ Aya yebinyime tolee linyi ne aʋa ɛɛŋa a. 19Lɛ Aya yɛ litsixwaxwa lɛ lɛ ya: kuklekleo kwiba kelea mɛ dɔni lifunu ne, pɔ̀ banima bɛdimɛ ni litumu ne sani kuklekleo, lɛ ese linu si ba kiboebitɛɛ kinu kuzimizi i. 20Banama petee gi bizɛɛbitɛ eboe zimizi na ɛ, baʋídimɛ ni kuklekle lɛ bátraba kuklekleo onu u, lɛ ese linu si bátrapɛ si ba eboe zimizi na edo oŋwe e. 21Pɔ̀ banama gi bizɛɛga ní anukwarɛɛ aʋa ɛ, bizɛba kuklekleo onu tɔ kuklekleo kubasɛ si kidiliɛ gi bɛbitɛ ɛ, bɛbitɛ kɛ ní Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ onu.
Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛɛ adra Yesu su
22Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní Yudea kesea mɛ, eze ní basu niklɔ lipoetɔ onu lɛ akpɛ kuni aki banima ɛ. 23Yohanes fɛ azɛɛkpɛ kuni aki banima ní Aenon gi ódze ní Salem su u, lɛ ese linu si kuni yo kwisrɛ níklɔ. Lɛ banima bɛzɛɛdzɛ Yohanes klɔ gi azaakpɛ kuni aki ba a. 24Lɛ ya liba lɛ mɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ xe ableke bɛkpɛ Yohanes ní ligba a.
25Lɛ kuboeŋwlɛ kwiku ní Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi batɔ ni Yudanɛ ɔtɔ kusi ní kusuplo ligoʋi le su u. 26Lɛ loso bɛtrɛ ní Yohanes klɔ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Rabi, dani wɔplɛ aŋu ní onyime liɛ klɔ gi eze ní wɔ su ní Yordan kedea aʋa ɛ, iliɛ klɔ su gi wɔpani i? Ɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima abla, lɛ banima pɔ́ bɛɛtrɛ ní yɛ klɔ ɔ!”
27Lɛ Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Kididɔ kítratani ɔnɔ awla kuze e, xe aní Aya aki yɛ kɛ ɛ. 28Mlɔ ɔtutɔ mlɔ aŋu mɛ mapani si, ‘Aní mɛ menu Kristo ye e, pɔ̀ kikpɛ Aya akpɛ mɛ ɔtɔ aki yɛ ɛ.’ 29Ɔdzɛɛ onu ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛ ɔnɛ; pɔ̀ ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛʋiɛ gi izeepe ye e, xe izɛɛta yɛ kutu i, isami izeku ye xe enu ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛ ole lo e. Isami nɛ klɔ inu mɛ inɛ, lɛ abla ɛ, iflɔ. 30Li lɛ si yɛ omu ɔsani mɛ tɔ mɛ pɔ̀ ɛ, miple.”
Yesu onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ lifunu ne
31Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ lifunu ne e, ekeme asani ɔnɔ kakaa. Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ kesea ɛ, yɛ onu kesea ɔnɛ ɛ, lɛ izeegu kunugu yo ní kesea eboe la su u, pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ lifunu ne e, asani ɔnɔ kakaa. 32Izɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi amɔ ɔ, xe enu su u, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋizi yɛ liboe le e. 33Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ yɛ liboe le e, atrɔ likla lɛ aʋa si Aya onu anukwarɛɛ onete. 34Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi Aya akpɛ ɛ, izɛɛpani Aya eboe la, lɛ ese linu si Aya akɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ zizi nɔ aki yɛ. 35Kakaa alɔ Obi ye lɛ akɔ kidɔ kakaa akpɛ ní yɛ awla a. 36Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ Obi ye aʋa aŋa ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le; ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́tranu kutu iiki Obi ye e, ɔ́tramɔ ligbã́ a; pɔ̀ aaze ní Aya kutuheheo ese e.

Title: YOHAN 4
Content:
Yesu egu Kunugu yo ni Samariadzee
1Farisianɛ ma benu si Yesu ɛɛmɔ, lɛ ɛɛkpɛ kuni yo ɛki badɔkpasi ba ɛsani Yohanes. 2Ni anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, Yesu ɔtutɔ ɔ́kpɛ kuni ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ; boŋu i, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛkpɛ kuni yo. 3Gi Yesu enu eboa la klɔ gi bɛzɛpani i, asɛ ní Yudea lɛ edzi atrɛ ní Galilea ɛ. 4Lize si ɔga Samaria kesea mɛ ɔza.
