Loso e, kulɔlɔɔ kúflɔ ní ɔnɔ gi onu ofufluse me e, lɛ ese linu si kutuhehe kuzɛ mani lifu.
19Kuzɛɛlɔ lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ etu blo kulɔ. 20Xe ɔnutɔ apani si malɔ Aya a, pɔ̀ evu yenemi nɛ akpɛ lipo me e, onu ɔsia nɛ. Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani Aya gi baʋímɔ ɛ kulɔ, xe ɔ́lɔ yenemi ye gi ɛɛmɔ ɔ. 21Ɔsã lɔ klɔ gi Yesu aki blɔ onu si, banama petee gi bɛlɔ Aya ɛ, lilɛ si balɔ ba benemi ba fɛ.

Title: 1 YOH 5
Content:
Kwiŋa Kelea mɛ Aʋa
1Ɔniliɛ gi onu Aya Yebi i, yɛ azɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa si, Yesu yɛ onu Kristo ye, ɔniliɛ gi Aya atsisi i, lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi alɔ Aya ɛ, alɔ Yebi ye fɛ. 2Nite kuzeete si kwilɔ Aya yɛ bebi ba, gani Aya kulɔlɔ mɛ nì yɛ ɔsã nɔ aʋa kubitɛ mɛ. 3Lɛ blɔ kulɔlɔ ki Aya ɛ, kɔ ese kunu si kuzɛɛbitɛ ní yɛ isã nɛ aʋa. Lɛ yɛ isã nɛ ɛ, ísã ɛgagla ɛki blɔ ɔ, 4lɛ ese linu si Aya Yebi kakaa aatani kelea aʋa kuŋa. Lɛ gani blɔ kuziŋaa mɛ ɛ, kuzɛɛŋa kelea aʋa. 5Nyaŋwɛ aatani kelea aʋa kuŋa a? Ɔniliɛ klɔ ko gi azɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa si Yesu yɛ onu Aya Yebi ye e.
Kidiliɛ gi kinu Katsalia ní Yesu su i
6Yesu Kristo yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi aba a, gani kunikpɛkpɛ ni kutse gani ika kubali mɛ ɛ. Ɔ́ba gani kuni tete me e, pɔ̀ aba gani kuni ni ika mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔtutɔ ɛɛpani si linu anukwarɛ, lɛ ese linu si Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ onu anukwarɛɛ. 7Bidɔ tuta biŋa Katsalia. 8Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ, kuni yo, ani ika lɛ, lɛ bɛ tuta pɔ́ biipani liboe de tile e. 9Kuzɛɛzɛ banima eboe la aʋa ɛɛŋa, pɔ̀ Aya yɛ eboe la emu isanɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si yɛ apani eboa la ya ní Yebi ye su. 10Lɛ loso banama gi bɛzɛ Aya Yebi ye aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, likla trɔtrɔ ɛlɛ ya lilɛ ní ba ina nɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ banama gi bázɛ Aya aʋa aŋa ɛ, ba bɛbitɛ yɛ ɔsia nɛ, lɛ ese linu si bázɛ Aya yɛ Liboe lɛ gi apani ní Yebi ye su aʋa ɛɛŋa a. 11Likla trɔtrɔ lɛ lɛya: Aya aki blɔ ligbã moblo le, lɛ ligbã́ lɛya lilɛ ní Yebi ye me e. 12Ɔniliɛ awla gi Aya Yebi ye ɔlɛ ɛ, ligbã lilɛ ní yɛ awla, ɔniliɛ awla gi Aya Yebi ye ɔ́ma ɛ, ligbã́ limá ní yɛ awla a.
Ligbã́ Moblo le lilɛ ní Baʋaziŋa ba Awla
13Mɛɛŋwlimi eboa la ya ɛki mlɔ banama gi mlɛzɛ Aya Yebi ye linyi ne aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, tɔ mlete si ligbã́ moblo le lilɛ ní mlɔ awla. 14Ɔna ɔlɛ ní blɔ lipo ní Aya aŋu mɛ, lɛ ese linu si kwitrɔ likla lɛ aʋa si, izeenu xe kwiʋi ye kidɔ kakaa ní yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ onu i. 15Lɛ xe kwite si, izɛɛnu kidɔ kakaa gi kwiʋi ye e, kɔlɔ kwite si, kuzɛɛzɛ blɔ beʋiʋi ʋa ɛdɔni yɛ klɔ.
16Xe wɔmɔ wonemi gi ɛɛbitɛ liboe zimizi gi lítragbani yɛ ɛkpɛ kutse me e, xwa Aya ní yɛ litukpo tɔ ɔki yɛ ligbã́. Lɛ ya litrɛ ɛki banama gi ba eboe zimizi na atrámani kutse e. Pɔ̀ eboe zimizi atɔ alɛ gi izɛɛmani kutse e; maʋísi si xwa Aya ní la litukpo o. 17Eboe nyani nyani kakaa enu kuzimizi, pɔ̀ kuzimizi utɔ kulɛ, gi kútramani kutse e.
18Kwite si, Aya yɛ bebiatɔtɔ baʋíze kuzimizi aʋa kɔ tsinɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si Aya Yebi ye izɛɛkpɛ kuka ɛklani ba lɛ Ozimizi ye ɔ́tratani ba kidɔ nyani nyani tɔtɔ kubitɛ ɛ.
19Kwite si, kunu Aya yɛ banɛ, gi kelea petee kalɛ ní Ozimizi ye kaʋaŋaa ese fɛ ɛ. 20Lɛ kwite si, Aya Yebi ye aba a, lɛ aki blɔ kuboesenu, tɔ kwiate Aya gi yɛ onu anukwarɛɛ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛ. Kulɛ ní likpɔkpɛkpɛ mɛ ni Aya ɔtutɔ ni likpɔkpɛkpɛ mɛ ni Yebi ye Yesu Kristo. Yɛ onu Aya ɔtutɔ lɛ Yɛ onu ligbã moblo le.
21Mɛ bebi ba, mledi isu aʋa mumɔ ní kubúbitɛ su!

Title: 2 YOH EBOA LA GI ALƐ NÍ KEPLEKPAA LIA SU I
Content:
Eboa la gi alɛ ní Keplekpaa lia su i
Keplekpa ʋla gi kɛdɔ ní Yohanes klɔ ɛ, “ɔnɔtsitsi ye” yɛ aŋwlimi ka aki “ɔdzɛ dimɛnɔɛ ni yɛ bebi ba,” gi lɛ ese kububu yo kwiaze ɔsɔli ha ɔtɔ ni lɔ mɛ benete ba. Liboe le ní kikpekpemi me kinu si yɛ ɛɛki ba litukpo si balɔ ba ahanuglɔ ba ani kugbagba si tɔ beze ni aŋu ní asia na badɔbasɛ ba ni ba kudɔbasɛ yɔ su.
Eboa la gi alɛ ní keplekpaa lia mɛ ɛ
Ɔtɔ nɔ Eboe la 1-3
Kunɔlɔ kɔ kunu ɔxɔ lɔ 4-6
Kugbagba ní asia na kudɔbasɛ yɔ su 7-11
Eboe gɔgɔ la 12-13

Title: 2 YOH 1
Content:
Kunɔ Panɔ Dɔni Ɔhalɔ Mɛ Ɔnɔtsitsi ye Klɔ
1Ɔhalɔ mɛ ɔnɔtsitsi ye yɛ ɛɛŋwlimi iiki wɔ ɔdisami nɔ gi Aya akya a, ni wɔ bebi ba gi malɔ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ aní mɛ tole e, pɔ̀ banama petee gi bete anukwarɛɛ ɛ, bɛlɔ mlɔ, 2lɛ ese linu si anukwarɛɛ ɔkpasi ní blɔ mɛ, lɛ aaze nì blo kɔtsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ.
3Atɔ Kakaa Aya yɛ ni Yesu Kristo Kakaa Yebi ye baki blɔ lipomepɛpɛ, asigagadidi ni kusuyɔ, tɔ bize blɔ binɛ ní anukwarɛ ni kulɔlɔ mɛ ɛ.
Mleze ní Kulɔlɔ Pɔ̀ Mleze ni Aŋu ní Banɔmeno Ba Su
4Isami iiku me gi mamɔ si wɔ bebi batɔ balɛ ní anukwarɛ aʋa a, kiliɛ ɖii gi Aya akpɛ ɔsã akí blɔ ɛ. 5Lɛ abla ɛ, meeʋi wɔ ɔdisami dimɛnɔɛ si, mlaki tɔ blɔ petee kudimɛ ni blɔ ahanuglɔ ba. Aní ɔsã vuvu onu gi mɛɛŋwlimi iiki mlɔ ɔ; onu ɔsã gi eze blɔ awla dɔni okpese kɔ ɔ. 6Kulɔlɔɔ su gi mɛɛpani i, kɔ ese kunu si, lilɛ si kunu Aya yɛ ɔsã nɔ kutu. Ɔsã nɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɔ petee mlenu i dɔni okpese kɔ kinɛ ɛ, si, lilɛ si mlɔ petee mleze ní kulɔlɔ mɛ.
7Banɔmeno glegle bɛlɛ eku kelea petee me, banɔ gi bázɛ lɛ si Yesu Kristo aba ŋwisi ɔnɔ gbagbe kinɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ klɔ elu onu ɔnɔmeno ani Kristo yɛ ahwafiɔnɛ. 8Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ tɔ mlakílila kidiliɛ gi kwiwa axwɛ na ɛkɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ tɔ kwiamɔ blɔ ɔŋakɔ ní kisrɛsrɛ mɛ ɛ.
9Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́traze Kristo bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe aadɔ ʋɛ kuza ɛ, ónu Aya ɔnɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aaze bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔlɛ likpɔ ni Aya ani Obi ye. 10Kɔlɔ xe ɔnutɔ aba mlɔ klɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ biga lidze ní bɛ ya su i, mlakízɛ yɛ akpɛ mlɔ kupeo me e; mlakípani yɛ fɛ. 11Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi aazɛ ba ɛ, aadzi ɔʋatrɔ ki ba ní ba eboe zimizi ana gi bɛɛbitɛ mɛ ɛ.
Eboe gɔgɔ la
12Eboe alɛ mɛ awla kpaŋu gi nya maaŋwlimi ki mlɔ ɛ, pɔ̀ mátraŋwlimi la a, boŋu i, mɛɛpɛ kudeonu si miba mlɔ klɔ, tɔ kwiapani aŋu mɛ ni aŋu mɛ atɔ kwiamɔ isami mɔmɔmɔ.
13Wɔ onemidzɛ gi Aya akya ɛ, yɛ bebi ba bɛpani mlɔ.

Title: 3 YOH 1
Content:
Kunɔ panɔ
1Ɔhalɔ mɛ ɔnɔtsitsi yɛ ɛɛŋwlimi iiki Gayo gi malɔ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ.
2Mɛ ɔʋia dimɛnɔ ɛ, mɛɛxwa Aya si kidɔ kakaa kidɔ kɛ aʋa ki wɔ, tɔ zení isu mɛ pɛ̀pɛ̀ mɛ, agi mete si wɔlɛ mumɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ mɛ ɛ. 3Isami iiku me koŋu gi benemi batɔ bɛba a, xe bɛsi mɛ kiliɛ gi wovu anukwarɛɛ ɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi wɔlɛ ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ lipoe kakaa kinɛ ɛ. 4Kididɔ kíku me isami isanɔ, si tɔ minu si mɛ bebi ba balɛ ligbã ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ.
Bɛkpɔ̀ Gayo
5Mɛ ɔʋia dimɛnɔ ɛ, wonu anukwarɛ onete ní axwɛ ana gi wɔɛwa mɛ ɛki benemi ba, ki banama gi benu bababa ki wɔ kyɛ ɛ. 6Bɛpani lɛ su isi ɔsɔli ha lɔ ní ya ní wɔ kulɔlɔ su. Mɛɛki wɔ litukpo si pɔni ba tɔ batrɛ ni ba kudegaga aʋa gani kizeze liɛ mɛ gi kiaku Aya liŋu i. 7Lɛ ese linu si bekpese ba kudegaga ní axwɛwawa ki Kristo me, gi bázɛ kupɔnɔ kutɔtɔ ɛdɔni babubitɛ ba kɔ ɔ. 8Lilɛ si blɔ basɔlisɔli ba, kupɔni banɔ ba ya tɔ kwiamɔ ɔŋakɔ ní ba axwɛwawa la ki anukwarɛɛ mɛ.
Diotrefo ani Demetrie ba Kiboebitɛɛ
9Maŋwlimi keplekpa kpekpemi atɔ aki ɔsɔli ha lɔ, pɔ̀ Diotrefo gi izɛɛpɛ si yɛ yize ba onu i, ɔ́kɔ lɛmɛ ɔki mɛ liboe le e. 10Xe maba ɛ, maaki si mlate kidɔ kakaa gi abitɛ ɛ, eboe nyani nyani ana gi ɛɛpani ní blɔ su i, ni asia ana gi ɛɛsɛ ɛ! Pɔ̀ éke ye e; ɔ́ʋizɛ blɔ benemi ba a, xe bɛba ɛ, kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, izeetsi kudeonu iiki banama gi bɛpɛ si bɛɛzɛ ba ɛ, lɛ izeekeni idi si yikpikpini ba ebu ní ɔsɔli ha lɔ mɛ ɛ!
11Mɛ ɔʋia dimɛnɔ ɛ, wukígla kidɔ nyani nyani, pɔ̀ gla kidɔ gbã. Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi izɛɛbitɛ kidɔ gbã onu Aya yɛ ɔnɛ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi izɛɛbitɛ kidɔ nyani nyani i yɛ ɔ́ʋimɔ Aya.
12Ɔnɔ kakaa ɛɛpani eboe gbã ní Demetrio su, anukwarɛɛ ɔtutɔ fɛ ɛɛpani eboe gbã ní yɛ su. Lɛ kwitrɔ likla lɛ aʋa, lɛ mlete si liboe lɛ gi kwipani i, linu anukwarɛ.
Kunɔpanɔ gɔgɔ ɔ
13Eboe alɛ mɛ awla kpaŋu gi maasi mlɔ ɛ, pɔ̀ mápɛ si migani la ní keplekpa mɛ ɛ. 14Meedi kudeonu si maamɔ mlɔ kpekpemii, tɔ kwiapani aŋu mɛ ni aŋu mɛ. 15Kusuyɔ kuze ni mlo. Mlɔ baʋia ba pɔ́ bɛpani mlɔ. Mlapani blɔ baʋia ba tole tole aki blɔ.

Title: YUD 1
Content:
1Keplekpaa lia kɛdɔ ní Yuda gi onu Yesu Kristo yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye ni Yakobo yenemi yɛ klɔ ɔ,
ɛki banama gi Ɔka Aya axwa a, gi alɔ ɔ, xe balɛ ní Yesu Kristo yɛ kukakpɛkpɛɔ mɛ ɛ.
2Atɔ Aya ɔki mlɔ yɛ asigagadidi, kusuyɔ ni kulɔlɔ ní kisrɛsrɛ mɛ.
Eboa la gi ɛtra gbani Asia na badɔbasɛ ba ɛkpɛ ɛ
3Mɛ baʋia veve ba, gi mazekeni edi si miŋwlimi i iki mlɔ ní kubúbú liɔ gi kulɛ ní blɔ awla ní likpɔkpɛkpɛ mɛ kyɛ ɛ, mamɔ si, liziã si miŋwlimi tɔ mikpɛ mlɔ kigagla atɔ mlaŋwlɛ mlɔ kuziŋaa gi Aya aki banama a, gi bɛzɛ yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, litukpo. 4Lɛ banɔatɔ gi ba kuzizi yo su bɛŋwlimi plɛ koko e, bɛza eku ní mlɔ kusi ní kikpokpo me gi mléte e. Benu banɔ gi béte Aya a, ba bɛtsrɛ blɔ Aya yɛ lipomepɛpɛ nɛ liboe le tɔ biamɔ kude tɔ biawa ba kihasi ye, lɛ bɛnada Yesu Kristo blɔ Ɔʋadi ye ni Ɔkaɛ.
5Lɛ gi mlete la ya petee fɛ ɛ, mapɛ si miplɛ aŋu iiki mlɔ si Ɔkaɛ ebu yɛ banima adɔni Egipte, pɔ̀ lɛ kede e, ezizi banama gi bázɛ yɛ aʋa aŋa ɛ. 6Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛa ba gi béze ní kigaglaɛ liɛ gi Aya aki ba ese e, pɔ̀ xe bɛsɛ ní ba izeklɔ ɛ, bɛkpɛ ba litumu ne me gi bɛkpɛ ba bibɔ kɔtsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ mɛ ki litsixwaxwa ní Liwe ʋidi le aʋa a. 7Nite me ke Sodom ni Gomora kɔpɔni ima sisami i nɛ gi iklani ba kyɛ ɛ, bɛyurɔ isu ya ɛki adzɛboe ni enyimeboe ni anyaniboe kakaa elu. Benu liŋwitsɛ aki banama gi betrámɔ kutuhehe ni kifu mobloe me e.
8Nite ke banɔ ba ya gi bizɛɛza balila ʋa a, bizɛbitɛ eboe zimizi ni ba tutɔ ba bisugya ʋɛ, lɛ begbe kutununu ikí Aya xe bizezizi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne su i. 9Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ɔka Mixael kura kyɛ ɔ́mani onugu ní ozimizi ye su, lipoe lɛ gi yɛ ni ozimizi ye behe eboe ní ɔniliɛ gi yɛ linu si ɔzɛ Mose yɛ okpo ye e su. Mixael ókeni ódi si yibu ozimizi ye lipɔ nì kukpini, kipani ko apani si “Ɔkaɛ ɔká aŋu mɛ ɔki wɔ.” 10Pɔ̀ banɔ ba ya kɔ ɛ, bizekɔ kukpini iiki kidɔ kakaa gi kɛ ese gi bénu i, lɛ ŋwisi liŋwafu mɛ baga gi baʋíbu litukpo me kinɛ ɛ, bizɛbitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi kiba ba begyodi ʋa mɛ ɛ, gi kɛ ese benu i, lɛ bidɔ bɛ klɔ ʋa ke bizɛki si bizɛkyrɔ.
11Baba ki ba! Bɛga Kain yɛ kugakli yɔ mɛ. Kɔkpɛ kibɔɛ loso e, bɛta kese ŋwisi Baalam kiniɛ, lɛ bɛyɔ kedu ya ní Aya su, lɛ bɛkyrɔ ŋwisi Kora kiniɛ.
12Banɔ ba ya benu kinyani ní mlɔ kunɔlɔɔ kɔ likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ bidɔ mɛ ɔŋa klɔ gi bɛŋa bidɔ mɛ kuyemose e. Benu beʋesigbanɔ gi ba tutɔ isu ya ko bɛganɔ ɔ. Balɛ ko ŋwisi aplɛ gi liwɔ lɛ lifu i klanɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ aʋídɔ dzeni i. Balɛ ko ŋwisi ise gi iʋiyo esebi liwewe ní la liyopoe le aʋa a. Ise gi bɛkpaʋi ni lɛ igu ne e, xe itse petee e. 13Balɛ ŋwisi kuni akpɔ ní axu la mɛ ɛ, gi ɛɛwa anyra na a, lɛ ba eyeyeboe la ɛɛfiʋi ŋwisi ɔfɔ ni kuni yo aŋu mɛ ɛ. Balɛ ko ŋwisi aŋwi gi ɛɛyɔ ní la ozeklɔ ɔ, xe ɛɛlila kinɛ ɛ, gi Aya abla ozekɔ akɔ ní litumu gluglu moblo le me e.
14Henox gi onu Adam yɛ osobi gloele e, edo liboe aplɛ ní banɔ ba ya su si, “Dike Ɔkaɛ atrába nì yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra akpe akpe ʋa, 15gi biaxwa litsi ni banima petee e, lɛ biabu banama petee gi bése Aya ɛ lipɔ, kɔkpɛ ba eboe zimizi ana gi bɛbitɛ ní kude uliɔ ɔ, gi kúma ni Aya yɛ kudeo onu u loso. Lɛ biabu enugumeboe ala gi banama klɔ ɔ, gi bizɛbitɛ eboe zimizi na ɛ, bɛpani manɔ ní yɛ su.”
16Banɔ ba ya ɛ, benu banɔ gi bizɛɛtɛ̃ ɛ, xe bizebu banɔdzedze ba lipɔ ɔ; bizeezeni ba tutɔ ba bapɛ́pɛ zimizi ba kude; bizɛɛdɔ̀ isu ya, lɛ bizɛkpɔ̀ banima kiliɛ gi biamɔ kudeonu ki ba ɔtutɔ lɔ isu ya loso o.
Bagbágba ʋa ni batrɔtrɔ ʋa
17Mɛ baʋia dimɛnɔ ba, mlaplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ gi blɔ Ɔkaɛ Yesu Kristo yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bɛpani aʋa a. 18Bɛsi mlɔ si, “Ní ewe gɔgɔ la mɛ ɛ, banima biaba gi biakpɛ mlɔ kakpaa a, lɛ biazeni ba ɔtutɔ ba bapɛ́pɛ gi bamá ni Aya yɛ kupɛpɛ onu i kude.”
19Banɔ ba ya ɛ, bizɛmani kulɛlɛ, gi balɛ ni batutɔ ba isu mɛ bapɛ́pɛ ʋa kude e, ɔkpɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔma ní ba mɛ loso o.
20Pɔ̀ mlɔ, mɛ baʋia dimɛnɔ ba ɛ, mlatre ní lɛ aʋa tɔ mlaʋɔ̀ mlɔ isu ya pɔnɔ ní mlɔ kuziŋa dradraa mɛ, tɔ mlaxwa Aya ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ mɛ. 21Mleze ní Aya yɛ kunɔlɔɔ mɛ, gi mleepe blɔ Ɔkaɛ Yesu Kristo yɛ asigagadidi la a, gi la aamani mlɔ ligbã́ moblo le e.
22Mledi baʋaziŋaa ba gi bápɛ si bɛɛzɛ liboe le e, asigaga, 23mlaʋa banɔ dzedze ba tɔ mlebu ba ní kifu yɛ mɛ, lɛ kí batɔ fɛ ɛ, mledi ba asigaga pɔ̀ mlabitɛ lɛ ni litɔplɛplɛkese kese ni lifu, tɔ mlakíki si ba ligbã́ zimizi ne e, lità eku ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ.
Aya Kuxwaxwa ni yɛ Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀
24Ki ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ko aatani kuki si mlatrágleʋe e, xe aamani mlɔ kesemɔta ni isami ní yɛ kuklekleo aŋu mɛ ɛ, 25kí Aya tolee gi onu blɔ Obúbú ye e, gani Yesu Kristo, blɔ Ɔkaɛ aʋa ɛ, yɛ ko kwiakɔ kubùbù kɔ. Yɛ onu kigaglaɛ petee onete, lɛ yɛ ɛɛŋa kukusi yo ní kidɔ kakaa aʋa dɔni kanɔa mɛ kɔtsini kanɔmɛ! Atɔ liba lɛ mɛ.

Title: KUB 1
Content:
1Eboe ala gi Aya ebu ɛbasɛ gani Yesu Kristo aʋa a, tɔ ɔbasɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba, eboe ala gi lilɛ si aba la mɛ ní lipoe kpekpemi itɔ mɛ ɛ. Aki si bete la gani yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gi akpɛ ní Yohanes yɛ ɔnɔ sumu ye klɔ ɔ. 2Lɛ Yohanes aŋa katsalia, lɛ apani ní kidɔ kakaa gi amɔ ɛ su, si lɛ ya linu Aya yɛ liboe le ni liboe lɛ gi lido edɔ ní Yesu Kristo onu u. 3Biakrira ɔniliɛ gi izɛkla kuboedoplɛɔ liɔ ya mɛ eboe la ɛ, lɛ biakrira banama gi beenu kɔ mɛ eboe la a, xe bizeenu kutu iiki eboe ala gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní kɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si lipoe le lina pɔ.
Kunɔpanɔ kwidɔ ní Yohanes klɔ ɛki isɔli ha tigloele le
4Keplekpaa lia kɛdɔ ní mɛ Yohanes klɔ ɛki Isɔli ha tigloele le ní Asia yɛ keweku ya:
Lipomɛpɛpɛ ni kusuyɔ ki mlɔ dɔni yɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔlɛ ɛ, gi eze e, xe atrába ɛ klɔ, ni dɔni ifuɛfuɛ tigloele le gi ilɛ ní yɛ likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ klɔ, 5ani dɔni Yesu Kristo, gi onu anukwarɛɛ yɛ katsalia klɔ ɔ, yɛ gi onu obi tɔpu u, yɛ gi ayɔ adɔ ni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, kɔpɔni kesea ʋa bekusi ba ba ɔʋaŋaɛ klɔ!
Yɛ ɔniliɛ gi alɔ blɔ ɔ, xe akɔ yɛ ìka lɛ eplo blɔ eboe zimizi na ní blɔ su i, 6Yɛ abitɛ blɔ si kuze yɛ kaʋaŋaa ni yɛ kusumu yo baka gi kwiazesumu Yɛka Aya a, yɛ linɛ linu kusudra ani kigagla dɔni kanɔmɛ tsinɔ kanɔmɛ! Atɔ liba lɛ mɛ.
7Dike, atrába ní aplɛ la mɛ,
lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa ámɔ yɛ,
banama gi bɛsɔ́ yɛ bidɔ mɛ kyɛ ɛ,
lɛ banima petee ní kesea aʋa biabemi ɔkpɛ yɛ! Ee, atɔ liba lɛ mɛ.
8“Mɛ menu Alfa ni Omega.” Nite Ɔka Aya apani, “yɛ gi ɔlɛ ɛ, xe eze e, xe atrába ɛ, kigaglaɛ petee onetee.”
Bebu Kristo ebasɛ Yohanes
9Mɛ menu Yohanes, mlɔ onemi lɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi ɔlɛ ni Yesu kude e, menu mlɔ ɔgaglɔnɛ ní litɔplɛplɛkese ni ikù kpɛkpɛ ní ɔziã mɔmɔ nɔ gi izɛɛba banama gi benu yɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ banɛ ba aʋa ɛ. Meze ní Patmos kunisi yo kese katɔ aʋa kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ liboe le ani katsalia kuŋaŋa ki Yesu loso o. 10Meze ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ mɛ ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ liwe le aʋa, lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ ní mɛ kedea, ŋwisi kakuklui keeyi kinɛ, lɛ ɛpani si: 11“Kidiliɛ gi wɔmɔ ɛ, ŋwlimi kɛ kpɛ ní keplekpa mɛ, tɔ kɔ ka tsisi isɔli ha tigloele le gi ilɛ ní Efeso ni Smirna ni Pergamo kɔpɔni Tiatira ni Sardis ani Filadelfia kɔpɔni Laodikea.”
12Mekyi, si mídi ɔniliɛ gi eegu kunugu yo ni me e. Agi mekyi i, mamɔ sika kani ise tigloele, 13lɛ ní kani yɛ ise le kusi i, mamɔ ɔnutɔ gi ɔlɛ ŋwisi “Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye” kinɛ ɛ, gi akpɛ liwu gblamadzaɛtɔ ɔ, gi liplee na yɛ kuklikpɔɔ ɔ, lɛ akɔ sika yɛ lisaba ɛtɔ akɔ anya yɛ kakɔa mɛ ɛ. 14Yɛ litukpo le ni yɛ siya sɛ sixwa pititi ŋwisi ɖeti pititi yɛ kinɛ ɛ, ŋwisi amukla kinɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ bimbi ʋe bilɛ ŋwisi kifu binemi kinɛ ɛ, 15lɛ yɛ ikli lɛ izeŋle ŋwisi ɔla gi bebu ní kifu ligble le me kinɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ ole lo eeyì ŋwisi inipe glegle gi iidɔ limu ne lɛ ozi lo kinɛ ɛ. 16Lɛ evu badzidziebi tiegloele ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, lɛ ihɛ nunu gblamadza inugu tiʋa edo edɔni yɛ onugu lo me. Yɛ aŋu na mɛ eekle ŋwisi kemizea liwo le kinɛ ɛ.
17Gi mamɔ yɛ ɛ, madɔ ní yɛ ikli lɛ onu ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi etse kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ akɔ yɛ ɔŋawla lɔ atrɔ ní mɛ aʋa lɛ apani si, “Wukíse lifu u, mɛ menu Ɔtɔpu yɛ ni Ɔgɔgɔɛ. 18Mɛ malɛ ligbã́, metse, pɔ̀ di ke, malɛ ligbã́ nɛ kɔtsinɔ ní kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ, lɛ safi ʋa gi bɛki mɛ kigagla ní kutseo ni bekpo ʋa mɛ aʋa ɛ, balɛ ní mɛ awla.
19“Lɛ loso ŋwlimi plɛ kidiliɛ gi wɔmɔ ɔ, gi kilɛ abla a ni kidiliɛ gi kitraba kɛ mɛ lɛ kede e. 20Badzidziebi tiegloele ba gi wɔmɔ ní mɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, ani sika yɛ kani yɛ ise tigloele le e, lɛ eboe kpokpo la ese enu si: Badzidziebi tiegloele ba benu Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ kí isɔli ha tigloele le, lɛ kani ise tigloele le inu isɔli ha tigloele e.

Title: KUB 2
Content:
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Efeso ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
1“Ŋwlimi kí Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Efeso ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i:
Ɔniliɛ gi evu badzidziebi tiegloele ʋa ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, xe ɛɛga ní sika kani yɛ ise tigloele le kusi yo e, yɛ apani eboe ala ya si: 2Mete mlɔ kiboebitɛɛ ni mlɔ axwɛwawa gagla la, ani mlɔ igyi dodo le. Lɛ mete si mlaʋítani banɔ zimizi ba eboe la kudimɛ nɔ ɔ, lɛ mlefeke banama gi bizɛɛpani si i, ba benu banɔkpɛkpɛ ba, pɔ̀ bénu idi, lɛ mlɛmɔ ba si basia nɛ benu u. 3pɔ̀ mlɛkpɛ iku nɛ, lɛ mlɛga kuyeʋiyeʋi me kɔkpɛ mɛ linyi ne loso, pɔ̀ fɛ mlépe e.
4Pɔ̀ mamɔ kiditɔ gi kípɛ ní mlɔ su u, mlɛyurɔ kulɔlɔ tɔpu liɔ gi kwize ní mlɔ awla ɛki mɛ ɛ. 5Mlaplɛ aŋu ní niklɔ gi mlɛwɔli dɔnɔ ɛ, mlekyi ɔna mɛ tɔ mlabitɛ kidiliɛ gi mlɛzɛɛbitɛ tsa ɛ, pɔ̀ xegi mlékyi ɔna mɛ ɛ, maaba mlɔklɔ lɛ maaba efeke mlɔ kani yɛ ose lo ní lɔ ozeklɔ. 6Pɔ̀ liboe lɛ ya litrɔ ní mlɔ aʋa si, mlɛtrɔ Nikolaitianɛ ma ba kiboebitɛɛ ahwafi, gi mɛkyɛ matrɔ ahwafi la ɛ.
7Ɔniliɛ awla gi kutu kulɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani ki isɔliha lɛ ɛ si: Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, maaki yɛ kude si ɔŋa ligbã́ nɛ ose lo lɔ ebi yoyo la, gi ɔlɛ ní Aya yɛ Paradiso ye me e.
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Smirna ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
8“Ŋwlimi ki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Smirna ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i: Ɔniliɛ gi yɛ onu ɔtɔpu yɛ ni ɔgɔgɔɛ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi etse e, pɔ̀ xe ayɔ edzì ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, yɛ eboe la la ya si: 9Mete wɔ ɔzia nɔ ani wɔ lipi le pɔ̀ oxonete wonu! Mete banama gi bizɛxwa isu ya si Yudanɛ bénu u, gi ba bizɛɛpani enugumeboe mani wɔ su tɔ beezizi wɔ su u, pɔ̀ bénu Yudanɛ ɛ, gi ba ɔtsaklɔ onu Satana yɛ ɔnɛ ɛ. 10Wukíse ɔziã nɔ klɔ gi wɔtramɔ ɔ. Dike, Ozimizi ye atrákpɛ mlɔ mɛ banɔ batɔ ligba, atɔ yikeni mlo edi, lɛ mlamɔ kutuhehe ewe liɔfɔ. Pɔ̀ mleze ní anukwarɛɛ aʋa zɛkɔna ni kutse me ke e, tɔ maakí mlɔ ligbã́ nɛ likusikuto le.
11“Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ kí yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani iiki Isɔliha lɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, ɔ́tramɔ kutse ʋlaa kɔ ɔziã a.
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Pergamo ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
12“Ŋwlimi tsisi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Pergamo ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i: Ɔniliɛ awla gi ihɛ nunu gblamadzaɛ inugu tiʋa lɛ ɔlɛ ɛ, yɛ eboe la la ya si: 13Mete ɔma nɔ klɔ mɛ gi wɔlɛ́ ɛ, niklɔ gi Ozimizi ye edu yɛ likusigbo le e. Pɔ̀ wovu mɛ linyi ne ní awla gagla a, lɛ wɔ́nada wɔ kuziŋa ní mɛ mɛ̀, ní ewe a la mɛ gi beye Antipa fɛ ɛ, gi yɛ aŋa anukwarɛɛ katsalia aki mɛ ɛ, ní mlɔ ɔma ʋidi lo me gi níklɔ Ozimizi ye ɔlɛ ɛ.
14Pɔ̀ eboe atɔ alɛ ní wɔsu u; lɛ ese linu si banama gi bevu Baalam kudɔbasɛ yɔ ní awla ɛ, balɛ ní wɔ su, gi yɛ abasɛ Balak si, omeni Israel bebi ba onu tɔ babitɛ eboe zimizi gani bidɔ ŋaŋa gi bɛki babu ʋa mɛ ɛ, ani tɔ bawa kihasi ye. 15Niteme ke banama gi bevu Nikolaitia nɛ ma bidɔbasɛbasɛ mɛ ní awla ɛ, kyɛ bákpasi ní mlɔ kusi. 16Lɛ loso kyi ní wɔ ɔna mɛ; xe aníte e, maaba wɔ klɔ kpekpe, lɛ maakɔ ihɛ liɛ gi ɔlɛ ní mɛ onugu lo me e, maakɔ yɛ ɔta kigũ nì ba.
17Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani iiki Isɔliha lɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, maaki yɛ mana liɛ gi bekpo e yɛ ɔtɔ, lɛ maaki yɛ likla pititi, gi bɛŋwlimi linyi vuvu itrɔ lɛ aʋa a, linyi gi ɔnɔ dzedze ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́trate e, sani ɔniliɛ gi yɛ azɛ lɛ ɛ.
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Tiatira ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
18“Lɛ ŋwlimi ki aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Tiatira ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i:
Aya Yebi ye, ɔniliɛ gi yɛ bimbi ʋe bilɛ ŋwisi kifu u, gi kiisɔ kinɛ ɛ, xe yɛ ikli lɛ ilɛ ŋwisi ɔlaakyikyi gi bɛkpɛ kifu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, yɛ apani eboa la si: 19Mete wɔ axwɛwawa la, wɔ kunɔlɔɔ, ni wɔ kuziŋaa ani wɔ kunɔsumu yo kɔpɔni wɔ kukenidi yo, lɛ wɔɛkpɛ ikù nɛ abla ɛsani kiliɛ gi lize kutɔpu yɔ ɔ.
20Pɔ̀ mamɔ liboe lɛ ya ní wɔ su si, wɔki ɔdzɛ liɛ klɔ Isabel gi ɛɛxwa isu ya si ye nu oboedoplɛ ɛ, kudeonu. Gani yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ, eemeni mɛ banɔsumu ba ɛkpɛ ní kihasi ye me, ani tɔ baŋa bidɔ bɛ ya gi bɛki babu ʋa ɛ. 21Maki yɛ lipoe, si okyi yɛ ɔna mɛ dɔni yɛ kihasiwawaɛ mɛ; pɔ̀ ɔ́dimɛ ɛ. 22Lɛ loso, matrasa yɛ plɛ ɔnyanya ɔtɔsi aʋa, lɛ banama gi bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ ɛ, xegi békyi adɔ ni ba kiboebitɛ liɛ ya mɛ ɛ, maakɔ kupepe ʋidi ukpɛ ní ba mɛ ɛ. 23Maaye yɛ bebi ba. Lɛ Isɔliha lɛ petee iate si, mɛ menu ɔniliɛ gi izɛɛpami ina nɛ ni begyodi ʋa mɛ, lɛ maatsa lɛ ɔki mlɔ mɛ ɔkakaa ní yɛ kiboebitɛɛ onu u. 24Abla mɛɛsi mlɔ banɔ gɔgɔ ba ní Tiatira, mlɔ banama gi mlévu bidɔ basɛbasɛɛ bɛ ya ní awla a, xe bákpasi Ozimizi ye yɛ eboe kpokpo la a, gi áma ní la mɛ ɛ. Mátratrɔ lidɔtu dzedze tɔtɔ ní mlɔ aʋa tɔ ɔ. 25Kidiliɛ gi kilɛ ní mlɔ awla ɛ, mlevu kɛ mɛ gagla a, kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi maaba ɛ.
26Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa a, xe izɛɛbitɛ ní mɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, zɛkɔna ni ɔgù kɔ ɛ, maaki yɛ kigagla ní amade na aʋa.
27‘Aagbani ba ni ɔwla gagla,
lɛ ayaʋi ba xwitsixwitsi ŋwisi kufukpo kinɛ’,
ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mɛ fɛ mamɔ kigagla dɔni Mɔka klɔ kinɛ ɛ. 28Lɛ maakɔ livlɛ lɛ ɔdzidziobi ye aki yɛ. 29Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani iiki Isɔliha lɛ ɛ.

Title: KUB 3
Content:
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Sardis ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
1“Ŋwlimi ki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Sardis ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i: Ɔniliɛ awla gi Aya yɛ ifuɛfuɛ tigloele le ni badzidziebi tigloele ba balɛ ɛ, yɛ ɛɛpani eboe ala ya si: Mete wɔ axwɛwawa la, linyi lilɛ wɔ awla si, wɔlɛ ligbã́ pɔ̀ wotse e. 2Nyime tɔ kpɛ bidɔ ɛmɛ gi bigɔ ɔ, xe biatse e, kigagla, lɛ ese linu si mámɔ si wɔ axwɛwawa la ɛna ní mɛ Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ. 3Lɛ loso e, plɛ aŋu ní kidiliɛ gi wɔzɛ ɛ, xe wonu i aʋa, atɔ bitɛ lɛ aʋa, tɔ kyi ɔna mɛ. Xegi wɔ́ma ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ ɛ, maaba do ní wɔ aʋa ŋwisi oze kinɛ ɛ, lɛ wɔtrate ɔnyɔsasa nɔ mɛ gi maado ní wɔ aʋa a.
4Pɔ̀ banɔ klakla atɔ balɛ ní Sardis, gi bélulu ba ewu la a. Ba biakpɛ ewu pititi lɛ biaga ni mɛ: lɛ ese linu si ba begyeno o. 5Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, biakpɛ liwu pititi kí yɛ ŋwisi ba kiniɛ ɛ, lɛ mátratsoli yɛ linyi ne ni ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ liwewe, pɔ̀ madra yɛ linyi ne su ní Mɔka ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba aŋu mɛ ɛ. 6Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani iiki Isɔliha lɛ ɛ.
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi i aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Filadelfia ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
7“Ŋwlimi ki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ liɛ gi eedi Filadelfia ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i: Ɔniliɛ gi onu ɔdradra yɛ ni anukwarɛɛ onete ye, ɔniliɛ gi yɛ awla Dawid yɛ safi ye ɔlɛ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi izɛdra xe ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋítani kudà a, xe izɛda a, xe ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋítani kudra ɛ, yɛ eboe la la ya si: 8Mete wɔ axwɛwawa la! Dike, madra opupo gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kudà aki wɔ ɔ: lɛ ese linu si mete si kigagla sisami itɔ ko kilɛ ní wɔ awla a, pɔ̀ wɔbitɛ ní mɛ liboe le aʋa a, lɛ wɔ́nada si wote mɛ linyi ne e. 9Dike, matraki si banama gi benu Satana yɛ ɔtsaklɔ banima ɛ, banama gi bizɛxwa isu ya si benu Yudanɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe bénu u, boŋu i benu basia nɛ, dike maaki si biabakpɛ litukpo kese aki wɔ, lɛ biazɛ lɛ si malɔ wɔ. 10Kiliɛ gi wovu mɛ isã nɛ ní awla a, xe wɔkpɛ ikù nɛ ni litɔplɛplɛkese loso e, mɛfɛ maawe wo ní litsixwaxwa lɛ lipoe lɛ gi litrába kelea petee aʋa mɛ ɛ, gi lɛ biafeke banama a, gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa odi i me.
11Matraba kpekpemii. Vu kidiliɛ gi kilɛ ní wɔ awla mɛ gagla a, tɔ ɔnɔnɔ ɔkizɛ wɔ likusikuto le ní wɔ awla a. 12Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, maabitɛ yɛ tɔ aaze ɔgbase ní mɛ Aya yɛ lisɔligba lɛ mɛ. Lɛ ɔ́trasɛ ní niklɔ liwewe tɔ ɔ. Maaŋwlimi mɛ Aya yɛ linyi ne trɔ ní yɛ aʋa. Lɛ maaŋwlimi mɛ Aya yɛ ɔma ʋidi no lɔ linyi ne, gi onu Yerusalem vuvu yɛ gi eeple dɔ ní mɛ Aya gi ɔlɛ ní lifunu ne klɔ trɔ ní yɛ aʋa a. Lɛ maaŋwlimi mɛ linyi vuvu nɛ trɔ ni yɛ aʋa a. 13Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani iiki isɔliha lɛ ɛ.
Liboe lɛ gi aŋwlimi aki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Laodikea ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa ɛ
14“Ŋwlimi ki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ gi eedi Laodikea ɔsɔli ha lɔ aʋa si i: Ɔniliɛ gi bizɛxwa si Amen i, gi yɛ onu anukwarɛɛ ni katsalia ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi gani yɛ aʋa Aya abitɛ kidɔ kakaa ɛ, yɛ eboe la la ya si: 15Mete wɔ axwɛwawa la si, wɔ́yɔ fɛ, lɛ wɔ́zɛ kifu fɛ. Nya mapɛ si tɔ wɔayɔ loo wɔazɛ kifu. 16Pɔ̀ gi wɔgblɔ̀ ɛ, wɔ́zɛ kifu, xe wɔ́yɔ fɛ loso e, matrapi wɔ ebu ní mɛ onugu lo me. 17Lɛ ese linu si, wuzɛɛpani si, “Menu oxonete, lɛ bidɔ bilɛ ní mɛ awla a, lɛ kididɔ kiziã mɛ ɛ.” pɔ̀ wóte si, ɔzianete ni ɔsigaganete, opiplinete, kaŋupo ani ɔnɔ gi awɔ liyà yɛ wònu u. 18Migba wɔ tɔ dzi sika, gi bɛwlɔ ní kifu mɛ ɛ, xe yɛ su adra a, ní mɔklɔ, tɔ wɔadzi oxonete, ni kusa pititi gi wɔanyime e, atɔ wɔakɔ okpo wɔ liyà lɛ mɛ, ani kimbi ye kuwa, tɔ wɔala ní wɔ bimbi ʋe aʋa tɔ wɔamɔ bidɔ.
19Mizɛɛtɛni banama gi malɔ ɛ, lɛ mizeehe kutu iiki ba; lɛ loso e, kpɛ ikù nɛ tɔ kyí ɔna mɛ. 20Dike, malɛɛ ní opupo lo onu gi mɛɛsa opupo lo e; xe ɔnutɔ enu mɛ ole lo o, xe adra opupo lo e, maati iku yɛ aʋa, lɛ maaŋa bidɔ nì yɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ fɛ aaŋa bidɔ nì mɛ ɛ.
21Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, maaki yɛ kudeonu gi aaze pɔni mɛ ní mɛ likusigbo le aʋa a, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mɛ fɛ maŋa aʋa a, xe medi ni Mɔka ní yɛ likusigbo le aʋa kinɛ ɛ. 22Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, onu liboe lɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani ki Isɔliha lɛ ɛ.”

Title: KUB 4
Content:
Likusigbo le ní lifunu ne
1Lɛ ya kede e, gi meedi i, dike mamɔ opupo ɔtɔ gi ɛdra edu ní lifunu ne e. Lɛ ole tɔpu ɔnɔ gi menu i, egu kunugu yo ni me ŋwisi kakuklui kinɛ si: Ga ba lifunu ne ní ya, tɔ mibasɛ wɔ eboe ala gi ɛtraba la mɛ ní la ya kede e. 2Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ eeku ní mɛ mɛ̀, lɛ mamɔ likusigbo gi bedu ní lifunu ne, lɛ ɔnutɔ odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ. 3Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ, yɛ isu ya iitsi kifu yɛ, kiwɔwɔ ni kikyikyi ŋwisi akla zi kedzi gi bizɛɛxwa si yaspis likla ani kanelia likla kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔkũ yɛ, gi ɔlɛ ŋwisi emerald likla loo ŋwisi liwlakpa wɔwɔ kinɛ ɛ, aklani likusigbo le e. 4Lɛ ekusigbo avitaʋa ni tene dzedze ɛklani likusigbo le, lɛ banɔtsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene bedi ní ekusigbo ala klɔ aʋa ɛ. Bɛkpɛ bidɔ pititi, lɛ bekume sika ekusikuto ní ba etukpo la a. 5Lɛ dzeni ye azeebu kifu yɛ xe azaalaʋi i, xe azeegu adɔni likusigbo le me e. Lɛ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, kani tiegloele bɛɛsɔ. Ba benu Aya yɛ ifuɛfuɛ tigloele le. 6Ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, kiditɔ gi kilɛ ŋwisi axu la a, afini gi la mɛ ɛzrɔ ɔ, xe eekle nianiania ŋwisi azinzi kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bidɔ gbagbe tune, gi biyi bimbi ʋe, ɔtɔ ni kede, bize ní kusio ani klani likusigbo le. 7Lɛ kidɔgbagbe tɔpu yɛ kilɛ lɛ ko ŋwisi gyata yɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ gbagbe ʋla ɛ kilɛ ŋwisi ligumenyime kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ gbagbɛ tanɛ ɛ kɛ aŋu na mɛ alɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ aŋu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ gbagbe nene ke e, kilɛ ŋwisi kadzi gi keepruru kinɛ ɛ. 8Bidɔ gbagbe tune ʋe bikákaa siwlasasa tuglo silɛ ki bɛ, lɛ bimbi ʋe bilɛ klani bɛsu ní bɛ siwlasasa sɛ ese fɛ. Lɛ biʋízemɔni elesi ni kemize, bizɛɛkpɔ̀ Aya si:
“Kusudra, kusudra, kusudra kunu Ɔkaɛ, Aya kigaglaɛ petee Ɔkaɛ kunɛ, Yɛ gi eze e, xe ɔlɛ ɛ, xe atrába ɛ!”
9Lɛ xe bidɔ gbagbe ʋe biki ɔniliɛ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa kusudra kubùbù yo ni ɖasedodo e, xe ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ dɔni kanɔmɛ tsini kanɔmɛ ɛ, 10kɔlɔ banɔtsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba bɛdɔ ní kesea ní ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ, kɔ bɛkpɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ tsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ. Kɔ bɛkɔ ba ekusikuto la ɛplɛ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ, kɔ bɛpani si:
11“Blɔ Ɔkaɛ nì Aya, wɔ wogyeno si, wɔazɛ kusudra ni kubùbù yo ani kigaglaɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ wɔbitɛ kidɔ kakaa, lɛ bilɛ lɛ ese linu si wɔbitɛ bɛ ní wɔ kupɛ́pɛɔ onu.”

Title: KUB 5
Content:
Keʋesibi ya kɛdra keplekpaa
1Lɛ mamɔ keplekpaa, gi bɛŋwlimi bidɔ ní ka kupɛɔ tuʋa petee e, xe bɛtsala ka onu ní ikɔ tigloele ní ɔniliɛ klɔ ɔ, gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, yɛ kaŋawla mɛ. 2Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gagla ɔtɔ gi ɛɛkla ni ole gagla ɔtɔ si: “Nyaŋwɛ egyeno gi aable bidɔ bɛ ya a, gi bɛkɔ ɛtsala keplekpaa a, xe aadra keplekpaa lia ya ɛ?” 3Pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ óze ní lifunu ne loo kesea aʋa loo ní kesea ese e, gi aatani keplekpa kudra loo aatani ka mɛ kudi i. 4Lɛ mebemi mɔmɔmɔ, lɛ ese linu si bámɔ ɔnɔnɔ gi ana a, xe aadra keplekpaa loo aadi ka mɛ ɛ. 5Pɔ̀ lɛ banɔtsitsi ba mɛ tole asi mɛ si; “Wukíbemi; dike, ɔniliɛ gi bizɛxwa si gyata yɛ ɛ, gi ádɔ Yuda okú no me e, gi agyɔ ádɔ ní Dawid igù ne me e, aŋa aʋa. Yɛ aatani keplekpaa ni bidɔ tugloelee ʋɛ gi bɛkɔ ɛ tsala keplekpaa onu i, kudra.”
6Lɛ mamɔ Keʋesibi gi kɛɛŋwi ŋwisi kiye beye ka na a, gi kalɛɛ ní likusigbo le kusio, lɛ bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe tune ʋe ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛklani ka ɛ. Eyi asia tegloele ni bimbi tugloele, gi binu Aya yɛ ifuɛfuɛ tigloele le, gi bɛkpɛ tsisi ní kesea petee aʋa a. 7Lɛ aba, xe azɛ keplekpaa ní ɔniliɛ ɛ, gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, yɛ kaŋawla mɛ. 8Lɛ gi azɛ keplekpaa ɛ, bidɔ gbagbe tune ʋe ni banɔtsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba bɛdɔ kesea ní keʋesibi ya aŋu mɛ. Ba mɛ ɔkakaa evu ɔʋinta ní awla, lɛ bevu sika kuzi gi kwiyi ni lifi ye e, gi onu banama a, gi beesumu Aya ba Aya kuxwaxwa a. 9Lɛ bɛza ɔdzi vuvu gi lɔ eboe la enu si:
“Wɔ wogyeno si wɔazɛ keplekpaa,
xe wɔable bidɔ bɛ klɔ gi bɛkɔ ɛtsala ka a,
lɛ ese linu si beye wo,
lɛ wɔ ika lɛ ɛ, wɔkɔ lɛ odzi banɔ aki Aya
dɔni limade kakaa, ni siya kakaa, ni banɔ kakaa, ní kese kakaa aʋa.
10Wɔbitɛ ba si beze kukusi ni kusumu yo baka gi biazesumu blɔ Aya a, lɛ biaŋa aʋa ní kesea aʋa.”
11Lɛ medi xe menu Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ kpaŋukpaŋu atɔ ɔ, gi ba kiklakla mɛ kisani akpe ni akpe liɔfɔ ede akpe liɔfɔ ba ole lo o. Bɛklani likusigbo le ni bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe ʋe ani banɔtsitsi ba. 12Bɛɛza ɔdzi ni ole gagla si:
“Keʋesibi ya lia gi beye e, ka kegyeno
si kazɛ kaʋaŋaa, ni exo, ni kuboete, ni kigagla,
ni kubùbù, ni kusudra ani kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀!”
13Lɛ menu gi kidɔ bitɛbitɛ kakaa gi kilɛ ní lifunu ne e, ni kesea aʋa, ni kesea ese, ni axu la mɛ, ani kudɔkpaa liɔ klɔ gi kukpasi ní kɔ mɛ ɛ, kwiza ɔdzi si:
“Ki Ɔniliɛ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa a, ni Keʋesibi ya,
ba binɛ binu kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ɔ ni kubùbù yo ani kusudra ni kaʋaŋaa,
dɔni kanɔmɛ tsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ!”
14Lɛ bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbee tune ʋe e, bipani si, “Liba lɛ mɛ!” Lɛ banɔtsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba bɛdɔ kesea lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya ɛ.

Title: KUB 6
Content:
Keʋesibi ya keble bidɔ bɛ ya gi bɛkɔ ɛtsala keplekpaa ɛ
1Lɛ gi meedi i, Keʋesibi ya keble bidɔ tugloele ʋe gi bɛkɔ ɛtsala keplekpa ɛ, bɛ bitɔpu ʋɛ. Lɛ menu gi bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe tune ʋe bɛ mɛ tule biipani ni ole ŋwisi dzeni eegu kinɛ si, “Ba!” 2Lɛ mamɔ isɔ pititi ɔtɔ ɔ, ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ yɛ ɛ, evu kunyaa ní awla, lɛ bɛki yɛ likusikuto, lɛ edo atrɛ ŋwisi ɔguta kinɛ ɛ, tɔ yɛ amɔ kaʋaŋaŋa.
3Lɛ gi Keʋesibi ya keeble bidɔ ʋla ʋɛ gi bɛ bɛkɔ ɛtsala keplekpa ɛ, menu bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe ʋla bɛ gi bipani si, “Ba!” 4Lɛ isɔ dzedze, gi azã kyikyi edo e, lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ yɛ ɛ, bɛki yɛ kigaglaɛ, si tɔ aabu kusuyɔɔ zanɔ ní kesea aʋa, tɔ banima biaye ba ahanuglɔ ba. Lɛ bɛki yɛ ihɛ inugu tiʋa ʋidi ɔtɔ.
5Lɛ gi Keʋesibi ya keble bidɔ tanɛ ʋɛ ɛ, gi bɛkɔ ɛtsala keplekpaa ɛ, menu gi bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe tanɛ ʋɛ bipani si “Ba!” Lɛ gi mefeke aŋu na ɛ, mamɔ isɔ kpikpi, lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ yɛ ɛ, evu bidɔ gi bizɛɛkɔ ɛta bidɔ tɔ bedi bɛ kinyipu ye ní awla a. 6Lɛ menu kiditɔ ŋwisi ole dɔni bidɔ bitɛbitɛ gbagbe tune ʋe kusi si; “amu kekpo tiele ki liwe tile axwɛwawa, ani adeʋi kukpo tuta ki liwe tile axwɛwawa, pɔ̀ wukímuni kumu yɔ ni wain yɛ kudzi yo kɔ ɔ.”
7Lɛ gi keʋesibi ya keble bidɔ nene ʋe e, menu bidɔ gbagbe nene ʋe ole lo gi ɛɛpani si i, “Ba!” 8Lɛ mamɔ isɔ gi yɛ kusupeo kwixwa fuu ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi eetse kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ yɛ ɛ, yɛ linyi ne linu Kutse, lɛ Bekpo ʋa mɛ ɔlɛ ni yɛ kude e. Lɛ bɛki ba kigagla a ní kesea kapɛ nenea aʋa, tɔ bakɔ ihɛ inugu tiʋa, ni kuʋɛ ani bànya kɔpɔni baŋuga ʋa tɔ bakɔ eye banima.
9Lɛ gi keble bidɔ tsunɛ ʋɛ ɛ, mamɔ banama gi beye kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ liboe le ni katsalia gi bɛŋa lifumose e loso, ba esobo la ní adɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ese. 10Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi ni ole gagla si: “Ɔkaɛ gi ɛɛŋa aʋa a, Ɔdradra yɛ ni anukwarɛ onete, gakɔna nì lipoe woli koŋ wɔtraxwa litsi ni kelea banima a, xe wɔaʋi kuwle ní blɔ litukpo na a?” 11Lɛ bɛki ba mɛ ɔkakaa liwu pititi gblamadza, lɛ bɛsi ba si, baplɛ litɔ kese lipoe kpekpemi itɔ, zɛkɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi ba ahanuglɔ banɔsumu ba ani ba benemi ba ya, gi bɛtráye e ŋwisi kiliɛ gi beye ba kinɛ ɛ, ba kiklaklaɛ mɛ kiana.
12Lɛ gi meedi i, eble bidɔ glonɛ ʋɛ, lɛ kesea kɛhwa nyani nyani. Liwo le lidɔ litumu ŋwisi kusa kpìkpì kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔdzidziɛ fɛ ekyi ŋwisi ika kinɛ ɛ. 13Lɛ lifunu ne badzidziebi ʋa bɛwɔli dɔ kesea ŋwisi kiliɛ gi esebi yoyo ala gi ázã ɛ, izɛwɔli xe liwɔ ʋidi itɔ liifu kinɛ ɛ. 14Lɛ bɛklɔʋi lifunu ne eza nɔ ŋwisi kagaplekpa gi bɛklɔʋi kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bebu lito kakaa ni kunisi yo kese kakaa ɛzanɔ ní bɛ izeklɔ.
15Lɛ kesea aʋa bekusi ba ni bekusiebi ba ani baguta ba baka ba, bexonete ba ni bamanete ba, ni ɔnɔsumu kakaa kɔpɔni banama gi balɛ ní isuwla mɛ ba petee bezekpo ní ipɛgla nɛ ni aklakpɔ la kusi ní eto la mɛ ɛ. 16Lɛ bɛsi eto la ni aklakpɔ la si, “Mlakpa adɔ blɔ aʋa, atɔ mlekpo blo ní ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, yɛ aŋu mɛ, dɔni Keʋesibi ya ka kusuyeʋio onu! 17Lɛ ese linu si ba kusuyeʋio liwe ʋidi ne lina, lɛ nyaŋwɛ aatani kulɛ ɛ ní ba onu na a?”

Title: KUB 7
Content:
Banɔ 144,000 gi bɛkya ní Israɛl i
1Ní lɛ ya kede e, mamɔ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiene gi balɛ ní kesea ka akɔtɔ tene na aʋa a, lɛ bevu kesea awɔ tene na, tɔ liwɔ ɛtɔtɔ likífu ní kesea aʋa loo ní axu la aʋa loo ní ose ɔtɔtɔ aʋa a. 2Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze gi eedo e dɔni kewetu ya, gi Aya a, gi ɔlɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, yɛ lixaŋu nɛ bikpɛdɔ mɛ bilɛ ni yɛ awla. Lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla tsisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiene ba gi bɛki kigagla si bezizi bidɔ ní kesea ni axu la su i, si: 3“Mlakízizi kididɔ ní kesea loo axu la loo ise le su kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi kwiakpɛ Aya yɛ banɔsumu ba lixaŋu ní ba kutu yo xe e.” 4Lɛ menu banama gi bɛkpɛ lixaŋu nɛ ba kiklaklaɛ mɛ ɛ, gi benu banɔ akpe alafa tole, avitene ni tiene dɔni Israel bebi ba amade na petee me e.
5Dɔni Yuda limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Ruben limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Gad limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
6dɔni Asa limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Naftali limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Manase limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
7dɔni Simeon limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Lewi limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Isakar limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
8dɔni Zebulon limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Yosef limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu;
dɔni Benyamin limade ne me e, bɛkpɛ banɔ akpe liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa lixaŋu.
Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ ní lifunu ne
9Lɛ ya kede e, medi lɛ mamɔ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani kukla ɛ, gi bɛdɔ ní kese kakaa, limade kakaa, ɔma kakaa ni siya kakaa mɛ ɛ, gi balɛɛ ní likusigbo le aŋu mɛ ní Keʋesibi ya ɔtɔ nɔ. Bɛkpɛ ewu pititi gblamadza lɛ bevu siwlawla sɛ ní awla la a, 10lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi ni ole gagla si,
“Kubúbú yo kunu blɔ Aya
gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ
ni keʋesibi ya kunɛ ɛ.”
11Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba petee balɛɛ klani likusigbo le, ni banɔtsitsi ba ani bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe, lɛ bɛfɛ ɛ, lɛ bewe ba aŋu na mɛ kesea a, ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ, lɛ besumu Aya a gi 12bɛpani si,
“liba lɛ mɛ!
Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ɔ ni kusudra
ni kuboete ni ɖase ani kubùbù yo
ni kaʋaŋaa ani kigagla
ki blɔ Aya, dɔni kanɔmɛ tsini kanɔmɛ.
Atɔ liba lɛ mɛ!”
13Lɛ banɔtsitsi ba mɛ tole eʋi me si “Nyaŋwɛ ba ba ya gi bɛkpɛ ewu pititi gblamadza la a, lɛ nifɔ bɛdɔ ɔ?”
14Lɛ mebu lɛ onu si, “Ɔka, wɔ wote!”
Lɛ asi mɛ si, “Banɔ ba ya ɛ, ba benu banama gi bedo edɔ ní kuxixa ʋidi yo me e, lɛ beplo ba ewu la a, xe bɛbitɛ la pitititi ní keʋesibi ya ka ika lɛ mɛ ɛ. 15Lɛ loso,
“balɛ ní Aya yɛ likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ,
lɛ bizeesumu ye elesi ni kemize ní yɛ lisɔligba lɛ mɛ,
lɛ ɔniliɛ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, aaze ní ba kusi lɛ aakpɛ kuka klani ba.
16Kuʋɛ kutráku ba liwewe tɔɔ,
lɛ olile fɛ ɔ́traku ba liwewe tɔɔ ɔ.
Lɛ kuwe kutráta ba tɔɔ
loo liwo le lɛ kuhuhu yo kutrákpɛ ba kunugu u.
17Lɛ ese linu si Keʋesibi ya gi kalɛ ní likusigbo le kusi yo e, kiagbani ba, ŋwisi ba oʋesigbanɔ yɛ kinɛ ɛ.
yɛ aagbani ba tsinɔ ni inide gi izɛki kuni i, gi kuzɛɛkɔ ligbã́ nɛ su u.
Lɛ Aya aatsoli kubeo petee ní ba bimbi ʋe aʋa a.”

Title: KUB 8
Content:
Keʋesibi ya keble bidɔ gloele ʋe
1Lɛ gi keble bidɔ gloele ʋe e, lifunu ne ligɔ tsriɖiɖi kɔki ŋwisi ɔnyɔsasa kapɛ kinɛ ɛ. 2Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele aba gi bizɛlɛ ní Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛki ba kukúklui tugloele.
3Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze ɔbalɛɛ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ su, lɛ evu sika kezi gi ka mɛ bizɛɛkpɛ lifi ye kifu yɛ ɛ. Bɛki yɛ lifi ye kpaŋu si tɔ aakɔ ɔpɔni banɔ dradra ba petee ba Aya kuxwaxwaa ní sika yɛ ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔɔ lɔ gi ɔlɛ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ aʋa. 4Lɛ lifi ye kunyɔɔ ni banɔ dradra ba ba Aya kuxwaxwa ɛ, biyɔ ɛdɔni Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ iwla lɛ mɛ trɛ ní Aya yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ. 5Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ akɔ kezia lia mɛ gi bizɛɛkpɛ lifi ye kifu yɛ ɛ, lɛ ebu kifu yɛ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ aʋa akpɛ ní ka mɛ xe akɔ aŋwia akpɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ; lɛ dzeni ye ekpese kulaʋi i, lɛ dzeni ye egu i, lɛ dzeni ye ekpese kifu yɛ kubu i xe kesea kyɛ kekpese kuhwa ɛ.
Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba beme ba Kukúklui yɔ
6Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba gi bevu kukúklui tugloele ko e, bɛbla si beme ko.
7Gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tɔpu yɛ eme yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, amukla ni kifu gi kipisa ni ika ɛ, bɛŋwia bɛ ɛkpɛ kesea aʋa a. Lɛ kesea kapɛ tanɛa kɛkani i, ise le kapɛ tanɛa kɛkani, lɛ siwa wɔwɔ sɛ petee kyɛ sikani i.
8Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ʋla yɛ eme yɛ kakuklui ya a, lɛ kiditɔ, gi kilɛ ŋwisi lito ʋidi itɔ ɔ, gi liisɔ kinɛ ɛ, bɛŋwia bɛ ɛkpɛ ní axu la mɛ, lɛ axu la kapɛ tanɛa kekyi dzi ika ɛ, 9lɛ bidɔgbagbee ʋe e, gi bilɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ, bɛ kapɛ tanɛa ketse, lɛ initsahu le lɛ kapɛ tanɛa fɛ kɛyaʋi i.
10Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tanɛɛ eme yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, lɛ ɔdzidziobi ʋidi ɔtɔ, gi azaasɔ ŋwisi ɔbia kinɛ ɛ, awɔli adɔ ní lifune lɛ awɔli adɔ ní inipe le kapɛ tanɛa ani inide ne aʋa ɛ. 11Ɔdzidziobi ye yɛ linyi ne linu si Kutitii lɛ inipe le ni inide ne kapɛ tanɛa kedzi kuni tiitii, lɛ banɔ glegle betse kɔkpɛ kuni yo gi kwidzi tiitii loso o.
12Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ néne ye eme yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, lɛ asa liwo le kapɛ tanɛa ni ɔdzidzi yɛ yɛ kapɛ tanɛa ani badzidziebi ʋa ba kapɛ tanɛa bidɔ, niteme si ba kapɛ tanɛa kedzi litumu, lɛ liwe le lɛ kapɛ tanɛa kedzi litumu, lɛ elesi la kapɛ tanɛa fɛ ɛ kedzi litumu.
13Lɛ gi meedi i, menu kadzi katɔ, gi keepruru ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, kɛɛpani ni ole gagla ɔtɔ si, “Babaa, babaa, babaa ki banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ, kɔkpɛ kukuklui uliɔ gi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiata ʋa gi bɛgɔ ɛ bɛtráme loso.”

Title: KUB 9
Content:
1Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tsunɛ ɛ eme yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, lɛ mamɔ ɔdzidziobi ɔtɔ, gi awɔli adɔ ní lifunu ne, xe ádɔ kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ bɛkɔ safi ye gi izɛɛdra lizokpo gluglu le ɛki yɛ ɛ. 2Lɛ gi adra lizokpo gluglu le e, kunyɔɔ kwido edɔni niklɔ ŋwisi ligble ʋidi itɔ kunyɔ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ liwo le ni liwɔ lɛ mɛ bidɔ litumu kɔkpɛ kunyɔɔ gi kwido edɔ ni lizokpo gluglu le me loso o. 3Lɛ akikli la edo ɛdɔ ní kunyɔɔ mɛ ba kesea aʋa a, lɛ bɛki la kigagla ŋwisi kiliɛ gi kigaglaɛ kilɛ ní kesea aʋa kutapiadzɔ awla kinɛ ɛ. 4Bɛsi ba si, bakízizi siwa, awlakpa wɔwɔ loo ise itɔtɔ ní kesea aʋa, boŋu i, banama kùtu yo gi Aya yɛ lixaŋu nɛ limá ɛ. 5Lɛ báki ʋa kigagla si tɔ, beye ba a, pɔ̀ tɔ bawa ba nyɔnyɔɛ badzidzi tietsu nyɔŋ. Lɛ kuyeʋiyeʋi uliɔ gi benu i, kulɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi katapiadzɔ kizɛɛta ɔnɔ ɔ, xe bizeeyeʋi i kinɛ. 6Lɛ ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima biapɛ́ kutse, pɔ̀ batrámɔ kɔ ɔ, lɛ biapɛ́ vevee si betse pɔ̀ kutseo kwiase ní ba su u.
7Lɛ akikli la la kilɛlɛɛ mɛ ɛ, kilɛ ŋwisi isɔ gi bɛbla ɛki kigũ kutata kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bekume bidɔɛtɔ ŋwisi sika ekusikuto kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ba aŋu na mɛ alɛ ŋwisi banɔ aŋu mɛ kinɛ ɛ. 8Ba siya sɛ silɛ ŋwisi badzɛ siya kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ba ene na alɛ ŋwisi gyata ʋa ene kinɛ ɛ. 9Ba ete na mɛ alɛ ŋwisi ɔlaa kakɔ mɛ ewu bɛkpɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ba siwlasasa sɛ siiyì ŋwisi kikee nì isɔ glegle gi bɛɛtrɛ kigũ kinɛ ɛ. 10Lɛ ba ipi ne izɛɛta ŋwisi kutapiadzɔ ini nɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ní ba ipi ne me kigaglaɛ kilɛ si biabu kini kí banɔ badzidzi tietsu. 11Lɛ okusi liɛ gi eze ba onu i, ye onu lizokpo gluglu le me ɔxwɛdzɛɛ, gi bizɛxwa ní si Hebri se me si Abadon, lɛ ní si Hela sɛ mɛ ɛ bizɛxwa yɛ si Apolion.
12“Babaa” tɔpu yɛ onu aza; bigɔ baba tiaʋa gi bɛtrába ɛ.
13Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ glonɛɛ eme yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ gi ɛɛpani dɔni sika yɛ ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ, gi ɔlɛ ní Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ, lɔ asia tene na mɛ. 14Ɛɛpani ki Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ glonɛɛ gi evu kakuklui ya ní awla la si, “Ble baxwɛdzɛ tiene ba, gi bɛnya ní Eufrate onipe ʋidi lo kutu i.” 15Lɛ beble baxwɛdzɛ tiene ba gi balɛ ní kublabla mɛ ɛki ɔnyɔsasaa nɔ ya tututu u, ni liwe lɛ ya, ni ɔdzidzi liɛ ya, ani ligɔɛ lɛ ya aʋa a, tɔ biaye banima kapɛ tanɛa. 16Menu gi bɛxwa ba baguta ba kiklaklaɛ mɛ si benu isɔ bakpɛkpɛ akpe akpe ede alafa tiaʋa.
17Lɛ mamɔ isɔ ʋa ni banama gi bɛkpɛ ʋa a, ní kububasɛɔ mɛ, baguta ba bɛkpɛ bala kakɔ mɛ ewu gi ɛzã kyikyi ŋwisi kifu, ni bluu ŋwisi axu la, ni bitɔ gi biizã ŋwisi sɔlfa loo ɔmumɔɛ kinɛ ɛ. Ba isɔ ʋa etukpo la eze ŋwisi gyata kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kifu yɛ ni kunyɔɔ ani sɔlfa biido edɔ ní ba inugu le me e. 18Lɛ banima kapɛ tanɛa ní kesea aʋa betse gani baxixa tiata ʋa ya mɛ, gi benu kifu yɛ, ni kunyɔɔ ani sɔlfa yɛ gi biido ɛdɔni ba inugu le me loso o. 19Lɛ ese linu si isɔ ʋa kigaglaɛ kilɛ ní ba inugu le ni ba ipi ne me; lɛ ese linu si ba ipi ne e, ilɛ ŋwisi bagblaga kinɛ ɛ, gi etukpo alɛ ní lɛ onu u, gi bizɛkɔ ɛkpɛ banɔ ekyibi i.
20Pɔ̀ banɔ gɔgɔa ba, gi bétse gani nyɔnyɔɛ biwàdɔ tutaɛ ʋɛ ya mɛ kyɛ ɛ, badime si bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ, dɔni ba ɔwla onu axwɛwawa la mɛ ɛ, bámɔni ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne, sika yɛ ni klosalo ye, ni ɔla kyikyi yɛ ani akla kɔpɔni ise le babu ʋa kusumu u. Babua ʋa gi batrátani bidɔ kumɔ ɔ, loo eboe kunu loo kuga a. 21Lɛ báyurɔ ba kunɔyeo, ba ehwiboe la, ba enyimeboe la ni ádzɛboe la, ni ba ezeboe la.

Title: KUB 10
Content:
Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ni keplekpa sisami ya
1Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gagla dzedze gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne e. Aplɛ la ɛklani yɛ ŋwisi liwu kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔkũ yɛ ɔlɛ ní yɛ litukpo le, yɛ aŋu na mɛ eekle ŋwisi liwo le kinɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ ikli lɛ ilɛ ŋwisi igbase gi iisɔ kinɛ ɛ, 2evu keplekpa sisami gi bɛdra ɛ, ní yɛ kawla mɛ. Edu yɛ kaŋa mɛ ɔkli lɔ ní axu la aʋa, lɛ akɔ yɛ kaba ɔkli lɔ edu ní kesea aʋa ɛ, 3lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla ɔtɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi gyata yɛ izɛfami kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ gi akpɛ ozi lo e, dzeni ye egu tegloele ŋwisi kunububu kinɛ ɛ. 4Lɛ gi dzenigugu tiegloele ʋa ba ile le ipani i, mapɛ si miŋwlimi ba liboe le plɛ ɛ: pɔ̀ lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ ɛdɔ ní lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si, “Dà bidɔ ní eboa la gi dzenigugu tiegloele ba bɛpani i onu, atɔ wukíŋwlimi na ɛplɛ ɛ.”
5Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ liɛ, gi mamɔ ɔ, xe ɔlɛɛ kedu ya ní axu la ni kesea aʋa ɛ, emuni yɛ kaŋawla ní lifune. 6Lɛ atàni ɔniliɛ gi ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ kɔtsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi yɛ abitɛ lifunu ne ni kidɔ kakaa a, gi kikpasi ni bɛ mɛ ɛ, ani kesea ni kidɔ kakaa a, gi kilɛ ní ka aʋa a, kɔpɔni axu la ni kidɔ kakaa a, gi kikpasi ní la mɛ ɛ, lɛ apani si “Batrázizi lipoe tɔtɔ tɔɔ ɔ! 7Xe lipoe le lina si Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gloele e ome yɛ kakuklui ya ɛ, Aya aagu yɛ eboe kpokpo la ŋwisi kiliɛ gi asi yɛ banɔsumu ba gi benu beboedoplɛ ba ɛ.”
8Lɛ ole ɔklɔ gi menu adɔ ni lifunu ne e, egu kunugu ni me dzɛ si, “Trɛ tɔ zɛɛzɛ keplekpaʋia lia gi bɛdra ɛ, gi kalɛ ní Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ɛ, gi ɔlɛɛ kedu ya ní axu la ni kesea aʋa ɛ awla.”
9Lɛ matrɛ ní Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ klɔ ɔ, xe meʋi ye si ɔkɔ keplekpaʋia ɔkimɛ ɛ. Lɛ asi mɛ si, “Izɛ, tɔ tà ka, kianyasi ní wɔ lipo le me, pɔ̀ kiaze ŋanaŋana ní wɔ onugu lo me ŋwisi kibú kinɛ ɛ.” 10Lɛ mazɛ keplekpaʋia ní Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ awla a, lɛ matà ka ɛ. Kezee ŋanaŋana ní mɛ onugu lo me ŋwisi kibu ye kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ gi matà ka ɛ, kɛnyasi ní mɛ lipo le me. 11Lɛ bɛsi mɛ si, “Lilɛ kí wɔ si pani liboe plɛ dzɛ ní banɔ glegle, ni kuse glegle, siya ede ede ni bekusi ede ede su.”

Title: KUB 11
Content:
Banɔ tiaʋa gi bɛŋa katsalia ɛki Aya a
1Lɛ bɛki mɛ kiseʋi gi kilɛ ŋwisi bidɔ kigyigyeseʋi kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛsi mɛ si, “Trɛ tɔ zeegyigye Aya yɛ lisɔligba lɛ ni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ, tɔ kla banama gi beesumu Aya ní niklɔ ɛ. 2Pɔ̀ wukígyigye kepea aŋu na mɛ ɛ, níklɔ gi egli la ɛklanɔ ɔ; lɛ ese linu si bɛkɔ níklɔ ɛki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ, lɛ biaga lɛ biazizi ɔma ʋidi dradra lɔ badzidzi avitene ni tiaʋa a. 3Lɛ maaki banɔ tiaʋa ba klɔ gi bɛɛŋa katsalia ɛki mɛ ɛ, kigagla tɔ biapani liboe plɛ ewe akpe tole ni alafa tiaʋa ni aviteglo, lɛ biaze ní kusa kpìkpì mɛ.” 4Banɔ tiaʋa ba ya gi bɛŋa katsalia ɛ, benu kumu yɔ ise loo olif ye ise tiʋa ni kaniɛ ise tiʋa ɛlɛ gi ilɛɛ ní kesea Ɔkaɛ yɛ aŋu na mɛ ɛ. 5Lɛ xe ɔnutɔ apɛ si yibitɛ liboe zimizi manɔ ní ba su i, kifu kizedo edɔni ba inugu le me, gi kizɛkani ba ahwafianɛ ma ɛ; lɛ nite banama gi bizɛɛpɛ si, bɛwa ba nyɔnyɔɛ ɛ, nite lilɛ si betse. 6Kigagla kilɛ ní banɔ ba ya awla si biatsi lifune onu, tɔ dzeni ye ɔkidɔ ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ gi bɛɛpani eboe plɛ ɛ, lɛ kigagla kilɛ ní ba awla si biakyi bèni ʋa gi biadzi ika a, lɛ biaki kunya kakaa elu kwiaba kesea aʋa lipoe kakaa elu gi bɛpɛ́ ɛ.
7Lɛ xegi bɛŋa ba katsalia pɔ́ ɛ, kɔ ɔnyraga liɛ klɔ gi adɔ edo ní lizokpo gluglu le me e, aata kigũ ni ba, lɛ aaŋa ba aʋa, lɛ aaye ba. 8Lɛ ba bekpo ʋa biafɛ ní ɔma ʋidi lo lɔ ablɔ ʋa aʋa a, niklɔ gi bɛkla ba Ɔkaɛ ní ose lo su i. Ɔma lɔ klɔ gi bizɛxwa ní abee me si; Sodom ni Egipte e. 9Lɛ kɔki ewe tata ni kapɛ ɛ, banima dɔni banɔ kakaa mɛ, limade kakaa mɛ, siya ede ede me, ni kese kakaa aʋa biamɔ ba bekpo ʋa gi bafini i, pɔ̀ bátravive ba a. 10Lɛ kesea aʋa bezeze ba biamɔ isami ɔkpɛ ba loso, lɛ biaŋa liwe gi biatsisi ba ahanuglɔ ba bidɔ; lɛ ese linu si beboedoplɛ tiaʋa ba ya ɛ, bebu kini ɛki banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ.
11Pɔ̀ ní ewe tata ni kapɛ kede e, Aya afuɛ yɛ ligbã́ nɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ akpɛ ní ba mɛ, lɛ bɛyɔ xe balɛɛ ní ba ikli lɛ aʋa ɛ, lɛ lifu ʋidi itɔ lidɔ ní banama gi bɛmɔ ba aʋa ɛ. 12Lɛ benu ole gagla ɔtɔ dɔni lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si, “Mlemu aba niya a.” Lɛ bemu itrɛ lifunu ne ní aplɛ la mɛ ɛ, lɛ ba ahwafianɛ ma beedi ba ɛtsisi i.
13Lɛ ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ mɛ ɛ, kesea kɛhwa gaglaa, lɛ ɔma ʋidi no kapɛ liɔfɔa kɛkpa ɛdɔ kesea a, lɛ banɔ akpe tiegloele betse ní kesea kuhwahwa mɛ ɛ, lifu ne liku banɔ gɔgɔ ba nyani nyani, lɛ bɛkɔ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ɛki lifunu ne Aya ɛ.
14Baba ʋlaɛ yɛ onu aza, lɛ ɔtanɛ ɛ atrába kpekpemi.
Beme Kakuklui gloelea
15Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gloelee eme yɛ kakuklui ya, lɛ ile gagla iyi ní lifunu ne gi iipani si,
“Kesea aʋa kukusi yo kwidzi blɔ Ɔkaɛ ni yɛ Kristo ye kunɛ ɛ,
lɛ aaŋa aʋa kɔtsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ.”
16Lɛ banɔtsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba gi bedi ní ba ekusigbo la aʋa ní Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ, bewe ba aŋu na mɛ ní kesea, lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya a, 17lɛ bɛpani si,
“Kwido wɔ ɖase Ɔkaɛ, Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete e,
wɔ ɔniliɛ gi wɔlɛ ɛ, xe woze e,
lɛ ese linu si wɔkɔ wɔ kigagla ʋidi ye,
lɛ wokpese kukusi yo kuŋa a.
18Kesea aʋa kuseo kwiyeʋi isu, lɛ ese linu si wɔ kusuyeʋi gaglaa kɔ lipoe le lina.
Lipoe le lina gi wɔaxwa litsi ni bekpo ʋa a;
gi wɔatsa liʋɛ ki wɔ banɔsumu ba a, gi benu beboedoplɛ ba ɛ,
ni wɔ banɔ dradra ba ani banama gi bizɛkpɛ kubùbù ní wɔ linyine su u,
banuvɔ ni banɔtsitsi,
tɔ wɔakyrɔ banama gi bezizi kesea ɛ.”
19Lɛ bɛdra Aya yɛ lisumugba ɛlɛ, gi lilɛ ní lifunu ne e, lɛ ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ yɛ kunyanyaa kɔ aɖaka yɛ. Lɛ dzeni ye atsí kifu yɛ lɛ dzeni ye alàʋi lɛ egu i, lɛ kesea kɛhwa xe liwɔ ʋidi itɔ ni amukla na kyɛ bidɔ ɛ.

Title: KUB 12
Content:
Ɔdzɛɛ ni Kenia mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye
1Lɛ gyesi ʋidi gi abitɛ ɔnɔ kakaa yaa ɛ, aŋwi ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ. Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi akpɛ liwo le ŋwisi yɛ awu la kinɛ ɛ, xe ɔdzidzi yɛ ɔlɛ ní yɛ ikli lɛ ese e, ni badzidziebi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa gi benu likusikuto ní yɛ litukpo le e, 2limɛ lilɛ ní yɛ su, lɛ azeenimi gi si yipɔ̀ loso o. 3Lɛ gyesi dzedze aŋwi ní lifune dzɛ ɛ, kenia mɛ ɔgblaga kyikyi ʋidi ɔtɔ gi etukpo tegloele ni asia liɔfɔ alɛ yɛ ɛ, ekume ekusikuto tegloele, tile ní yɛ litukpo kakaa. 4Akɔ yɛ opi no ehe badzidziebi ʋa kapɛ tanɛa ní lifune aŋwia ɛkpɛ ní kesea. Lɛ kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ ɔlɛɛ ní ɔdzɛɛ gi atrápɔ ɛ, yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ tɔ yivu obi ye tà xegi bɛpɔ yɛ ɛ. 5Ɔdzɛɛ apɔ obinyime, gi yɛ atráŋa banima petee aʋa ni ɔwla gagla a. Pɔ̀ bɛʋã obi ye tsinɔ ní Aya klɔ ní Aya yɛ likusigbo le su u. 6Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ ese atrɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ niklɔ gi Aya abla aplɛ aki yɛ ɛ, gi biagani yɛ ɛ, ewe akpe tole alafa tiaʋa ni aviteglo.
7Lɛ kigũ kidɔ ní lifunu ne e: Mixael ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛta kigũ yɛ ni kenia mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye, lɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba kyɛ bɛta kigũ yɛ ni ba ɛ. 8Pɔ̀ kigaglaɛ kíze ní kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ su ebono lɛ bɛkpikpini ba ní ba ozeklɔ ní lifunu ne e. 9Lɛ bɛŋwia kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba petee ekpɛ ní kesea ɛ. Yɛ onu ɔgblaga kokoe, gi bizɛxwa si: ozimizi ye loo Satana a, gi yɛ eemeni kelea petee e. Bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ kesea aʋa, yɛ ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba petee.
10Lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ ní lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si,
“Abla ɛ, blɔ Aya yɛ kubúbú yo ni yɛ kigaglaɛ ni yɛ kaʋaŋaa kwiba,
lɛ yɛ Kristo ye yɛ kigaglaɛ ki ba a.
Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi izɛɛtsa blɔ benemi ba onu i,
gi izɛɛtsa ba onu ní blɔ Aya yɛ aŋu mɛ elesi ni kemize e,
bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní kesea.
11Lɛ bɛŋa yɛ aʋa
gani keʋesibi ya ka ika lɛ
ani gani ba katsalia eboe la mɛ ɛ,
lɛ bálɔ ba ligbã́ nɛ gbɛgbɛ
si biase ní kutseo onu u.
12Lɛ loso e, isami iku mlo, mlɔ lifunu ne kuseo
ni mlɔ banama gi mlalɛ ní kɔ mɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ babaa ki kesea ni axu la:
lɛ ese linu si Ozimizi ye eple eku ní mlɔ aʋa a!
lɛ kusuyeʋio kwiku ye nyani nyani; lɛ ese linu si, ete si yɛ lipoe le lídze tɔ ɔ.”
13Lɛ gi kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ amɔ si, bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ, eti ɔdzɛɛ gi apɔ obinyime e lideke. 14Pɔ̀ bɛkɔ kadzi ʋidi atɔ ka siwlasasa sɛ ede taʋa ɛki ɔdzɛɛ, tɔ aapruru trɛ ní ɔyaya kɔ ɔkutɔ, níklɔ gi bɛbla ɛplɛ ki yɛ ɛ, xe biadi yɛ aʋa a agɔ tata ni kapɛ, níklɔ gi kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ ɔ́tratani yɛ kuna ɛ. 15Lɛ kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ api kuni yo gi kwisrɛ ŋwisi onipe kinɛ ɛ, dɔni yɛ onugu lo me akpɛ nì ɔdzɛɛ kude, atɔ onipe lo aavu ye tsinɔ. 16Pɔ̀ kesea kɛɛpɔni ɔdzɛɛ, gi kesea kɛla onugu lo me, lɛ kɛŋwɛ kuni yo gi kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ api adɔ ni yɛ onugu lo me e. 17Lɛ isu iyeʋi ɔgblaga yɛ nyani nyani ni ɔdzɛɛ, lɛ asɛ atrɛ si yizɛɛta kigũ ni ɔdzɛɛ yɛ lipo me bebi gɔgɔ ba ɛ, ba benu banama gi bizenu kutu iiki Aya yɛ isã nɛ ɛ, xe bevu Yesu yɛ katsalia mɛ ní awla ɛ. 18Lɛ kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ alɛɛ ní axu la kutu yɔ ɛ.

Title: KUB 13
Content:
Ɔnyraga yɛ edo adɔ ní axu la mɛ
1Lɛ mamɔ ɔnyraga ɔtɔ gi eedo edɔ ní axu la mɛ ɛ. Asia liɔfɔ ni etukpo tegloele alɛ yɛ, lɛ ekusikuto liɔfɔ alɛ ní yɛ asia na aʋa a, lɛ ní yɛ litukpo kakaa aʋa ɛ, bɛŋwlimi libusionyi itrɔ. 2Lɛ ɔga liɛ gi mamɔ ɛ, ɔlɛ ko ŋwisi abosokpo ye kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ yɛ ikli lɛ ilɛ ŋwisi sisiblisi ye yɛ ikli kinɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ onugu lo ɔlɛ ŋwisi gyata yɛ onugu kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ kenia mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye e, akɔ yɛ kigaglaɛ, yɛ likusigbo le, ni yɛ ɔlɛɛkɔ gyɔgyɔ lɔ aki ɔnyraga yɛ ɛ. 3Ɔgaɛ yɛ litukpo tile le e, liŋwi ŋwisi libi gi nya liaki si aatse kinɛ ɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ, pɔ̀ libi le lítse e. Lɛ kelea petee onugu ètse lɛ bekuni ɔnyraga yɛ kude e. 4Lɛ banima bɛkpɛ litukpo kese ɛki kenia mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ, lɛ ese linu si akɔ yɛ kigaglaɛ aki ɔnyraga yɛ, lɛ bɛkpɛ litukpo kese ɛki ɔnyraga yɛ kyɛ lɛ beʋi si, nyaŋwɛ ɔlɛ ŋwisi ɔnyraga yɛ kinɛ ɛ? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aatani kigũ kuta ni yɛ ɛ?
5Lɛ bɛki ɔnyragaɛ onugu si obu onugu me tɔ ɔpani ebusioboe manɔ ní Aya su, lɛ bɛki yɛ kigagla badzidzi avitene ni tiaʋa si ɔbitɛ eboe ala ya. 6Lɛ adra yɛ onugu lo xe ekpese ebusioboe la kupani ní Aya su u, lɛ akpɛ Aya yɛ linyi ne, nì yɛ ozeklɔ, kɔpɔni banama petee gi balɛ ní lifune e, kakpaa. 7Bɛki yɛ kigaglaɛ tɔ ɔta kigũ ni banɔ dradra ba, atɔ ɔŋa ba aʋa, lɛ bɛki yɛ kigagla ní limade kakaa, ni banɔ kakaa, ni siya kakaa, kɔpɔni kese kakaa aʋa. 8Lɛ kesea aʋa bezeze ba petee biasumu ye e. Ba benu banama petee gi báŋwlimi ba enyi na ákpɛ ní ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ, dɔni kelea okpese klɔ ɔ. Keplekpaa lia kenu keʋesibi ya lia gi beye e, kanɛ.
9Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!
10Xe lilɛ si ɔnutɔ ɔtrɛ ligba ɛ, ligba lɛ ko aatrɛ.
xe lilɛ si beye ɔnutɔ ni ihɛ gblamadzaa ɛ,
ihɛ gblamadzaa yɛ ko biakɔ ye ye.
Liboe lɛ ya liziã litɔplɛplɛkese ni igyidodo ani anukwarɛɛ dɔni banɔdradra ba klɔ.
Ɔnyraga gi edo ádɔ ní Kesea mɛ ɛ
11Lɛ mamɔ ɔnyraga dzedze gi edo adɔ ní kesea mɛ ɛ. Asia taʋa alɛ yɛ ŋwisi keʋesibi kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ apani ŋwisi kenia mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi kinɛ ɛ. 12Lɛ awa ɔnyraga tɔpu yɛ yɛ kigaglaɛ petee su axwɛ ní yɛ onu u. Lɛ aki si kesea ni ka aʋa banima, besumu ɔnyraga tɔpu yɛ gi yɛ bɛkpɛ lìbi le e, gi nya liaki si otse xe e, pɔ̀ xe otse e. 13Lɛ abitɛ enugutseboe ʋidi na, gi aki si kifu kidɔ ní lifunu ne dɔ ní kesea aʋa ní banima aŋu mɛ ɛ. 14Kɔkpɛ gi bɛki yɛ kigaglaɛ si ɔbitɛ eboa la ya elu ní ɔnyraga tɔpu yɛ onu loso e, emeni kesea aʋa banima. Aki ba ɔsã si bedu litugu kí ɔnyraga tɔpu yɛ gi yɛ su bɛkpɛ libi le ni ihɛ gblamadza yɛ pɔ̀ xe ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, tɔ bakɔ akpɛ kubùbù ní yɛ su u.
15Lɛ bɛki yɛ kigagla si ɔki litugu inɛ gi bedu iiki ɔnyraga tɔpu yɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ tɔ lipani i, ani tɔ liki si beye banama petee badimɛ si beesumu ɔnyragaɛ yɛ litugu ne e. 16Lɛ emi ní ɔnɔ kakaa aʋa, banɔtsitsi ni banuvɔ, bexonete ni bazianete, banɔdzidzi ni banɔ gi balɛ ní ba ɔtutɔ isuwla mɛ, lɛ aki si bakpɛ ɔnɔ kakaa lixaŋu ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ loo ní yɛ ketu ya, 17atɔ ɔnɔnɔ ɔkitani bidɔ kudzi loo tɔ ɔdà bidɔ ɔ, dzaa si ɔnyraga yɛ yɛ lixaŋu nɛ gi linu yɛ linyine e loo yɛ aŋwi na ɛ, alɛ ní ɔniliɛ klɔ ʋa su u. 18Lɛ ya liziã kuboete. Xe kuboesenu kulɛ ní ɔnutɔ awla ɛ, ogyo ɔnyraga yɛ yɛ aŋwi na odi i, lɛ ese linu si linu ɔnɔ linyi gi lɛ aŋwi na enu alafa tieglo aviteglo ni teglo.

Title: KUB 14
Content:
Yohanes amɔ Keʋesibi ya ni ka banima
1Lɛ gi meedi i, mamɔ keʋesibi ya gi kalɛɛ ní Zion lito le aʋa ɛ, lɛ banɔ akpe alafa tole ni avitene ni tiene, gi bɛŋwlimi yɛ linyi ne nì Yɛka yɛ linyi ne ní ba kùtu yo e, bɛpɔni yɛ. 2Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ gi ɛdɔ ní lifunu ne ŋwisi onipe gi ɛdɔ limu kinɛ ɛ, ni dzeni kugugu gagla ɔtɔ kinɛ ɛ. Ole lo gi menu i, ɔlɛ ŋwisi ɔsangu beʋéʋe gi beeʋe ba isangu ne kinɛ ɛ. 3Bɛzɛzà ɔdzi vuvu ɔtɔ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ní bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe kɔpɔni banɔtsitsi ba aŋu mɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani ɔdzi nɔ kukpasi i, sani banɔ akpe alafa tole avitene ni tiene ba gi bebu idɔni kesea aʋa ɛ. 4Banɔ ba ya benu banama gi bákpɛ ɔdzɛ ha, lɛ bélulu isu ya ni badzɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba isu ya idra a. Banɔ ba ya ɛ, bizeekuni Keʋesibi ya kude tsinɔ ní ɔkɔ kakaa gi izɛtrɛ ɛ. Banɔ ba ya bedzi dɔni banima kusi i, xe bɛkɔ ba ŋwisi bidɔkɔkɔ tɔpu ki Aya ni Keʋesibi ya a. 5Lɛ bámɔ asia atɔtɔ ní ba onu u; lɛ ese linu si benu banɔ gi kunutsatsaa kutɔtɔ si bɛbitɛ eboe zimizi i, kúma ní ba su u.
Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiata ba
6Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze gi eepruru ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, gi evu liboe gbã moblo le ní awla a, si yipani iiki banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa a, ki kese kakaa, ki limade kakaa, ki siya lide kakaa ni banɔ kakaa. 7Lɛ apani ni ole gagla si, “Mlese Aya, lɛ mlakɔ kusudraa aki yɛ; lɛ ese linu si yɛ litsixwaxwa nɛ lipoe le lina, lɛ mlesumu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi yɛ abitɛ lifunu ne e, ni kesea ani axu la kɔpɔni inide ede ede ne.”
8Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ʋla ɛ, ekuni yɛ kude lɛ apani si, “Egleʋe, Egleʋe, Babilonia ʋidi ye Egleʋe, yɛ gi yɛ aki si kuseo petee kwiŋwɛ yɛ kihasiwawaɛ kɛ kuwleda ɛ.”
9Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tanɛ, ekuni ba kude lɛ apani ni ole gagla si, “Xe ɔnutɔ esumu ɔnyraga yɛ ni yɛ litugu ne e, xe azɛ yɛ lixaŋu nɛ ní yɛ ketu ya loo ní yɛ kawla mɛ ɛ, 10Aya aayeʋi isu ni ye, lɛ yɛ kyɛ aŋwɛ Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio kuda, gi bátsa ní yɛ kusuyeʋio kepliʋia mɛ ɛ. Lɛ biakɔ kifu ni kifu akla kɔwa yɛ nyɔnyɔɛ ní Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba ani keʋesibi ya aŋu mɛ ɛ. 11Lɛ ba kinie xunyɔ ɛ, kwiado trɛ ní lifunu ne tsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ. Lɛ kuzemɔni kúma elesi ni kemize ki banama gi besumu ɔnyragaɛ ni yɛ litugu ne e, loo ki banama gi bɛzɛ yɛ linyi ne lɛ lixaŋu nɛ ɛ.” 12Lɛ ya liziã litɔplɛplɛkese kese ni igyidodo dɔni banɔ dradra ba, gi bizeenu kutu iiki Aya isã nɛ ɛ, xe bevu kuziŋa ni Yesu me ní awla ɛ.
13Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ dɔni lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si i, “Ŋwlimi si: Biakrira banɔ ba ya gi betse ní Ɔkaɛ mɛ ɛ, dɔni lɛ ya aʋa kɔtsinɔ ɛ.” “Ee” Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani si, “biaazemɔni ní ba axwɛwawa la mɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba axwɛwawa la aazeni ba kude.”
Litsi ʋidi le
14Gi meedi i, mamɔ liplɛ pititi itɔ, lɛ ɔnutɔ odi ní lɛ aʋa ŋwisi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kinɛ ɛ, sika yɛ likuto le lilɛ ní yɛ litukpo le, lɛ evu ihɛ gi bizɛkɔ ɛtsa amu ní awla la a. 15Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze edo ádɔ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla atsisi ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Kɔ wɔ ihɛ tɔ tsa bidɔ mɛ; lɛ ese linu si ɔmuzáza nɔ ɛna, lɛ ese linu si kesea aʋa bidɔ mɛ biizã a.” 16Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi odi ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa ɛ, aŋwia yɛ ihɛ atsisi ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ atsa kesea aʋa bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ.
17Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze edo ádɔ ní lisɔligba ɛlɛ, gi lilɛ ní lifunu ne me e, gi yɛ fɛ evu kaláʋi nunu atɔ ní awla a. 18Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze ɔtɔ dzɛ, gi yɛ awla kigaglaɛ kilɛ ní kifu yɛ aʋa ɛ, edo ádɔ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ su, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla atsisi ɔniliɛ klɔ gi evu kaláʋia ní awla la si, “Kɔ̀ wɔ kaláʋia tɔ gu kesea aʋa wain yoyoe yɛ asà la; lɛ ese linu si wain yɛ esebi la ɛzã!” 19Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ aŋwia yɛ kaláʋia atsisi ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ agu kesea aʋa wain yoyoe, lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ní Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio kɔ wain yɛ ɔka kɔ ʋidi lo me e. 20Lɛ bɛpita wain yoyoe ni ikli lɛ ní ɔma nɔ ese e, lɛ ika lɛ ido ní wain yɛ ɔka klɔ ɛ, gi idzu ŋwisi ɔnɔ liŋwladɔ̃ kinɛ ɛ, gi bɛ kidzedzee me kina itiplɛkɔ alafa tiaʋa a.

Title: KUB 15
Content:
Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba ni baxixa tiegloele ʋa
1Lɛ mamɔ gyesi ʋidi dzedze ní lifunu ne, gi liki si mɛ onugu etse e. Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele gi bevu baxixa tiegloele gɔgɔ ʋa ní awlaa. Ba ya benu ba gɔgɔ ʋa lɛ ese linu si gani ba mɛ ɛ, kɔ Aya yɛ kusuyeʋi gaglaa kɔ onu kwidu i. 2Lɛ mamɔ kiditɔ gi kilɛ ŋwisi axu la a, pɔ̀ alɛ ŋwisi azinzi yɛ kinɛ ɛ, gi yɛ mɛ azã kyikyii ŋwisi kifu kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ mamɔ banɔ batɔ gi balɛ ni axu la kutu yɔ ɛ, ba benu banama gi bɛŋa ɔŋuga yɛ ni yɛ litugu ne ani yɛ linyi ne lɛ aaŋwi na aʋa a. Bevu isangu ne gi Aya aki ba ní awla a. 3Lɛ bɛza Mose, Aya yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye yɛ ɔdzi nɔ ani Keʋesibi ya ka ɔdzi nɔ si,
“Ɔka, Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete,
wɔ axwɛwawa la ekeme lɛ enu enugutseboe.
Wɔ bede ʋa benu bede gi bɛgyɔ ɔ, lɛ benu anukwarɛɛ,
Wɔ wonu kelea petee Okusi ye lipoe kakaa.
4Ɔkaɛ, nyaŋwɛ ɔlɛ gi ɔ́trase wo o,
xe ɔ́trakpɔ̀ wɔ linyi ne e?
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ tole ko wɔdra.
Ima nɛ petee iaba wɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ,
lɛ iaba sumu wo,
lɛ ese linu si bebu wɔ kiboebitɛ gyɔgyɔ ɛbasɛ ɛ.”
5Lɛ ya kede e, medi, lɛ mamɔ si bɛdra lisɔligba lɛ, gi linu kusɔliɔ kɔ likatsa lɛ ɛ. 6Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba, gi bevu baxixa tiegloele ʋa ní awla ɛ, bedo edɔ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ. Bɛkpɛ ewu pititi gi ɛɛdra a, xe eeŋle e, lɛ bɛkɔ sika asaba ɛklani ba ete na mɛ ɛ. 7Lɛ bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe ɔmɛ tole akɔ sika kubɔziʋi tugloele aki Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba ɛ. Kubɔziʋi tugloele uliɔ ya mɛ Aya gi ɔlɛ ligba nɛ kɔtsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ, yɛ kusuyeʋio kukpasi. 8Lɛ kunyɔɔ, gi kwidɔ Aya yɛ kuklekleo ni yɛ kigaglaɛ mɛ ɛ, kwiyi lisumugba lɛ mɛ, nite me si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kutiku, zɛkɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi baxixa ʋa gi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba bevu i, ba onu ɛza.

Title: KUB 16
Content:
Kubɔziʋio gi kɔ mɛ Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio kukpasi i
1Lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ dɔni lisɔligba lɛ mɛ gi ɛɛsi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba si i, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlazeenye Aya yɛ kusuyeʋi yo kubɔziʋi tugloele ko abali ní kesea aʋa.” 2Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tɔpu yɛ atrɛ ɛ, lɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ banima bɛdɔ ebì gi ezeyeʋi gagla ɛ, ba banama su gi ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ gyesi ye ɔlɛ ɛ ani banama gi besumu yɛ litugu ne e.
3Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ʋla yɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní axu la aʋa ɛ, lɛ kuni yo kwikyi dzi ika ŋwisi okpo ɔtɔ yɛ ika kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ gbagbe kakaa gi kilɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ kitse.
4Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tanɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní inipe le ani inide ne aʋa ɛ, lɛ bikyí dzi ika ɛ. 5Lɛ menu gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ liɛ gi odi ní bèni ʋa onu i ɛɛpani si,
“Wɔ linɛ ligyɔ ní litsi tsatsa ɛlɛ ya mɛ.
Wɔ gi wɔlɛ ɛ, xe woze e, wɔ Ɔnɔ dradra yɛ,
lɛ ese linu si nite wɔtsa litsi le e;
6lɛ ese linu si bɛbali wɔ banɔ dradra ba ni wɔ beboedoplɛ ba ba ika lɛ,
lɛ wɔki ba ika lɛ, tɔ baŋwɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ligyeni ba kinɛ ɛ.”
7Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ dɔni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ mɛ gi ɛɛpani si i, “Ee, Ɔkaɛ Aya kigaglaɛ petee ɔkaɛ, wɔ etsixwaxwa la enu anukwarɛɛ ni eboe gyɔgyɔ.”
8Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ néne ye enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní liwo le aʋa ɛ, lɛ bɛki liwo le kigagla tɔ, likani banima nì kifu u. 9Lɛ liwo le lɛ kuhuhu yo kwikani banima ɛ, lɛ bexo ifi ikpɛ Aya yɛ linyi ne, Aya gi yɛ amɔ kigagla ní baxixa ʋa ya aʋa ɛ, pɔ̀ lɛ badimɛ si bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ, xe biakɔ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ki yɛ ɛ.
10Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tsunɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, lɛ yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛdɔ litumu ne e. Lɛ banima bɛtà ba binemi ʋe kɔkpɛ ɔzia mɔmɔ nɔ loso o, 11lɛ bexo ifi le ekpɛ lifunu ne Aya a, kɔkpɛ ba kuyeʋiyeʋi yo ni ba ebi la loso, pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, badimɛ si bekyi ní ba kiboebitɛɛ mɛ ɛ.
12Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ glonɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní Eufrate onipe ʋidi lo aʋa ɛ, lɛ lɔ mɛ kuni yo kwiti i, tɔ bialulɔ kudeo aki kewetu ya bekusi ba. 13Lɛ mamɔ ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tita, gi ilɛ ŋwisi akpɔkplɔ ʋa kinɛ ɛ, gi ido edɔ ní keni ya mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ yɛ onugu lo me e, ni ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ onugu lo me, ani asia na oboedoplɛɛ yɛ onugu lo me. 14Inu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi gi izɛɛbitɛ enugutseboe la a, lɛ izɛɛtrɛ ní kelea mɛ bekusi ba klɔ ní kelea petee me e, tɔ bɛkpɛ ba likpɔ ɛki kigũ yɛ ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee pɔ́ Ɔkaɛ, yɛ liwe ʋidi le aʋa a.
15“Dike, matraba ŋwisi oze kinɛ ɛ! Biakrira ɔniliɛ klɔ gi izeeze ni aŋu i, xe izɛɛkɔ yɛ ewu la ɛplɛ isu ya su u, tɔ ɔkiga liya, xe biamɔ yɛ kuye me ɛ.”
16Lɛ bɛkpɛ bekusi ba likpɔ ní niklɔ gi bizɛxwa ní si Hebri se me si Armagedon.
17Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gloele enye yɛ kabɔziʋia kpɛ ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ole gagla ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ní likusigbo le su si, “Bɛbitɛ lɛ pɔ!” 18Lɛ dzeni ye kifutsitsi yɛ, yɛ kulaʋiɔ ni yɛ kugugu yo kwiyi i, lɛ kesea kɛhwa gagla gi kɔ elu kuʋíba eʋídi dɔni lipoe lɛ gi banima bali ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biba bɛ mɛ ɛ, kesea kɛhwa gaglaa koŋ. 19Ɔma ʋidi no ɛlɛ ní kupɛ tuta mɛ, lɛ kesea aʋa ima ʋidi ne iiyaʋi. Lɛ Aya aplɛ aŋu ní Babilonia ʋidi ye aʋa ɛ, lɛ akɔ yɛ kepliʋia gi ka mɛ yɛ kusuyeʋio kuda kulɛ ɛ, lɛ akɔ ka aki yɛ si ɔŋwɛ. 20Lɛ kunisi yo kese kakaa kɛlila ɛ, lɛ bámɔ litoe tɔtɔ tɔ ɔ. 21Lɛ amukla ʋidi, gi la kunyipu yo kwiaze ŋwisi ɔklagbotu tole e, ɛdɔ ɛdɔni lifunu ne xe ɛdɔ ni banima aʋa ɛ. lɛ banima bexo ifi le kpɛ Aya kɔkpɛ amukla na kuxixa loso, lɛ ese linu si la kinie kɛ onu kikeme koŋ.

Title: KUB 17
Content:
Kutuheheo ki Ɔwawadzee
1Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba ya awla gi kubɔziʋi tugloeleo kwize e, ba mɛ tole apani asi mɛ si, “Ba tɔ mibasɛ wɔ kutuhehe kuliɔ gi bɛtráki ɔwawadze ʋidi ye e, gi odi ní bèni glegle ʋa aʋa ɛ. 2Kesea aʋa bekusi ba bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ, lɛ yɛ kihasi ye kuda ɛ, kwimu banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ.”
3Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ efeke me ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ atsini ɔyaya klɔ, lɛ mamɔ ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi odi ní ɔŋuga kyikyi ɔtɔ, gi bɛŋwlimi ebusionyi na ní yɛ su petee e, xe etukpo tegloele ni asia liɔfɔ alɛ yɛ aʋa ɛ. 4Ɔdzɛɛ enyime basa gi bɛzi kedzi, lɛ alulɔ isu ya ni sika ni akla gi ɛɛzi kedzi ani ihwia pititi, lɛ evu sika kadaŋwɛpliʋi, gi keyi ni anyaniboe ni yɛ kihasi ye kɛ eboe kluklu la. 5Linyii nɛ gi bɛŋwlimi ni yɛ ketu ya linu si:
LIBOE KPOKPO
BABILONIA ƲIDI YE
BAWAWADZE BA PETEE ONEE
NI ANYANIBOE LA NI KESEA AƲA LA ONEE.
6Lɛ mamɔ si ɔdzɛɛ emu kuda gi kunu banɔ dradra ba ba ika lɛ ɛ, banama gi bɛŋa katsalia ɛki Yesu i, ba ika lɛ.
Gi mamɔ yɛ nite e, mawɔ yaa. 7Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ eʋi me si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔwɔ yaa nite e? Ki tɔ mibu liboe kpokpoe lɛ gi lilɛ ní ɔdzɛɛ ni ɔga liɛ gi yɛ aʋa odi i, gi etukpo tegloele ni asia liɔfɔ alɛ yɛ ɛ, ese aki wɔ. 8Ɔŋuga yɛ gi wɔmɔ ɛ, eze azanɔ, pɔ̀ ɔ́ma tɔ ɔ, lɛ atrádo edɔ ní lizokpo gluglu le me, lɛ aatrɛ gi iikyrɔ ɛ. Lɛ banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa gi báŋwlimi ba enyi na akpɛ ní ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, dɔni lipoe lɛ gi bɛbitɛ kelea ɛ, ba inugu iatse xe bɛmɔ ɔŋuga yɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔŋuga yɛ eze edi, pɔ̀ ɔ́ma tɔ ɔ, pɔ aadzi ba dzɛ.
9“Lɛ ya liziã kuboesenu nu: Etukpo tegloele la enu kutokpa tugloele, gi kɔ aʋa ɔdzɛɛ odi i. Edzì enu bekusi tiegloele: 10Bamɛ tietsu bɛwɔli, tole ɔlɛ, ɔgɔgɔɛ ɔʋíba sukɔ, lɛ xegi aba ɛ, lilɛ si ɔŋa kukusi yo lipoe kpekpemi itɔ 11Lɛ ɔŋuga yɛ, gi eze edi i, xe ɔ́ma tɔɔ ɛ, yɛ onu okusi ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ. Onu tiegloele ba ɔmɛ tole lɛ ɛtrɛ ní kukyrɔkyrɔ mɛ ɛ.
12“Lɛ asia, liɔfɔa la gi wɔmɔ ɛ enu bekusi liɔfɔ pɔ̀ baʋízɛ ba kukusi yo sukɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ biaki ba kukusi ki ɔnyɔsasa tole ko lɛ biaŋa kukusi yo, kɔpɔni ɔŋuga yɛ. 13Litukpo me trɔtrɔ tile lilɛ ní ba awla, lɛ linu si biakɔ ba kigaglaɛ ni ozeklɔ ki ɔŋuga yɛ. 14Biata kigũ ni Keʋesibi ya, pɔ̀ Keʋesibi ya kiaŋa ba aʋa a; lɛ ese linu si Yɛ onu Baka ba aʋa Ɔkaɛ ni Bekusi ba aʋa Okusi ye. Lɛ banama gi biapɔni yɛ ɛ, ba benu yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba ni yɛ banɔ kyakya ba kɔpɔni banama gi balɛ ni yɛ kude ni anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ.”
15Lɛ Aya yɛ Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi mɛ si, “Kuni yo gi wɔmɔ ɔ, gi kɔ aʋa ɔwawadzee odi i, kunu banɔ, linɔkpi ani kelea mɛ kuse ani siya ede ede. 16Lɛ ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia liɔfɔa la gi wɔmɔ ɛ, biatrɔ ɔwawadzee ahwafi. Biaki si aakyrɔ lɛ biabu ye liya a, biatà yɛ kisugyaɛ, lɛ biakpɛ yɛ kifu yɛ. 17Lɛ ese linu si Aya akpɛ lɛ ba ina nɛ mɛ, si babitɛ ní Aya yɛ batrɔtrɔ ʋa aʋa, gi ba petee biadimɛ tɔ biakɔ ba kaʋaŋaa aki ɔŋuga yɛ, zɛkɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ eboe la aaba la mɛ ɛ. 18“Ɔdzɛɛ gi wɔmɔ ɛ, yɛ onu ɔma ʋidi ɔ lɔ klɔ, gi ɛɛŋa kukusi yo ní kesea aʋa bekusi ba aʋa a.”

Title: KUB 18
Content:
Yohanes amɔ si Babilonia Ayaʋi
1Lɛ ya kede e, mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze gi eeple edɔni lifunu ne e, lɛ ozekɔ ʋidi ɔlɛ ní yɛ awla a, lɛ yɛ kusudraa kwiki si kesea petee keekle e. 2Akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla si,
“Ayaʋi! Babilonia ʋidi ye ayaʋi!
Lɛ ese linu si edzì ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne e, lɛ ozekɔ,
ni ɔfuɛfuɛ mɔdramɔdra kakaa lɔ okpo kɔ, ani kadzɔʋi kyrìkyrì nì ke kluklu kakaa ŋwisi opéte kinɛ ka ɔdɔ kɔ.
3Lɛ ese linu si kesea petee kɛŋwɛ yɛ kihasi ye kɛ kuwledaa,
lɛ kesea aʋa bekusi ba bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ,
lɛ kesea aʋa bedzigà ba bedzi bexonete gani yɛ bikesinɔdɔ kpaŋukpaŋu ʋɛ mɛ.”
4Lɛ menu ole dzedze dɔni lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si i, “Mledo aza ní yɛ mɛ, mɛ banima, tɔ mlakíkpɛ ɔha ni yɛ kuzimizi yo, atɔ mláʋazɛ yɛ kinii tɔtɔ ɔ.
5“Lɛ ese linu si yɛ kuzimizi yo kwimu ina lifunu ne e, lɛ Aya aplɛ aŋu ní yɛ eboe kyrikyri la aʋa.
6Mlabitɛ akpɛ ní lɛ onu aki yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi yɛ fɛ abitɛ lɛ kinɛ ɛ;
mledzini atsa aki yɛ ede taʋa kɔkpɛ kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ.
Kaŋwɛpliʋia lia mɛ gi akpɛ aki mlɔ ɛ, mlaki yɛ kɔ tuʋa tɔ ɔŋwɛ.
7Mlebu kinie aki yɛ atɔ mlaki yɛ ɔna tata ŋwisi kubùbù yo ni exo ala gi aki isu ya kinɛ ɛ.
Ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, izeefeke isu ya si,
‘Medi ŋwisi okusidzɛ; Ménu ɔdzɛ gi yenye etse e, lɛ mátrabemi monye liwewe e.’
8Lɛ loso e, yɛ kini ye kiaba yɛ aʋa ní liwe tile aʋa a: kutse, kube ani kuʋɛ ɛ.
Lɛ biakpɛ yɛ kifu gi kiakani yɛ petee,
lɛ ese linu si Ɔka Aya, ɔniliɛ gi
izɛxwa litsi ni yɛ ɛ, onu ɔnɔ gagla.
9“Lɛ xe kesea aʋa bekusi ba a, gi bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ ɛ, xe bɛŋa yɛ exo la nì yɛ ɛ, xe bɛmɔ yɛ kunyɔɔ ɔ, gi ɛɛsɔ ɛ, biabemi ye lɛ biawa awowoe la ní yɛ litukpo. 10Lɛ bialɛɛ ní ɔdzage no ke gi lifu ne liiku ba kɔkpɛ yɛ ɔzia mɔmɔ nɔ lɔ kinie e, gi ɛɛmɔ loso o, lɛ biabemi si,
“Babaa, babaa kí wɔ, wɔ ɔma ʋidi no
Wɔ Babilonia, wɔ gi wonu ɔma ʋidi ni ɔma gagla!
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ kutuheheo kwiba ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me.
11“Lɛ kesea aʋa bedzigà ba biabemi, lɛ biawa awowoe la ní yɛ litukpo, lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔnɔ óʋidzi ba bidɔdada ʋɛ tɔ ɔ. 12Bidɔdadaɛ ʋɛ ya binu: Sika ni klosalo, ani akla gi ɛzi kedzi i, ni ihwia ni akla la plɔplɔ yɛ, ni basa gi bɛzi kedzi i, ni seda yɛ ni ise kakaa elu gi ilɛ flafla ɛ, ni kudɔkpa gi bɛbitɛ ni onyi ye line ne e, ni ise gi izɛ kedzi i, ni ɔla kyikyi yɛ ani ɔla kpikpi yɛ kɔpɔni akla dzedze la a; 13awlakpaa la gi la mɛ bizebu kumu flafla edɔnɔ ɛ, ni bidɔ flafla ɛʋɛ gi bizɛɛkɔ ɛtɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, lifi ye adɔtu la ni kotoklobo ye, ni kuda ni kumu yɔ, ni kunɔ ni amu, ni egume ni iʋesi, ni isɔ ʋa ni kikee ʋa, ani banɔ dzidzi ʋa, kɔpɔni banɔ gbagbe ba.
14“Lɛ biapani si ‘wɔ bilésedɔ mɛ, bido ní wɔ awla. Wɔ exo la petee ni wɔ isu ya bilulɔ dɔ mɛ petee bilila gi bitradzì ba liwewe tɔ ɔ.’ 15Bedzigà ba gi bɛzɛda kudɔkpaa liɔ ya ɛ, xe bɛmɔ ba exo la ɛdɔni yɛ klɔ ɛ, bialɛɛ ní ɔkutɔ ke gi lifu ne liiku ba a, gi bɛmɔ yɛ kinimɔmɔɛ ɛ. Biabemi, lɛ biawa awowoe la, 16lɛ biasa awla onu si,
“ ‘Babaa, babaa ki ɔma ʋidi no!
Wɔ gi wɔkpɛ aklala plɔplɔ yɛ ɛ, ni basa kakaa gi bɛzi kedzi i,
xe wɔɛtsi kifu yɛ ni sika ni akla a, gi ɛzi kedzi ani ihwia lɛ ɛ!
17Wɔ exo glegle la ezizi ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me!’
“Lɛ initsahu le ɔka kakaa, ni ɔnɔ kakaa gi izekù initsahu le e, ni banama gi bizeku initsahu le e, ni kenia aʋa baxwɛwa ba, ani banama petee gi bizɛga kedzia ní axu la aʋa ɛ, bialɛɛ ní ɔkutɔ ke. 18Lɛ xegi bɛmɔ kunyɔ ɛdɔ ni yɛ kukanikani yɔ mɛ ɛ, biakpɛ ozi si, ‘Ɔma ʋidi ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́srɔni ɔma lɔ ya a.’ 19Lɛ biakpɛ ovugbo lo ní ba siya sɛ mɛ gi bɛwa awowoe la ɛ, lɛ biakpɛ ozi xe biazebemi si i,
“‘Babaa! Babaa kí wɔ, ɔma ʋidi no,
gi lɔ mɛ banama petee awla gi
initsahu le ize ni axu la aʋa ɛ,
bekyi edzì bexonete gani yɛ exo la aʋa!
Lɛ ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me e, bɛkyrɔ yɛ.
20Mlamɔ isami ní lɛ litukpo, Mlɔ banama gi mlalɛ ní lifunu ne e!
Isami iku mlo mlɔ baʋaziŋa ba ni mlɔ Aya yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba ni beboedoplɛ ba!
Lɛ ese linu si Aya atsa liʋɛ nɛ aki yɛ
kɔkpɛ kiliɛ gi agani mlɔ loso o.’ ”
21Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gagla ɔtɔ efeke liklakpɔ ʋidi itɔ gi likeme ŋwisi lihɔkla kinɛ ɛ, lɛ aŋwia lɛ akpɛ ní axu la mɛ, lɛ apani si:
Anyra ala elu bɛtrákɔ ɛŋwia
Babilonia ɔma ʋidi no ɛkpɛ kesea,
lɛ batrámɔ nɔ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
22Lɛ batránu ɔsangu no beʋéʋe ba ni badziza ba, ni ketee bememe ba, ani kukuklui yɔ bememe ba ile le
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batrámɔ lixwɛxwɛ lɛ baxwɛwa ba
ní wɔ mɛ tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batránu lihɔkla nɛ onu
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
23Kani yɛ kuklekleo kutrákle ní
wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batránu kunyimezeno ni kudzɛgbanɔ ole
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Wɔ bedzigà ba ba beze kesea aʋa banɔ ʋidi ba.
Gani wɔ kunɔfanɔɔ mɛ ɛ, kelea ima nɛ petee ilila lɛ kudeo.
24Lɛ bɛmɔ beboedoplɛ ba ni baʋaziŋa ba kɔpɔni banama
petee gi beye ní kesea aʋa ɛ, ba ika lɛ ni wɔ mɛ ɛ.”

Title: KUB 19
Content:
Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ likpɔ̀ Aya
1Lɛ ya kede e, menu ole gagla ɔtɔ gi ɔlɛ ŋwisi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ ní lifunu ne lɛ ole gi liikpɛ ozi lo si,
“Haleluya!
Kubúbú ni kusudra ani kigaglaɛ binu blɔ Aya yɛ binɛ,
2lɛ ese linu si yɛ etsixwaxwa la enu anukwarɛ lɛ ɛɛgyɔ ɔ.
Ebu ɔwawadze ʋidi ye lipɔ
gi yɛ ezizi kesea ni yɛ kihasi ye.
Eʋi yɛ banɔsumu ba ba kuwleo adɔ ni yɛ iwla mɛ.”
3Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo dzɛ si, “Haleluya! Ɔdzɛɛ yɛ kunyɔɔ kwiyɔ emu ní lifunu ne tsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ.”
4Lɛ bakatsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba ani bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe bɛdɔ kesea, lɛ besumu Aya, gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ. Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si,
“Amen, Haleluya!”
5Lɛ ole eyi dɔni likusigbo le su si,
“Mlakpɔ̀ blɔ Aya,
mlɔ yɛ banɔsumu ba petee,
mlɔ banama gi mlezeese ye e,
mlɔ banuvɔ ni betsitsi.”
6Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ ŋwisi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ ile, ŋwisi inipe glegle kuni kinɛ ɛ, ani ŋwisi dzeni kugugu gagla kinɛ gi bɛkpɛ ozi lo si,
“Haleluya!
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔkaɛ, blɔ Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete ɛɛŋa kukusi yo.
7Mlaki tɔ kumɔ isami tɔ kuyo,
tɔ mlaki yɛ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀!
Lɛ ese linu si keʋesibi ya ka kudzɛgbanɔɔ lipoe le lina,
lɛ yɛ ɔdzɛɛ gi atrágbanɔ ɛ alulɔ yɛ isu ya aki lɛ.
8Lɛ bɛki yɛ aklala pititi
gi eeŋle si ɔkpɛ ɛ.” Aklala pititi yɛ onu banɔdradra ba eboe gyɔgyɔ la gi bɛbitɛ ɛ.
9Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi mɛ si, “Ŋwlimi si, ‘Biakrira banama gi bɛxwa si ba ba Keʋesibi ya ka kudzɛgbanɔɔ ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i!’ ” Lɛ apɔnɔ dzɛ si, “Eboa la ya enu Aya yɛ anukwarɛɛ eboe.”
10Gi menu nite e, madɔ kesea ní yɛ ikli lɛ onu, tɔ misumu ye. Pɔ̀ asi mɛ si, “Wukíbitɛ lɛ ɛ! wɔ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu menu, wɔ ni wɔ benemi ba gi mlevu Yesu yɛ katsalia mɛ ni awla ɛ. Sù Aya! Lɛ ese linu si anukwarɛ liɛ gi Yesu abasɛ ɛ, bɛ binu kidiliɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔ, gi eeze ní beboedoplɛ ba mɛ, ebu ibasɛ ɛ.”
Isɔ pititi yɛ ɔkpɛkpɛɛ
11Lɛ mamɔ lifunu ne gi lidra edu u, lɛ mamɔ isɔ pititi ɔtɔ, gi yɛ ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ bizɛxwa si Anukwarɛɛ onete ni ɔnɔ aʋa gi biaziŋa ɛ. Izɛxwa litsi, lɛ izɛta kigũ ní kude gyɔgyɔ aʋa. 12Yɛ bimbi ʋe bilɛ ŋwisi kifu gi kiisɔ gaglaa kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ekume ekusikuto glegle ní yɛ litukpo le. Bɛŋwlimi linyi itɔ ní yɛ su gi ɔnɔnɔ óte sani yɛ ɔtutɔ ko o. 13Akpɛ liwu gi bɛkpɛ ní ika lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ linyi ne linu si, Aya yɛ liboe le. 14Lɛ lifunu ne baguta ba lihakpɔ lɛ gi bɛkpɛ isɔ pitititi ʋa ɛ, balɛ ni yɛ kude, lɛ bɛkpɛ aklala pititi ewu gi la su ɛɛdra a, xe eeŋle e. 15Lɛ dɔni yɛ onugu lo me e, ihɛ inugu tiʋa izeedo gi yɛ izɛɛkɔ ɛɛŋa kuseo aʋa a. “Lɛ aaŋa amade na aʋa ni ɔwla gagla.” Yɛ izɛɛka wain yɛ ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee onetee yɛ kusuyeʋi gaglaa, kɔ wain yɛ ɔkaklɔ. 16Lɛ ni yɛ liwu le ni yɛ litagba nɛ su i, bɛŋwlimi linyii nɛ ya; BEKUSI BA AƲA OKUSI NI Baka Ba aʋa Ɔka!
17Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tole ɔtɔ gi ɔlɛɛ ní liwo le me e, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gaglaa atsisi kudzɔʋi yɔ petee gi kuze pruru u, ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ si, “Mlakpɛ isu likpɔ kí Aya yɛ ɔkplɔ ʋidi lo, 18atɔ mlaata bekusi ba, ni baguta ba baka ba, banɔ ʋidi ba, isɔ ʋa, ni ba bakpɛkpɛ ba, banima petee, banama gi balɛ ba isuwla mɛ ni banama gi benu banɔ dzidzi i, banɔ bɔtsɔbɔtsɔ ani banɔ gbɔgbɔ ba kigyaɛ.”
19Lɛ mamɔ ɔŋuga yɛ ni kesea aʋa bekusi ba ani ba baguta ba gi bɛkpɛ isu likpɔ ɔ, si bɛta kigũ ni ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní isɔɛ aʋa a ani yɛ baguta ba. 20Pɔ̀ bevu ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia na oboedoplɛɛ, gi yɛ azaabitɛ inugutseboe la ní yɛ onu i. Gani eboa la ya elu me e, emeni banama gi bɛzɛ ɔŋuga yɛ lixaŋu kpɛkpɛ lɛ ɛ, xe bɛkpɛ litukpo kese ɛki yɛ litugu ne e. Bɛkɔ ba bagbagbe tiaʋa ba ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ gi liisɔ ni kifu yɛ akla na mɛ ɛ. 21Lɛ bɛkɔ ihɛ gblamadza yɛ gi izedo edɔni ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɛɛkpɛ isɔɛ yɛ onugu lo me e, bɛkɔ yɛ eye banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ petee kwizɛɛta ba kigyɛ.

Title: KUB 20
Content:
Bɛkpɛ Ozimizi ye Bibɔ Agɔ Akpe Tole
1Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne e, gi evu lizokpo gluglu le lɛ safi ye ni bibɔɛ ʋɛ gi bizɛɛkpɛ banima ɛ, biʋidiitɔ ní awla la. 2Evu keni ya mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye, ɔgblaga kokoe, gi onu Ozimizi ye loo Satana ɛ, lɛ anya yɛ kɔki agɔ akpe tole e. 3Lɛ aŋwia yɛ akpɛ ní lizokpo gluglu le me e, xe ada bidɔ mɛ ní lɛ onu i, lɛ asamu lɛ aʋa ɛ, atɔ okímeni kelea mɛ banima tɔ ɔ, kɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi agɔ akpe tole la onu ɛɛza ɛ, pɔ̀ lɛ ya kede e, lilɛ si, biable yɛ lipoe kpekpemi itɔ ko o.
4Lɛ mamɔ ekusigbo gi banama a, gi bɛki kigagla si baxwa etsi la ɛ, ba bedi ní la aʋa. Lɛ mamɔ banama onu gi bɛti etukpo la kɔkpɛ Yesu yɛ katsalia kuŋaŋaa ani kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ liboe le loso e, ba esobo la. Ba benu banama gi bésu ɔŋuga yɛ loo yɛ etugu na a, lɛ bázɛ yɛ lixaŋu kpɛkpɛ lɛ ní ba kutu yo loo ní ba kuwlakpɔɔ ɔ. Bedzi ligbã́ lɛ bɛŋa kukusi yo ni Kristo agɔ akpe tole. 5Banama gi betse e bédzi ligbã́ tɔɔ, kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi agɔ akpe tole la ɛza ɛ. Lɛ ya linu kuyɔyɔ tɔpu yɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. 6Banɔ gi bɛkrira ni banɔ dradra ba benu banama gi biamɔ ba kapɛa ní kuyɔyɔ tɔpu yɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Kutse ʋla kutrámɔ kigagla ní ba aʋa a, boŋu i, biadzi Aya ni Kristo yɛ kusɔliɔ kɔ baka ba, lɛ biaŋa kukusi yo ni yɛ kɔki agɔ akpe tole.
Bɛŋa Satana aʋa
7Lɛ xe agɔ akpe tole la onu ɛza ɛ, biabu Satana ní yɛ lizokpo gluglu le me, 8lɛ aatrɛ, tɔ yizeemeni kelea petee, dɔni kesea igó tine ne aʋa a, gi inu, Gog ani Magog, tɔ biakpɛ ba likpɔ ki kigũ. Ba gi ba kisrɛsrɛ mɛ kiaze ŋwisi axuta la siklami sɛ kinɛ ɛ. 9Bɛga klani kesea petee lɛ bɛkpɛ Aya yɛ banima ba likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ ni yɛ ɔma ʋidi lo gi alɔ ni kusi yo e. Pɔ̀ kifu yɛ kidɔ ní lifunu ne lɛ kiba ɛkani ba ɛ. 10Lɛ bevu Ozimizi ye gi yɛ emeni ba ɛ, ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha ɛlɛ gi liisɔ mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ gi bɛŋwia ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia na oboedoplɛɛ ɛkpɛ ɛ, lɛ biawa ba nyɔnyɔɛ elesi ni kemize tsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ.
Aya axwa litsi ni bekpo ʋa
11Lɛ mamɔ likusigbo pititi ʋidi itɔ ni ɔniliɛ gi odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ. Lifune ni kesea bise ní yɛ aŋu na mɛ, lɛ bámɔ ʋɛ tɔ ɔ. 12Lɛ mamɔ bekpo ʋa, banɔtsitsi ni banuvɔ, gi balɛ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, lɛ bɛdra kuplekpaa ɛ. Lɛ bɛdra keplekpa dzedze gi ka kenu ligbã nɛ keplekpaa. Lɛ bɛxwa litsi ni bekpo ʋa ní kidiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi i kpɛ ní kuplekpa liɔ klɔ mɛ ní ba axwɛwawa la su u. 13Lɛ axu la ebú banama ma gi bɛwɔ ní la mɛ ɛkɔ, lɛ kutseo ni bekpo ʋa mɛ kyɛ bebu banama gi balɛ ní bɛ mɛ ɛkɔ ɔ, lɛ bɛxwa litsi ni ɔnɔ kakaa ní kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ onu. 14Lɛ bɛkɔ kutseo ni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lifuha ɛlɛ ya linu kutse ʋlaa. 15Lɛ xegi báŋwlimi ɔnutɔ yɛ linyi ne akpɛ ní ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, kɔ bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ ɛ.

Title: KUB 21
Content:
Yerusalem vuvu yɛ
1Lɛ mamɔ lifunu vuvu ni kese vuvu, lɛ ese linu si lifunu tɔpu nɛ ni kese tɔpu ya bɛ onu biza, lɛ axu la amá tɔɔ ɔ. 2Lɛ mamɔ ɔma dradra nɔ gi onu Yerusalem vuvu yɛ, gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne ní Aya klɔ ɛ, lɛ bɛlulɔ lɔ ŋwisi ɔdzɛ, gi bɛbitɛ kublabla ɛkɔ ki yenye kinɛ ɛ. 3Lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ ɛdɔni likusigbo le su si “Abla ɛ, Aya yɛ ozeklɔ ɔlɛ ní banima kusi lɛ yɛ aaze ní basu. Biaze yɛ banɔ, lɛ Aya ɔtutɔ lɔ aaze ní ba su lɛ aaze ba Aya. 4Lɛ aatsoli kube kakaa kube ni ba aŋu mɛ. Kutse loo awowoe la kuwawa loo kubemi loo kuyeʋiyeʋi kútraze tɔɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si eboe kokoo la ɛɛza.”
5Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, asi mɛ si, “Mɛɛbitɛ kidɔ kakaa si kidzi kivuvu u!” Lɛ apani si, “Ŋwlimi liboe lɛ ya plɛ, lɛ ese linu si eboe ala ya enu anukwarɛ eboe ni eboe gi biazɛ la aʋa ŋa a.”
6Lɛ asi mɛ si, “Bɛbitɛ lɛ pɔ́! Mɛ menu Alfa ni Omega, gi lɛ ese linu si okpese klɔ ni ɔgù klɔ. Ɔniliɛ gi olile eeku i, maaki yɛ tɔ aaŋwɛ kuni liʋɛmotsa dɔni ligba nɛ kuni yo kɔ linitɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ. 7Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, aazɛ kaŋase alia ya, lɛ maaze yɛ Aya, lɛ yɛ aaze mobi i. 8Pɔ̀ befufluse ba ni banama gi báziŋa a ani banama gi bizɛbitɛ anyaniboe la a, bakpɛnɛ ba, banama gi bizɛbitɛ ádzɛboe la ni enyimeboe la a, banama gi bizɛɛbitɛ ehwiboe la a, banama gi bizeesumu babu ʋa a, kɔpɔni basia nɛ ma petee ba ozeklɔ onu lifuha lɛ gi liisɔ ni kifu yɛ akla na a mɛ. Lɛ ya linu kutse ʋlaa a.”
9Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba, gi ba awla kubɔziʋi tugloeleo o, gi kwiyi ní baxixa tiegloele gɔgɔ ʋa ba mɛ tole aba, lɛ apani nì mɛ si, “Ba, tɔ mibasɛ wɔ ɔdzɛɛ gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawlaa gi onu Keʋesibi ya yedze e.” 10Lɛ efeke me ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ atsini lito ʋidi gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ aʋa ɛ, lɛ ebu ɔma dradra nɔ, Yerusalem, gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne ní Aya klɔ ɛ, abasɛ mɛ. 11Eekle ni Aya yɛ kusudraa, lɛ lɔ kuklekleo kulɛ ŋwisi líhuiʋi zi kedziatɔ kinɛ ɛ, ŋwisi yaspis likla, gi lɛ mɛ lidra ŋwisi azinzi kinɛ ɛ. 12Ligli gyɔgyɔ ʋidi itɔ liklani lɔ, lɛ kuvunu liɔfɔ ni tuʋa kulɛ ní lɔ su, lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa balɛɛ ní lɔ kuvunu yo o. Bɛŋwlimi Israɛl bebi ʋa ba iku liɔfɔ ni tiʋa lɛ enyina ní lɔ kuvunu yo. 13Kuvunu tuta kulɛ ní kewetu ya kapɛa, tuta ni kaʋaa, tuta ní kalaa ni tuta ní keweku ya. 14Ɔma ʋidi no lɔ egli la alɛɛ ní ixɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa aʋa, lɛ ni ixɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa lɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛŋwlimi Keʋesibi ya ka banɔkpɛkpɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba enyi na ɛtrɔ ɔ.
15Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ liɛ gi apani ni mɛ ɛ, evu sika kigyigyeseʋi gi atrákɔ egyigyi ɔma ʋidi no ni lɔ kuvunu yo ni lɔ egli la a. 16Ɔma nɔ lɔ kidzedzee me ni lɔ kinenee me bisɔ̀. Egyigyi ɔma nɔ nì kigyigyeseʋi ye lɛ bize itiplɛkɔ akpe tole ni alafa tietsu; lɔ kidzedzee me ni kinenee me ani lɔ kimumu ye me bisɔ. 17Lɛ egyigyi ɔma nɔ lɔ ligli le, lɛ amɔ si lɛ kitritri ye me e, kize kuklikpɔ alafa tiaʋa ní ɔnɔ kugyigyi yo onu, gi kɔsu axwɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ɛɛwa ɛ. 18Lɛ kidiliɛ gi bɛkɔ ɛtrɔ ligli le e, kinu yaspis likla, lɛ ɔma nɔ onu sika dradra yɛ, gi yɛ mɛ adra ŋwisi azinzi yɛ kinɛ ɛ. 19Lɛ bɛkɔ akla zikedzi ede ede dzedze la, ɛkɔ ɛlulɔ ɔma nɔ lɔ ɔxɔ lɔ, gi lɔ aʋa egli la alɛ ɛ. Ɔxɔ kpɛkpɛ tɔpu nɔ onu yaspis, ɔʋla lɔ onu safir, ɔtanɛ nɔ onu xalkedon, onene no onu smaragd, 20otsunɛ nɔ onu sardonik, oglonɛ nɔ onu kanelia, ogloele lo onu krisolit, ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ onu beril, ɔgɔtolee onu topas, liɔfɔɛ onu krisopras, liɔfɔ ni tolee onu hiakint, liɔfɔ ni ɔʋlaɛ onu ametis. 21Lɛ kuvunu liɔfɔ ni tuʋa kunu ehuʋi pititi liɔfɔ ni taʋa, kevunu kakaa kenu lihuʋi pititi tile, lɛ ɔma nɔ ablɔ ʋa ɛ, benu sika gbã yɛ gi yɛ mɛ adra ŋwisi azinzi mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
